anya-e0702n0:5: So maṃ ciraṃ pātu sukhaṃ sadā sadā.
anya-e0702n0:34_0: 1. Tattha ca navaṭṭhānāgatasāsanavaṃsakathāmaggo evaṃ veditabbo. Amhākañhi bhagavā
anya-e0702n0:34_1: sammāsambuddho veneyyānaṃ hitatthāya hatthagataṃ sukhaṃ anādiyitvā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato
anya-e0702n0:34_2: pādamūle byākaraṇaṃ nāma mañjūsaka pupphaṃ pilandhitvā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
anya-e0702n0:34_3: asakhye yāni anekāsu jātīsu attano khedaṃ anapekkhitvā samatiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā
anya-e0702n0:35_0: Tadā devehi uyyojiyamāno hutvā kapilavatthumhi hosamataraññā pabhuti asambhinnāttiyavaṃsikassa
anya-e0702n0:35_1: suddho dhanassanāma mahārañño aggamahesiyā asambhinnāttiyavaṃ sikāya māyāya kucchīsmiṃ
anya-e0702n0:35_2: āsāḷimāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ guruvāre paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā asamāsaccayena vesākhamāsassa
anya-e0702n0:35_3: puṇṇamiyaṃ sukkavāre vijāyitvā soḷasavassikakāle rajjasampattiṃ patvā ekūnatiṃsavassāni
anya-e0702n0:35_4: atikkamitvā maṅgalauyyānaṃ nikkhamanakāle devehi dassitāni cattāri nimittāni passitvā
anya-e0702n0:35_5: saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anomāyanāma nadiyā tīre bhamara
anya-e0702n0:35_6: vaṇṇasannibhāni kesāni chinditvā devadattiyakāsāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ne rañjarāyanāma
anya-e0702n0:35_7: nadiyā tīre vesākhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ paccūsakāle sujātāyanāma seṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:35_8: pāyāsaṃ ekūnapaṇṇāsavārena paribhuñjitvā purimikānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ dhammatāya
anya-e0702n0:35_9: suvaṇṇapātiṃ nadiyaṃ otāretvā mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aparājitapallaṅke nisīditvā
anya-e0702n0:35_10: anamataggasaṃ sārato paṭṭhāya attānaṃ chāyā viya anuyantānaṃ anekasatakilesaverīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:35_11: sīsaṃ catūhi maggasatthehi chinditvā tilokaggamahādhammarājattaṃ patvā pañcatālīsavassānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:35_12: tesu tesu ṭhānesu tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattijālaṃ patthāretvā desanāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:35_13: vijambhetvā dhammaṃ desetvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca pana asītivassāyukakāle
anya-e0702n0:35_14: vijjotayitvā nibbāyanappa dāpajālaṃ viya anupādisesanibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Maccu
anya-e0702n0:35_15: dhammassa ca nāma tīsu lokesu atimamāyitabbo esa, atigarukātabbo esa, atibhāyitabbo
anya-e0702n0:35_16: esāti vijānanasabhāvo natthi. Bhagavantaṃyeva tāva tilokaggapuggalaṃ ādāya gacchati,
anya-e0702n0:35_17: kiṃmaṅgaṃ pana amhe yevā tevā, ahovataacchariyā saṅkhāradhammoti. Honti cettha–
anya-e0702n0:48_0: Sattāhaparinibbute ca bhagavati āyasmā mahākassapo tiyaḍḍhasatādhikehi sahassamattehi
anya-e0702n0:48_1: bhikkhūhi saddhi pāvāto kusīnārāyaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge bhagavā sammāsambuddho
anya-e0702n0:48_2: parinibbutoti sutvā avītasoka bhikkhū rodante disvā vuddhapabbajito subhaddānāma
anya-e0702n0:48_3: bhikkhu evaṃ vadati– mā āvuso paridevittha, natthettha socitabbonāmakoci, pubbe mayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:48_4: bhavāma samaṇena ge,bhamena upaddutā– idaṃ karotha idaṃ tumhākaṃ kappati, mā idaṃ
anya-e0702n0:48_5: karittha na idaṃ tumhākaṃ kappatīti, seyyathāpi iṇasādhikena dāsoti, idāni pana mayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:48_6: yaṃ yaṃ icchāma, taṃ taṃ sakkā kātuṃ, yaṃ yaṃ pana na icchāma,taṃ taṃ sakkā akātunti.
anya-e0702n0:48_7: Taṃ sutvā īdisaṃ pana verīpuggalaṃ paṭicca sammāsambuddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ khippaṃ
anya-e0702n0:48_8: antaradhāreyya, idāni suvaṇṇakkhandhasadiso sarīro saṃvijjamāno yeva dukkhena nipphādite
anya-e0702n0:48_9: sāsane mahābhayaṃ uppajji ca, īdiso puggalo aññaṃ īdisaṃ puggalaṃ sahāyaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0702n0:48_10: vuddhimāpajjanto hāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyya maññeti cittakkhedaṃ patvā dhammasaṃvegaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0702n0:48_11: imaṃ bhikkhuṃ idheva setavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā sarīre bhasmena vikiritvā bahiddhā karissāmīti cintesi.
anya-e0702n0:49_0: Tadā āyasmato mahākassapattherassa etadahosi,– idāni samaṇassa gotamassa sarīraṃ
anya-e0702n0:49_1: saṃvijjamānaṃyeva parisā vivādaṃ karontīti manussā upavadissantiti. Tato pacchā imaṃ
anya-e0702n0:49_2: vitakkaṃ vūpasametvā khamitvā sammāsambuddho bhagavā parinibbāyamānopi tena pana
anya-e0702n0:49_3: desito dhammo saṃvijjati, tena desitassa dhammassa thiraṃ patiṭṭhāpanatthāya saṅgāyiyamānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:49_4: īdisehi puggalehi sāsanaṃ na antaradhāyissati, ciraṃ ṭhassati yevāti manasikaritvā
anya-e0702n0:49_5: bhagavato dinnapaṃsu kūlacīvarādivasena dhammānuggahaṃ anussaritvā bhagavato parinibbānato
anya-e0702n0:49_6: tatiye māse āsāḷimāsassa puṇṇamito pañcame divase rājagahe sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ ājātasattuṃnāma
anya-e0702n0:49_7: rājānaṃ nissāya pañcahi arahanta satehi saddhiṃ sattamāsehi paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyanaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:50_0: Tadā aṭṭhacattālīsādhikasatakaliyugaṃ anavasesato apanetvā kaliyugena sāsanaṃ samaṃ
anya-e0702n0:50_1: katvā ṭhapesi. Yadā pana ajātasattu rañño rajjaṃ patvā aṭṭhavassāni ahesuṃ, tadā
anya-e0702n0:50_2: marammaraṭṭhe taṅkosaṅgatvapure jambudīpadhajassanāma rañño rajjaṃ patvā atirekapañcavassāni ahesunti.
anya-e0702n0:51_0: Imissañca paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmā upāli āyasmā ānando āyasmā
anya-e0702n0:51_1: anuruddho cāti evamādayo pañcasatappamāṇā mahātherā paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyitvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:51_2: Evaṃ subhaddassa duṭṭhapabbajitassa duṭṭhavacanaṃ sāsanassa anuggahe kāraṇaṃnāma
anya-e0702n0:51_3: ahosi. Subhaddo ca nāma duṭṭhapabbajito ātumānagaravāsī ahosi kappakakuliko. So yadā
anya-e0702n0:51_4: bhagavā ātumānagaraṃ gacchati, tadā atteno putte dve sāmaṇere kappakakammaṃ kārāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:51_5: laddhehi taṇḍulatelādīhi vatthūhi yāguṃ pacitvā sasaṅghassa buddhassa adāsi. Bhagavā
anya-e0702n0:51_6: pana tāni appaṭiggahetvā kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vigarahitvā akappiyasamādānadukkaṭāpattiṃ
anya-e0702n0:51_7: kappakapubbassa bhikkhussa khuradhāraṇadukkaṭāpattiñca paññāpesi. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0702n0:51_8: veraṃ bandhitvā sāsanaṃ viddhaṃsitukāmatāya tattakaayoguḷaṃ gilitvā uggīranto viya
anya-e0702n0:52_0: Ajātasatturājā ca tumhākaṃ dhammacakkaṃ hotu, mama āṇācakkaṃ pavattissāmi, vissaṭṭhā
anya-e0702n0:52_1: hutvā saṅgāyantūti anuggahesi. Tenesa paṭhamaṃ sāsanānuggaho rājāti veditabbo, mahākassapādīnañca
anya-e0702n0:52_2: arahantānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ sisāparamparā anekā honti, gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā. Yamettha
anya-e0702n0:52_3: ito paraṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Te pana mahātherā
anya-e0702n0:66_0: Tato paraṃ vassasataṃ tesaṃ sissaparamparā sāsanaṃ dhāretvā āgamaṃsu. Athānukkamena
anya-e0702n0:66_1: gacchantesu rattidivesu vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:66_2: vesāliyaṃ kappati siṅgiloṇakappā, kappati dvaṅgulakappo, kappati gāmantarakappo,
anya-e0702n0:66_3: kappati āvāsakappo, kappati anumatikappo, kappati āciṇṇakappo, kappati āmathitakappo,
anya-e0702n0:66_4: kappati jaḷogiṃ pātuṃ, kappati adasakaṃ nisīdanaṃ, kappati jātarūparajatanti imāni
anya-e0702n0:67_0: Tesaṃ susunāgaputto kāḷāsokonāma rājā pakkho ahosi. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā
anya-e0702n0:67_1: yaso kākaṇḍakaputto vajjīsu cārikaṃ caramāno vesālikā kira vajjiputtakā bhikkhū vesāliyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:67_2: dasavatthūni dipentīti sutvā na kho panetaṃ ppatirūpaṃ, yvāhaṃ dasabalassa sāsanavipattiṃ
anya-e0702n0:67_3: sutvā appossukko bhaveyyaṃ, sandhāhaṃ adhammavādino niggahetvā dhammaṃ dīpessāmīti
anya-e0702n0:67_4: cintayanto yena vesālī, tadavasari. Tadā āyasmā mahāyaso revatasabbakāmiādīhi sattasatehi
anya-e0702n0:67_5: arahantehi saddhiṃ saṅgāyissāmīti vesāliyaṃ vālukārāmaṃ āgacchi. Vajjiputtakāca bhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:67_6: upārambhacittā kāḷāsokaṃnāma rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mayaṃ kho mahārāja imasmiṃ mahāvanārāme
anya-e0702n0:67_7: gandhakuṭiṃ rakkhitvā vassāma, idāni mahārāja adhammavādino aññe bhikkhū vilumpitukāmā
anya-e0702n0:67_8: viddhaṃsitukāmā āgatāti ārocesuṃ. Kāḷāsoko ca mahārājā āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ appavisanatthāya
anya-e0702n0:67_9: nivārethāti amacce pesesi. Amaccāca nivāretuṃ gacchantā devatānaṃ ānubhāvena bhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:67_10: na passanti. Tadaheva ca rattibhāge kāḷāsokamahārājā lohakumbhīniraye patanākārena
anya-e0702n0:67_11: supinaṃ passi. Tassa rañño bhagini nandānāma therī ākāsena āgacchanti dhammavādino
anya-e0702n0:67_12: mahāthere niggaṇhitvā adhammavādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paggahaṇe dosabahulataṃ pakāsetvā
anya-e0702n0:68: Kāḷāsokarājā ca saṃvegappatto hutvā āyasmantānaṃ mahāyasattherādīnaṃ khamāpetvā ajātasatturājā viya saṅgāyane paggahaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:69: Mahāyasattherādayo ca kāḷāsokaṃ rājānaṃ nissāya vālukārāme vajjiputtakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pakāsitāni adhammavatthūni bhinditvā aṭṭhati māsehi dutiyasaṅgāyanaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:70_0: Tadā ca majjhimadese pātaliputtanagare susunāgarañño puttabhūtassa kāḷāsokarañño
anya-e0702n0:70_1: atisekaṃ patvā dasavassāni ahesuṃ. Parammaraṭṭhe pana sirikhettanagare dvattagoṅkassanāma
anya-e0702n0:70_2: rañño abhisittakālato pure ekavassaṃ ahosi. Jinasāsanaṃ pana vassasataṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:71: Imissañca dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ mahāyasa revata sabbakāmippamukhā sattasatappamāṇā mahātherā dutiyaṃ saṅkhāyitvā dutiyaṃ sāsanaṃ paggahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:72_0: Āyasmā mahāyasattherocanāma pañcahi etadaggaḷāne hi bhagavatā thomitassa ānandattherassa
anya-e0702n0:72_1: saddhivihāriko ahosi. Vajjiputtakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhammavatthudīpanaṃ dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:72_2: kāraṇameva. Kāḷāsokarājāca pageva adhammavādībhikkhūnaṃ sahāyopi samāno puna dhammavādibhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:72_3: sahāyo hutvā anuggahaṃ akāsi. Tasmā dutiyasāsanapaggaho rājāti veditabbo.
anya-e0702n0:73_0: Dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ pana mahāyasatthera revata sabbakāmippamukhānaṃ sattasatānaṃ mahātherānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:73_1: sissaparamparā anekā honti, gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā. Yamettha ito paraṃ vattabba,
anya-e0702n0:73_2: taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Te pana mahātherā dutiyaṃ saṅgāyitvā parinibbāyiṃsūti. Honti cettha–
anya-e0702n0:83_0: Tato paraṃ aṭṭhatiṃsādhikāni dvevassasatāni sammāsabbuddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ nirākulaṃ
anya-e0702n0:83_1: ahosi nirabbudaṃ. Aṭṭhatiṃsādhike pana dvivassasate sampatte pāṭaliputta nagare siridhammāsokassanāma
anya-e0702n0:83_2: rañño kāle nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ paṭicca buddhasāsane pasīditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa lābhasakkāraṃ
anya-e0702n0:83_3: bāhullaṃ ahosi. Tadā saṭṭhisahassamattā titthiyā lābhasakkāraṃ apekkhitvā apabbajitāpi
anya-e0702n0:83_4: pabbajitāviya hutvā upāsathapavāraṇādikammesu pavisanti, seyyathāpināma haṃsānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:83_5: majjhe bakā, yathā ca gunnaṃ majjhe gavajā, yathā ca sindhavānaṃ majjhe gadrabhāti.
anya-e0702n0:84_0: Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho idāni aparisuddhā parisāti manasi karitvā uposathaṃ na akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:84_1: Sāsane abbudaṃ hutvā sattavassāni uposathapavāraṇāni chijjanti. Siridhammāso ko ca
anya-e0702n0:84_2: rājā taṃ sutvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehi uposathaṃ kārāpehīti ekaṃ amaccaṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:84_3: Amacco ca bhikkhū uposathaṃ akattukāme kiṃ karissāmīti rājānaṃ paṭipucchituṃ avisahatāya
anya-e0702n0:84_4: sayaṃ mūḷo hutvā aññena mūḷena manthetvā sace bhikkhusaṅgho uposathaṃ na kareyya,
anya-e0702n0:84_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ghātetukāmo mahārājāti sayaṃ mūḷo hutvā mūḷassa santikā mūḷavacanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:84_6: sutvā vihāraṃ gantvā uposathaṃ akattukāmaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ghātesi.
anya-e0702n0:85_0: Rājā ca taṃ sutvā ayaṃ bālo mayā anāṇattova hutvā īdisaṃ luddakammaṃ akāsi, ahaṃ
anya-e0702n0:85_1: pāpakammato muccissāmivā māvāti dvaḷakajāto hutvā mahāmoggaliputta tissattheraṃ gaṅgāya
anya-e0702n0:85_2: patisotato ānetvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ theraṃ pucchi. Thero ca dīpakatittirajātakena acetanatāya
anya-e0702n0:85_3: pāpakammato mocessasiti vissajjesi, sattāhampi titthiyānaṃ vādaṃ siridhammāsokarañño
anya-e0702n0:85_4: sikkhāpesi, vādena vādaṃ tulayitvā saṭṭhisahassamatte titthiye sāsanabāhiraṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:85_5: Tadā pana uposathaṃ akāsi. Bhagavatā vuttaniyāmeneva kathāvatthuñca bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
anya-e0702n0:85_6: byākāsi. Asokārāme ca sahassamattā mahātherā navahi māsehi saṅgāyiṃsuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:86_0: Tadā majjhimadese pāṭaliputtanagare siridhammāsokarañño rajjaṃ patvā aṭṭhārasavassāni
anya-e0702n0:86_1: ahesuṃ. Marammaraṭṭhe pana sirikhettanagare ramboṅkassanāma rañño rajjaṃ patvā dvādasa vassāni ahesunti.
anya-e0702n0:87_1: brahmalo kaṃ gantvā sāsanassa paggahaṇatthaṃ tissanāma mahābrahmānaṃ āyācita niyāmena
anya-e0702n0:87_2: tato cavitvā idha moggaliyānāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi nibbattasatto.
anya-e0702n0:88_0: Lābhasakkāraṃ apekkhitvā saṭṭhisahassamatānaṃ titthiyānaṃ samaṇālayaṃ katvā uposathapavāraṇādīsu
anya-e0702n0:88_1: kammesu pavesanaṃ parisāya asuddhattā sattavassāni uposathassa akaraṇañca sāsanassa
anya-e0702n0:88_2: paggahaṇe kāraṇameva. Mahāmoggaliputtatissa majjhantika mahārevappamukhā mahātherā
anya-e0702n0:89_0: Siridhammāsokarājā ca titthiyānaṃ vādaṃ sallakkhetvā titthiye bahisāsanakaraṇādīhi
anya-e0702n0:89_1: sāsanassa paggaho rājāti veditabbo. Mahāmoggaliputtatissa majjhintika mahārevappamukhānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:89_2: sahassamattānaṃ mahātherānaṃ sissaparamparā anekā honti, gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
anya-e0702n0:89_3: Yamettha ito paraṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Te pana mahātherā
anya-e0702n0:103_0: Tato paraṃ kattha sammāsambuddhassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahissatīti vimaṃsitvā
anya-e0702n0:103_2: navaṭṭhānāni jinasāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya visuṃ visuṃ mahāthere pesesi. Seyyathidaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:103_3: Mahāmahindattheraṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ pesesi-tvaṃ etaṃ dīpaṃ gantvā tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhapehīti,
anya-e0702n0:103_7: mahāraṭṭhaṃ, majjhimattheraṃ cīnaraṭṭhanti. Tattha ca upasampadapahonakena saṅghena
anya-e0702n0:103_8: saddhiṃ pesesi. Te ca mahātherā visuṃ visuṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ tattha tattha patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:103_9: Patiṭṭhāpetvā ca tesu tesu ṭhānesu bhikkhūnaṃ kāsāvapajjotena vijjotamānā abbhahimadhūrajorāhusaṅkhātehi
anya-e0702n0:103_10: vimatto viya nisānātho jinasāsanaṃ anantarāyaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n0:104_0: Tesu pana navasu ṭhānesu suvaṇṇabhūmināma adhunā sudhammanagarameva. Kasmā panetaṃ
anya-e0702n0:104_1: viññāyatīti ce. Maggānumānato ṭhānānumānato vā. Kathaṃ maggānumānato. Ito kira suvaṇṇabhūmi
anya-e0702n0:104_2: sattamattāni yojanasatāni honti, ekena vāte na gacchantī nāvā sattahi ahorattehi
anya-e0702n0:104_3: gacchati, athekasmiṃ samaye evaṃ gacchanti nāvā sattāhampi nadiyā vaṭṭamaccha piṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:104_4: neva gatāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttena sīhaḷadīpato suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gatamaggappamāṇena sukhammapurato
anya-e0702n0:104_5: sīhaḷadīpaṃ gatamaggappamāṇaṃ sameti. Sudhamme purato kira hi hiṃsaḷadīpaṃ sattamattāni
anya-e0702n0:104_6: yojanasatāni honti, ujuṃ vāyuāgamanakāle gacchanti vāyunāvā sattahi ahorattehi sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0702n0:105_0: Kathaṃ ṭhānānumānato. Suvaṇṇabhūmi kira mahāsamuddasamīpe tiṭṭhati, nānāverajjakānampi
anya-e0702n0:105_1: vāṇijānaṃ upasaṅkamanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ mahātitthaṃ hoti. Teneva mahājanakakumārādayo
anya-e0702n0:105_2: campānagarādito saṃvohāratthāya nāvāya suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ āgamaṃsūti. Sudhammapurampi
anya-e0702n0:105_3: adhunā mahāsamuddasamīpeyeva tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ ṭhānānumāsato viññāyatīti.
anya-e0702n0:106: Apare pana suvaṇṇabhūmināma haribhuñjaraṭṭhaṃyeva, tattha su vaṇṇassa bāhullattāti vadanti. Aññe pana siyāmaraṭṭhaṃyevāti vadanti. Taṃ sabbaṃ vimaṃsitabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:107_0: Aparantaṃ nāma visuṃ ekaraṭṭhamevāti apare vadanti. Aññe pana aparantaṃnāma sunāparantaraṭṭhamevāti
anya-e0702n0:107_1: vadanti. Taṃ yuttameva. Kasmā aparantaṃ nāma sunāparantaraṭṭhamevāti viññāyatīti
anya-e0702n0:107_2: ce. Aṭṭhakathāsu dvīhi nāmehi vuttattā. Uparipaṇṇāsaaṭṭhakathāyañhi saḷāyatanasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyañca
anya-e0702n0:107_4: dassantehi aparantaraṭṭhaṃ suna saddena yojetvā vuttaṃ. Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
anya-e0702n0:107_5: aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca tameva raṭṭhaṃ vinā sunasaddena vuttaṃ. Sunasaddo cettha
anya-e0702n0:107_6: puttapariyāyo. Mandhāturañño jeṭṭhaputto catuddīpavāsi no pakkositvā tesaṃ visuṃ
anya-e0702n0:107_7: visuṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ niyyādesi. Tattha uttaradīpavāsīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ kururaṭṭhaṃnāma, pubbadīpavāsīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:107_8: pana vedeharaṭṭhaṃnāma, pacchimadīpavāsīnaṃ aparantaṃ nāma. Bhattapacchimadīpe jātattā
anya-e0702n0:107_9: te sunasaddena vuttā. Tatra jātāpi hi tesaṃ puttātivā sunātivā vuttā, yathā vajjiputtakā
anya-e0702n0:107_10: bhikkhūti. Vatticchāvasena vā vācāsiliṭṭhavasena ca idameva sunasaddena visesetvā
anya-e0702n0:109_0: Vanavāsīraṭṭhaṃnāma sirikhettanagaraṭṭhānamo. Keci pana vanavāsīraṭṭhaṃnāma ekaṃ
anya-e0702n0:109_1: raṭṭhameva, na sirikhettanagaraṭṭhānanti vadanti. Taṃ na sundaraṃ. Sirikhettanagaraṭṭhānameva
anya-e0702n0:109_2: hi vanavāsīraṭṭhaṃ nāma. Kasmā panetaṃ viññāyatītice. Imassa amhākaṃ rañño bhātikarañño
anya-e0702n0:109_3: kāle sirikhettanagare gumbhehi paṭicchādite ekasmiṃ pathavipuñje anto nimmujjitvā
anya-e0702n0:109_4: ṭhitaṃ porāṇikaṃ ekaṃ lohamayabuddhapaṭipibbaṃ paṭilabhi, tassa ca pallaṅke idaṃ
anya-e0702n0:109_5: vanavāsīraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ pūjanatthāyātiādinā porāṇalekhanaṃ dissati, tasmā yevetaṃ viññāyatīti.
anya-e0702n0:110_0: Kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃnāma kasmīraraṭṭhaṃ gandhāraraṭṭhañca. Tāni pana raṭṭhāni ekābaddhāni
anya-e0702n0:110_1: hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Teneva majjhanti kattheraṃ ekaṃ dvīsu raṭṭhesu pesesi. Janapadattā
anya-e0702n0:110_2: pana napuṃsakekattaṃ bhavati. Tadā pana ekassa rañño āṇāya patiṭṭhānavisayattā ekattavacanena
anya-e0702n0:112: Mahāraṭṭhaṃnāma mahānagararaṭṭhaṃ. Ādhunā hi mahāraṭṭhameva na garasaddena yojetvā mahānagararaṭṭhanti voharantīti. Siyāmaraṭṭhantipi vadanti ācariyā.
anya-e0702n0:113: Cinaraṭṭhaṃnāma himavantena ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ cīnaraṭṭhaṃ ye vāti.
anya-e0702n0:114: Idaṃ sāsanassa navasu ṭhānesu visuṃ visuṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:115_0: Idāni ādito paṭṭhāya theraparamparakathā vattabbā. Sammāsambuddhassa hi bhagavato
anya-e0702n0:115_1: saddhivihāriko upālitthe ro,tassa sisso dāsakatthero, tassa sisso soṇakatthero, tassa
anya-e0702n0:115_2: sisso siggavatthero candavajjitthe ro ca, tesaṃ sisso moggaliputtatissattheroti ime
anya-e0702n0:115_3: pañcamahātherā sāsanavaṃse ādibhūtā ācariyaparamparānāma. Tesañhi sissaparamparabhūtā
anya-e0702n0:115_4: theraparamparā yāvajjatanā na upacchindhanti. Ācariyaparamparāya ca lajjibhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:115_5: yeva pavesetvā kathetabbā no alajjibhikkhū. Alajjībhikkhū nāma hi bahussutāpi samānā
anya-e0702n0:115_6: lābhagarulokagaruādihi dhammatanti nāsetvā sāsanavare mahābhayaṃ uppādentīti. Sāsanarakkhanakammaṃnāma
anya-e0702n0:115_7: hi lajjīnaṃyeva visayo no alajjīnaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā therā, anāgate sāsanaṃ ko nāma
anya-e0702n0:115_8: rakkhissatīti anupekkhitvā anāgate sāsanaṃ lajjino rakkhissanti, lajjino rakkhissanti,
anya-e0702n0:115_9: lajjino rakkhissantīti tikkhāttuṃ vācaṃ nicchāresuṃ. Evaṃ majjhimadesepi alajjīpuggalā
anya-e0702n0:116_0: Parinibbānato hi bhagavato vassasatānaṃ upari pubbe vuttanayeneva vajjiputtakā bhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:116_1: adhammavatthūni dīpetvā paṭhamasaṅgītikāle bahikatehi pāpabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ mantetvā
anya-e0702n0:116_2: sahāyaṃ gavesetvā mahāsaṅgītivohārena mahātherā viya saṅgītiṃ akaṃsu. Katvā ca visuṃ
anya-e0702n0:116_3: gaṇā ahesuṃ. Ahovata idaṃ hāsitabbakammaṃ, seyyathāpi nāma jarasiṅgālo catupadasāmaññena
anya-e0702n0:116_4: mānaṃ jappetvā attānaṃ sīhaṃ viya maññitvā sīho viya sīhanādaṃ nadīti. Te pāvacanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:116_5: yathā bhūtaṃ ajānitvā saddacchāyāmattena yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ nāma siṃsu. Kiñci pāvacanampī
anya-e0702n0:116_6: apanesuṃ. Tañca sakagaṇeyeva hoti, na dhammavādīgaṇe. Dhammavinayaṃ vikopetvā yathicchita
anya-e0702n0:116_7: vaseneva cariṃsu. Ayaṃ pana mahāsaṅgītināma eko adhammavādīgaṇo.
anya-e0702n0:117_0: Tato pacchā kālaṃ atikkante tatoyeva aññamaññaṃ vādato bhijjitvā gokulikonāma eko
anya-e0702n0:117_1: gaṇo ekabyohāronāma ekoti dve gaṇā bhijjiṃsu. Tato pacchā gokulikagaṇagaṇatoyeva
anya-e0702n0:117_2: aññamaññaṃ bhijjitvā bahussutikonāma eko gaṇo paññattivādonāma ekoti dve gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:117_3: Punapi tehiyeva gaṇehi cetiyavādonāma eko gaṇo bhijji.
anya-e0702n0:118_0: Tato pacchā cirakālaṃ atikkante dhammavādīgaṇehi visabhāgagaṇaṃ pavisitvā mahiṃsāsakonāma
anya-e0702n0:118_1: ekogaṇo vajjiputtakonāma ekoti dve gaṇā bhijjiṃsu. Tato pacchāpi vajjiputtakagaṇatoyeva
anya-e0702n0:118_2: aññamaññaṃ bhijjitvā dhammuttarikonāma eko gaṇo, bhaddayānikonāma eko, channāgārikonāma
anya-e0702n0:118_3: eko, samutikonāma ekoti cattāro gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:119: Punapi mahiṃsāsakagaṇato aññamaññaṃ bhijjitvā sabbatthivādonāma eko gaṇo, dhammaguttikonāma eko, kassapiyonāma eko, saṅkantikonāma eko, suttavādo nāma ekoti pañca gaṇā bhijjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:120_0: Evaṃ majjhimadese dutiyasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyantānaṃ mahātherānaṃ dhammavādītheravādagaṇato
anya-e0702n0:120_1: visuṃ visuṃ bhijjamānā adhammavādīgaṇā sattarasa ahesuṃ. Te ca adhammavādīgaṇā sāsane
anya-e0702n0:120_2: theraparamparāya ananto gadhā. Te hi sāsane upakārā na honti, theraparamparāya ca
anya-e0702n0:120_3: pavesetvā gaṇhituṃ na sakkā, yathā haṃsagaṇe bako, yathā ca go gaṇe gavajo, yathā
anya-e0702n0:121: Mahākassapattherādito pana āgatā theraparamparā upāli dāsako cevātiādinā parivārakhandhake samantapāsādikaṭṭhakathāyañca āgatanayeneva veditabbā.
anya-e0702n0:122_0: Upālittherādīnaṃ parisuddhācārādīni anumānetvā yāva moggaliputtatissattherā, tāva
anya-e0702n0:122_1: tesaṃ therānaṃ parisuddhā cārādīnīti sakkā ñātuṃ, seyyathāpi nadiyā uparisote meghavassāni
anya-e0702n0:122_2: anumānetvā adhosote nadiyā udakassa bāhullabhāvo viññātuṃ sakkāti ayaṃ kāraṇānumānanayo nāma.
anya-e0702n0:123_0: Yāva pana moggaliputtatissattherā, tāva therānaṃ parisuddhācārādīni anumānetvā upālittherassa
anya-e0702n0:123_1: parisuddhācārādīnīti sakkā ñātuṃ, seyyathāpi nāma uparidhūmaṃ passitvā anumānetvā
anya-e0702n0:123_2: aggi atthīti sakkā ñātunti ayaṃ phalānumānana yo nāma.
anya-e0702n0:124_0: Adibhūtassa pana upālittherassa avasānabhūtassa ca moggaliputtatissattherassa parisuddhācārādīni
anya-e0702n0:124_1: anumānetvā majjhe dāsakasoṇasiggavādīnaṃ therānaṃ parisuddhācārādīniti sakkā ñātuṃ,
anya-e0702n0:124_2: seyyathāpi nāma silāpaṭṭassa orabhāge pārabhāge ca migapadavaḷañjanaṃ disvā anumānetvā
anya-e0702n0:124_3: majjhe apākaṭaṃ padavaḷañcanaṃ atthīti sakkā ñātunti ayaṃ migapadavaḷañjana nayo nāma.
anya-e0702n0:125_0: Evaṃ tīhi nayehi ayaṃ theravādagaṇo dhammavādīlajjipesaloti veditabbo. Evamuparipi
anya-e0702n0:125_1: nayo netabbo. Theraparamparā ca yāva potthakāruḷā parivārakhandhake samanta pāsādikāyañca
anya-e0702n0:125_2: tato mahindo iṭṭiyotiādinā vutta nayena veditabbāti.
anya-e0702n0:129: 2. Idāni sīhaḷadīpasāsanakathāmaggaṃ vattuṃ okāso anuppatto, tasmā taṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n0:130_0: Sīhaḷadīpañhi sāsanassa patiṭṭhānabhūtattā cetiyagabbhasadisaṃ hoti. Sammāsambuddho
anya-e0702n0:130_1: kira sīhaḷadīpaṃ dharamānakālepi tikkhattuṃ agamāsi. Paṭhamaṃ yakkhānaṃ damanatthaṃ
anya-e0702n0:130_2: ekakova gantvā yakkhe dametvā mayi parinibbute sīhaḷadīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahissatīti
anya-e0702n0:130_3: tambapaṇṇidīpe ārakkhaṃ karonto tikkhattuṃ dīpaṃ āviñchi. Dutiyaṃ mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:130_4: nāgarā jūnaṃ damanatthāya ekakova gantvā te dametvā agamāsi. Tatiyaṃ pañcabhikkhusataparivāro
anya-e0702n0:130_5: gantvā mahācetiyaṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhipatiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne ca
anya-e0702n0:130_6: mahiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca mudiṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca dīghavāpi cetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇiyacetiyaṭṭhāne
anya-e0702n0:131_0: Tadā ca pana sāsanaṃ ogāhetvāna tāva tiṭṭhati. Pacchā pana yathāvuttattheraparamparāya
anya-e0702n0:131_1: samabhiniviṭṭhena mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena pesito mahindatthero jinacakke pañcatiṃsādhike
anya-e0702n0:131_2: dvisate sampatte dutiyakattikamāse iṭṭiyena uttiyena sambulena bhaddasālena cāti
anya-e0702n0:131_3: etehi therehi saddhiṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ agamāsi. Soṇuttarattherādayo jinacakke pañcatiṃsādhike
anya-e0702n0:131_4: dvisate sampatte dutiyakattikamāseyeva sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya attano attano
anya-e0702n0:132_0: Mahāmahindatthero pana sattamāsāni āgametvā jinacakke chattiṃsādhike dvisate sampatte
anya-e0702n0:132_1: jeṭṭhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya agamāsi. Teneva
anya-e0702n0:132_2: tesu navasu ṭhānesu sīhaḷadīpaṃ chattiṃsādhike dvisa te agamāsi. Aññāni pana aṭṭha
anya-e0702n0:133_0: Kasmā pana mahāmahindatthero sattamāsāni āgametvā sabbapacchā sīhaḷadīpaṃ gacchatīti.
anya-e0702n0:133_1: Sīhaḷadīpe muṭabhivo nāma rājā jarādubbalo ahoti, sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ asamattho, tassa
anya-e0702n0:133_2: pana putto devānaṃ piya tisso nāma rājakumāro daharo sāsanaṃ paggahetuṃ samattho
anya-e0702n0:133_3: bhavissati, so ca devānaṃ viyatisso rajjaṃ tāva labhatu vedissakagirinagare mātuyā
anya-e0702n0:133_4: saddhiṃ ñātake tāva passāmīti apekkhitvā sattamāsāni āgametvā chattiṃsādhikadvisateyeva
anya-e0702n0:134_0: Mahāmahindatthero ca iṭṭiyādīhi therehi catūhi bhāgineyyena sumanasāmaṇerena bhaṇḍukena
anya-e0702n0:134_1: nāma upāsake na cāti etehi saddhiṃ chattiṃsādhike dvisate jinacakke jeṭṭhamāsapuṇṇamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:134_2: suvaṇṇahaṃsā viya jeṭṭhamāse nabhaṃ uggantvā ākāsamaggena anurādhapurassa puratthimadisābhāge
anya-e0702n0:135_0: Jeṭṭhamāsassa ca puṇṇamiyaṃ laṅkādīpe jeṭṭhamūlanakkhattasabhā hutvā manussā chaṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:135_1: akaṃsu. Tenevāha sāratthadīpaniyaṃ nāma vinayaḍīkāyaṃ, jeṭṭhamāsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ jeṭṭhanakkhattaṃ
anya-e0702n0:135_2: mūlanakkhattaṃ vā hotīti. Tattha ca puṇṇaminakkhattaṃ rājamattante puṇṇaminakkhattavicāraṇanayena
anya-e0702n0:136_0: Devānaṃ piya tisso ca rājā nakkhattaṃ nāma ghosāpetvā chaṇaṃ kārethāti amacce āṇāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:136_1: cattālī sapurisasahassaparivāro nagaramhā nikkhamitvā yena missa kapabbato, tena
anya-e0702n0:136_2: pāyāsi migavaṃ kīḷitukāmo. Atha tasmiṃ pabbate adhivatthā ekā devatā migarūpena rājānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:137_0: Thero rājānaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā mamaṃyeva rājā passatu mā itareti adhiṭṭhahitvā tissa
anya-e0702n0:137_1: tissa ito ehīti āha. Rājā taṃ sutvā cintesi, imasmiṃ dīpe jāto sakalopi manusso maṃ
anya-e0702n0:137_2: tissoti nāmaṃ gahetvā ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi, ayaṃ pana bhinnabhinnapaṭadharo
anya-e0702n0:137_3: bhaṇḍukāsāva vasano maṃ nāmena ālapati, ko nukho ayaṃ bhavissati, manusso vā amanusso vāti. Thero āha,–
anya-e0702n0:140_0: Tadā ca devānaṃ piyatisso rājā asokaraññā pesitena abhisekena ekamāsābhisitto ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:140_1: Visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ hissa abhisekamakaṃsu. So ca asokaraññā pesite dhammapaṇṇākāre
anya-e0702n0:140_2: ratanattayaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sāsanappavattiṃ acirasutaṃ anussaramāno taṃ therassa
anya-e0702n0:140_3: samaṇā mayaṃ mahārāja, dhammarājassa sāvakāti vacanaṃ sutvā ayyā nukho āgatāti tāvadeva
anya-e0702n0:140_4: āvudhaṃ nikkhipitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno. Yathāha,–
anya-e0702n0:143_0: Sammodanīyaṃ kathañca kurumāneyeva tasmiṃ tānipi cattālīsapurisasahassāni āgantvā
anya-e0702n0:143_1: samparivāresuṃ. Tadāthero itarepi cha jane dassesi. Rājā disvā ime kadā āgatāti āha.
anya-e0702n0:143_2: Mayā saddhiṃyeva mahārājāti. Idāni pana jambudīpe aññepi evarūpā samaṇā santīti.
anya-e0702n0:143_3: Santi mahārāja etarahijambudīpo kālāvapajjoto isivātapaṭivāto, tasmiṃ–
anya-e0702n0:146_0: Bhante kena āgatatthāti. Neva mahārāja udakena, na thalenāti. Rājā ākāsena āgatāti
anya-e0702n0:146_1: aññāsi. Thero atthi nukho rañño passāveyyattikanti vīmaṃsanatthāya āsannaṃ ambarukkhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:147_0: Kinnāmo mahārāja ayaṃ rukkhoti. Ambarukkho nāma bhanteti. Imaṃ pana mahārāja ambaṃ
anya-e0702n0:147_1: muñcitvā añño ambo atthi vā natthi vāti. Atthi bhante aññepi bahū ambarukkhāti. Imañca
anya-e0702n0:147_2: ambaṃ te ca ambe muñcitvā atthi nukho mahārāja aññe rukkhāti. Atthi bhante, te pana
anya-e0702n0:147_3: na ambarukkhāti. Aññe ca ambe anambe ca muñcitvā atthi pana añño rukkhoti. Ayameva
anya-e0702n0:147_4: bhante amba rukkhoti. Sādhu mahārāja paṇḍitosīti.
anya-e0702n0:148_0: Atthi pana mahārāja te ñātakāti. Atthi bhante bahūjanāti. Te muñcitvā keci aññātakāpi
anya-e0702n0:148_1: atthi mahārājāti. Aññātakā bhante ñātakehi bahutarāti. Tavañātake ca aññātake ca
anya-e0702n0:148_2: muñcitvā atthañño koci mahārājāti. Ahameva bhanteti. Sādhu mahārāja attā nāma attano
anya-e0702n0:149_0: Atha thero paṇḍito rājā sakkhissati dhammaṃ aññātunti cūḷahatthipadopamasuttaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0702n0:149_1: Kathāpariyosāne rājā tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhahi saddhiṃ cattālīsāya pāṇasahassehīti.
anya-e0702n0:149_2: Tato paraṃ yaṃ yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ taṃ samantapāsādikādīsu vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:150_0: Iccevaṃ sīhaḷadīpe sāsanānuggahaṇa mahindattherato āgatā sissaparamparā bahū honti,
anya-e0702n0:150_1: gaṇanapathaṃ vīti vattā. Kathaṃ. Mahāmahindattherassa sisso ariṭṭho nāma thero, tassa
anya-e0702n0:150_2: sisso tissadatto, tassa sisso kāḷasumano, tassa sisso dīgho, tassa sisso dīgha sumano,
anya-e0702n0:150_3: tassa sisso kāḷasumano, tassa sisso nāgo, tassa sisso buddharakkhito, tassa sisso
anya-e0702n0:150_4: tisso, tassa sisso revo, tassa sisso sumano, tassa sisso cūḷanāgo, tassa sisso dhammapāli
anya-e0702n0:150_5: etā, tassa sisso khemo, tassa sisso upalisso, tassa sisso phussadevo, tassa sisso
anya-e0702n0:150_6: sumano, tassa sisso mahāpadumo, tassa sisso mahāsīvo, tassa sisso upāli, tassa sisso
anya-e0702n0:150_7: mahānāgo, tassa sisso abhayo, tassa sisso tisso, tassa sisso sumano, tassa sisso
anya-e0702n0:150_8: cūḷābhayo, tassa sisso tisso, tassa sisso cūḷadevo, tassa sisso sīvoti. Ayaṃ yāva
anya-e0702n0:151: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ,– yāvajjabhanā tesaṃyeva antevāsikaparamparabhūtāya ācariyaparamparāya ābhatantiti veditabbanti.
anya-e0702n0:152: Evaṃ tesaṃ sissaparamparabhūtā ācariyaparamparā yāvajjatanā sāsane pākaṭā hutvā āgacchantīti veditabba.
anya-e0702n0:153_0: Sāsane vinayadharehi nāma tilakkhaṇasampannehi bhavitabbaṃ. Tīṇi hi vinayadharassa
anya-e0702n0:153_1: lakkhaṇāni icchi tabbāni. Katamāni tīṇi. Suttañcassa svāgataṃ hoti suppavatti suvinicchitaṃ
anya-e0702n0:153_2: suttato anubyañjanatoti idamekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṃhīroti
anya-e0702n0:153_3: idaṃ dutiyaṃ, ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā supadhāritāti idaṃ tatiyaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:154_0: Tattha ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti theraparamparā vaṃsaparamparā
anya-e0702n0:154_1: cassa suṭṭhugahitā hoti. Sumanasikatāti suṭṭhu manasikatā, āvajjitamatte ñajjali
anya-e0702n0:155_0: Supadhāritāti suṭṭhu upadhāritā, pubbāparānusandhito atthato kāraṇato ca upa dhāritā.
anya-e0702n0:155_1: Attano matiṃ pahāya ācariyasuddhiyā vattā hoti, mayhaṃ ācariyo asukācariyassa santike
anya-e0702n0:155_2: uggaṇhi, so asukassāti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ thera vādaṅgaṃ āharitvā yāva
anya-e0702n0:155_3: upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhīti pāpetvā ṭhapeti. Tatopi āharitvā
anya-e0702n0:155_4: upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhi, dāsakatthero attano upajjhāyassa upālittherassa,
anya-e0702n0:155_5: soṇakatthero attano upajjhāyassa dosakattherassa, siggavatthero attano upajjhāyassa
anya-e0702n0:155_6: soṇakattherassa, moggaliputtatissatthero attano upajjhāyassa siggavattherassa caṇḍa
anya-e0702n0:155_7: vajjittherassa cāti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā attano ācariyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:155_8: pāpetvā ṭhapeti. Evaṃ uggahitā hi ācariyaparamparā suggahitā hoti.
anya-e0702n0:156: Evaṃ asakkontena pana dve tayo parivaṭṭā uggahetabbā. Sabbapacchimena hi nayena yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripuñchañca vadanti, tathā ñātuṃ vattatīti.
anya-e0702n0:157_0: Yathā vuttattheraparamparā pana bhagavato dharamānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva potthakāruḷā
anya-e0702n0:157_1: mukhapāṭheneva piṭakattayaṃ dhāresuṃ, paripuṇṇaṃ pana katvā potthake likhitvā na
anya-e0702n0:157_2: ṭhapenti. Evaṃ mahātherā dukkarakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhiṃsu. Tatridaṃ vatthu,–
anya-e0702n0:158_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kira caṇḍālatissabhayena saṅkhubbhitvā devo ca avassitvā dubbhikkhabhayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:158_1: uppajji. Tadā akko devānamindo āgantvā tumhe bhante piṭakaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkhissatha,
anya-e0702n0:158_2: nāvaṃ pana ārūhitvā jambudīpaṃ gacchatha, sace nāvā appahonakā bhaveyya, kaṭṭhena
anya-e0702n0:158_3: vā veḷunā vā taratha, abhayatthāya pana mayaṃ rakkhissāmāti āha.
anya-e0702n0:159_0: Tadā saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū samuddatīraṃ gantvā puna etadahosi,– mayaṃ jambudīpaṃ na
anya-e0702n0:159_1: gacchissāma, idheva vasitvā tepiṭakaṃ dhārissāmāti. Tato pacchā nāvā titthato nivattitvā
anya-e0702n0:159_2: sīhaḷadīpekadesaṃ malayajanapadaṃ gantvā mūlaphalādīhiyeva yāpetvā sajjhāyaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:159_3: Chātakabhayena atipīḷitā hutvā evampi kātuṃ asakkonto vāḷukatale uraṃ ṭhapetvā sīsena
anya-e0702n0:159_4: sīsaṃ abhimukhaṃ katvā vācaṃ anicchāretvā manasāyeva akaṃsu. Evaṃ dvādasavassāni
anya-e0702n0:159_5: saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya tepiṭakaṃ rakkhitvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:160_0: Dvādasavassesu pana atikkantesu taṃ bhayaṃ vūpasamitvā pubbe jambudīpaṃ gacchantā
anya-e0702n0:160_1: sattabhikkhusatā āgantvā sīhaḷadīpekadesaṃ rāmajanapade maṇḍalārāmavihāraṃ āpajjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:160_2: Tepi saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū tameva vihāraṃ gantvā aññamaññaṃ sammantetvā sajjhāyiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:160_3: Tadā aññamaññaṃ samenti, na virujjhanti, gaṅgādakena viya yamunodakaṃ saṃsandenti.
anya-e0702n0:160_4: Evaṃ piṭakattayaṃ mukhapāṭheneva dhāretvā mahātherā dukkarakammaṃ karontīti veditabbā.
anya-e0702n0:161: Yampi pariyattiṃ ekapadamattampi avirajjhitvā dhārenti, taṃ dukkarakammameva.
anya-e0702n0:162_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kira punabbasukassa nāma kuṭumbikassa putto tissatthero buddhavacanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:162_1: uggaṇhitvā imaṃ jambudīpaṃ āgantvā yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa santike buddhavacanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:162_2: uggaṇhitvā gacchanto nāvaṃ abhirūhanatitthe ekasmiṃ pade uppannakaṅkho yojanasatamaggaṃ
anya-e0702n0:162_3: nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge ekassa kuṭumbikassa pañhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:162_4: kathesi. So pasīditvā satasahassagghanakaṃ kampalaṃ adāsi. Sopi taṃ āharitvā ācariyassa
anya-e0702n0:162_5: adāsi. Thero vā siyā koṭṭetvā nisīdanaṭṭhāne paribhaṇḍaṃ kāresi. Kimatthāyāti. Pacchimāya
anya-e0702n0:162_6: janatāya anuggahatthāya. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi,– amhākaṃ gatamaggaṃ āvajjitvā anāgate
anya-e0702n0:162_7: sabrahmacārino paṭipattiṃ pūretabbaṃ maññissantīti. Tissattheropi ācariyassa santike
anya-e0702n0:162_8: kaṅkhaṃ chinditvā sīhaḷadīpameva sakaṭṭhānaṃ āgamāsīti. Iccevaṃ pariyattiṃ ekapadamattampi
anya-e0702n0:163: Yampi yebhuyyena paguṇaṃ na karonti, tassa anantaradhānatthāya asammosatthāya uggahadhāraṇādivasena rakkhanampi karonti, taṃ dukkarakammameva.
anya-e0702n0:164_0: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva kira mahābhaye ekasseva bhikkhuno mahāniddeso paguṇo ahosi. Atha catunikāyikatissattherassa
anya-e0702n0:164_1: upajjhāyo mahātipiṭakatthero nāma mahārakkhitattheraṃāha,– āvuso mahārakkhita asukassa
anya-e0702n0:164_2: santike mahāniddesaṃ gaṇhāhīti. Pāpokirāyaṃ bhante na gaṇhāmīti. Gaṇhāvuso ahaṃ te
anya-e0702n0:164_3: santike nisīdissāmīti. Sādhu bhante tumhesu nisinnesu gaṇhissāmīti paṭṭhapatvā rattindivaṃ
anya-e0702n0:164_4: nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇanto osānadivase heṭṭhāmañce itthiṃ disvā bhante sutaṃyeva me
anya-e0702n0:164_5: pubbe, sacāhaṃ evaṃ jāneyyaṃ, na īdisassa santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇeyyanti āha. Tassa
anya-e0702n0:164_6: pana santike bahū mahātherā uggaṇhitvā mahāniddesaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Evaṃ yaṃ yebhuyyena
anya-e0702n0:164_7: paguṇaṃ na karonti, tassa anantaradhānatthāya asammosattāya uggahadhāraṇādivasena
anya-e0702n0:165_0: Iccevaṃ bhagavato dharamānakālato pabhuti cirakālaṃ yathāvuttamahātheraparamparā
anya-e0702n0:165_1: pariyattiṃ mukhapāṭheneva dhāresuṃ. Ahovata porāṇikānaṃ mahātherānaṃ satipaññāsamādhivepullatāya
anya-e0702n0:165_2: hi te mukhapāṭheneva dhāretu sakkāti. Mukhapāṭheneva porāṇakattherānaṃ pariyattidhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:166_0: Bhagavato parinibbānato mahāvaṃsasāratthasaṅgahesu āgatanayena jinacakke paṇṇāssādhike
anya-e0702n0:166_1: catusate sampatte tambapaṇṇidīpe rājūnaṃ aṭṭhārasamako’saddhātissassa nāma rañño
anya-e0702n0:166_2: putto vaṭṭagāmaṇi nāma rājā rajjaṃ patvā chavassakāle anāgate sattā hīnasatipaññāsamādhikā
anya-e0702n0:166_3: hutvā na sakkhissanti mukhapāṭhena dhāretunti upaparikkhitvā pubbe vuttehi mahātherehi
anya-e0702n0:166_4: anupubbena āgatā pañcamattā mahātherasatā vaṭṭagāmaṇirājānaṃ nissāya tambapaṇṇidīpekadese
anya-e0702n0:166_5: malayajanapade ālokaleṇe aṭṭhakathāya sahapiṭakattayaṃ potthake āropesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:167: Tañca yathāvuttasaṅgītiyo upanidhāya catutthasaṅgītiyeva nāmāti veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ sāratthadīpaniyaṃ nāma vinayaṭīkāyaṃ,– catutthasaṅgītisadisā hi potthakārohasaṅgītīti.
anya-e0702n0:168_0: Sīhaḷadīpe pana vaṭṭagāmaṇirājā marammaraṭṭhe sirikhettanagare eko nāma kukkuṭasīsarājā
anya-e0702n0:168_1: ca ekakālena rajjaṃ kāresi. Amarapuramāpakassa rañño kāle sīhaḷadīpabhikkhuhi idha
anya-e0702n0:168_2: pesitasandesakathāyaṃ pana tettiṃsādhikacatusate sampatte potthakāruḷaṃ akaṃsūti
anya-e0702n0:171_0: Athāparaṃ jambudīpe sīhaḷadīpe ca bhikkhū visuṃ visuṃ gaṇavasena bhijjiṃsu, yathā
anya-e0702n0:171_1: anotattadahato nikkhamananadiyā gaṅgāyamunādivasena bhijjantīti. Tattha jambudīpe
anya-e0702n0:172_0: Sīhaḷadīpe pana gaṇānaṃ bhijjamānatā evaṃ daṭṭhabbā. Kathaṃ. Sīhaḷadīpe hi sāsanassa
anya-e0702n0:172_1: patiṭṭhamānakālato aṭṭhārasādhi kadvivassasate sampatte vaṭṭagāmaṇiraññā kārāvite
anya-e0702n0:172_2: abhayagirivihāre parivārakhandhakaṃ pāṭhato ca atthato ca vipallāsaṃ katvā mahāvihāravāsigaṇato
anya-e0702n0:172_3: puthu hutvā eko gaṇo bhijji, so abhayagirivāsigaṇo nāma, dhammarucigaṇoti ca tasseva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:173_1: nāma raññā kārāpite jetavanavihāre bhikkhū ubhatovisaṅgapāṭhe viparītavasena abhisaṅkharitvā
anya-e0702n0:173_2: abhayagirivāsigaṇato visuṃ eko gaṇo ahosi, so jetavanavāsigaṇo nāma, sāgaliyagaṇoti ca tasseva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:174_0: Jetavana vāsigaṇassa bhijjamānakālato ekapaññāsavassādhikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassasatānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:174_1: upari kurundavāsino ca kolambavāsino ca bhikkhū bhāgineyyaṃ dāṭhāpatiṃ nāma rājānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:174_3: dvīhi gaṇehi visuṃ hutvā mahāvihāra vāsigaṇhattamaṃ tulayitvā upadhāretvā mahāvihāranāmaṃ
anya-e0702n0:174_4: gahetvā eko gaṇo bhijji. Evaṃ sīhaḷadīpe mahāmahindattherādīnaṃ vaṃsabhūtena mahāvihāravāsi
anya-e0702n0:175_0: Tattha mahāvihāravāsi gaṇoyeva eko dhammavādī ahosi, sesā pana adhammavādino. Te
anya-e0702n0:175_1: ca tayo adhammavādino gaṇā bhūtatthaṃ pahāya abhūtatthena dhammaṃ agaruṃ katvā cariṃsūti
anya-e0702n0:175_2: vacanato sīhaḷadīpe adhammavādino tayopi alajjino gaṇā parimaṇḍalasuppaṭicchannādisikkhāpadāni
anya-e0702n0:175_3: anādiyitvā vicariṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya sāsane ekaccānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nānappakāravasena
anya-e0702n0:176_0: Adhammavādigaṇānaṃ bhijjamānakālato sattavīsādhikānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ vassānañca upari
anya-e0702n0:176_1: sirisaṅghabodhi nāma rājā mahāvihāra gaṇassa pakkho hutvā adhammavādinā tayo gaṇe
anya-e0702n0:176_2: niggahitvā jinasāsanaṃ paggahesi. So ca sirisaṅgha bodhirājā amhākaṃ marammaraṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:176_3: arimandananagare anuruddhena nāma raññā samakālavasena rajjasampattiṃ anubhavi.
anya-e0702n0:177_0: Tato pacchā sīhaḷadīpe vohārakatissassa nāma rañño kāle kapilena nāma amaccena saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:177_1: mantetvā mahāvihāra vāsino bhikkhū nissāya adhammavādigaṇe niggaṇhitvā jinasāsanaṃ paggaṇhāti.
anya-e0702n0:178: Tato pacchā ca goṭṭhābhayassa nāma rañño kāle abhayagiri vāsino bhikkhū parasamuddaṃ pabbājetvā mahāvihāra vāsino bhikkhū nissāya sāsanaṃ visodhayi.
anya-e0702n0:179_0: Tato pacchāpi goṭṭhābhayarañño puttabhūtassa mahāsenassa nāma rañño kāle abhayagirivāsīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:179_1: bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare saṅghamitto nāma eko bhikkhu rañño padhānācariyo hutvā mahāmahindattherādīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:179_2: arahantānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ mahāvihārārāmaṃ vinassituṃ mahāsenaraññā mantetvā
anya-e0702n0:179_3: ārabhi. Tadā navavassāni mahāvihāre bhikkhu sañño ahosi. Ahovata mahātherānaṃ mahiddhikānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:179_4: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ alajjino bhikkhū vinassāpesuṃ, suvaṇṇahaṃssānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ kākā viyāti.
anya-e0702n0:180_0: Jetavanavāsīnañca bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare eko tisso nāma bhikkhu teneva raññā mantetvā
anya-e0702n0:180_1: mahāvihāre sīmaṃ samūhani. Achekattā pana tesaṃ sīmasamūhanakammaṃ na sampajjīti.
anya-e0702n0:180_2: Ahovata dussīlānaṃ pāpakānaṃ kammaṃ acchariyaṃ, seyyathāpi nāma sākhamigo aggaggho
anya-e0702n0:180_3: kāsivatthaṃ mahagghaṃ bhinnati, evameva bhinditabbavatthunā bhedakapuggalo ativiya
anya-e0702n0:187_0: Iccevaṃ adhammavādigaṇānaṃ balavatāya dhammavādigaṇo parihāyati. Yathā hi gijjhasakuṇassa
anya-e0702n0:187_1: pakkhavātena suvaṇṇahaṃsā pakatiyā ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti, evameva adhammavādīnaṃ balavatāya
anya-e0702n0:187_2: dhammavādī parihāyati. Byagghavane viya suvaṇṇamigo nillayitvā gocaraṃ gaṇhāti, yathārucivasena
anya-e0702n0:188_0: Sīhaḷadīpe sāsanassa patiṭṭhānato dvisattatādhikānaṃ catusatānaṃ vassasahassānañca
anya-e0702n0:188_1: upari sammāsambuddhassa parinibbānato aṭṭhasattasatādhikānaṃ vassasahassānaṃ upari
anya-e0702n0:188_2: mahārājā nāma bhūpālo rajjaṃ kāresi. So pana rājā ñadumbaragirivāsikassapattheraggamukhā
anya-e0702n0:188_3: mahāvihāravāsino bhikkhū tameva rājānaṃ nissāya sāsane malaṃ visodhesuṃ, yathā heraññiko hiraññe malanti.
anya-e0702n0:189_0: Mahāvihāravāsigaṇato aññe adhammavādinā uppabbā jetvā visodhesuṃ. So ca mahārājā
anya-e0702n0:189_1: amhākaṃ marammaraṭṭhe arimaddananagare narapaticaññisūnā nāma raññā samakāla vasena
anya-e0702n0:190_0: Tato pacchā vi vijayabāhurājānaṃ parakkamabāhurājānañca nissāya mahāvihāra vāsino
anya-e0702n0:190_1: bhikkhū sāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ akaṃsu, adhammavādino sabbepi uppabbājetvā mahāvihāravāsigaṇoyeva
anya-e0702n0:190_2: eko patiṭṭhahi, yathā abbhādiupakkilesamalehi vimutto nisānāthoti.
anya-e0702n0:191_0: Sirisaṅghabodhirājā vohārikatissarājā goṭṭhābhayarājāti ete rājāno sāsanaṃ visodhentopi
anya-e0702n0:191_1: sabbena sabbaṃ adhammavādigaṇānaṃ avinassanato sāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ na tāva ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:191_2: Sirisaṅghabodhirañño mahārañño vijayabāhurañño parakkamabāhuraññoti etesaṃyeva rājūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:191_3: kāle sabbena sabbaṃ adhammavādīnaṃ vinassanato sāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ ahosi. Tadā pana
anya-e0702n0:191_4: adhammavādinā sīsampi uṭṭhahituṃ na sakkā, yathā aruṇugge kosiyāti.
anya-e0702n0:192_0: Aparabhāge pana ciraṃ kālaṃ atikkante micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vijātiyānaṃ bhayena laṅkādīpe
anya-e0702n0:192_1: sāsanaṃ osakkitvā gaṇapūraṇamattassapi bhikkhusaṅghassa avijjamānatāya mahāvijayabāhurañño
anya-e0702n0:192_2: kāle rāmaññadesato saṅghaṃ ānetvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:193_0: Tato pacchā ca vimaladhammasūriyassa nāma rañño kāle rakkhāpuraraṭṭhato saṅghaṃ ānetvā
anya-e0702n0:193_1: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Tato pacchā ca vimalassa nāma rañño kāle tatoyeva saṅghaṃ ānetvā
anya-e0702n0:193_2: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Tato pacchā ca kittissirirājasīhassa nāma rañño kāle syāmaraṭṭhato
anya-e0702n0:195_0: Tato pacchā jinasāsane navutādhike aṭṭhavassasate sampatte buddhadāsassa nāma rañño
anya-e0702n0:195_1: kāle eko dhamma kathikatthero ṭhapetvā vinayapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakañca avasesaṃ
anya-e0702n0:195_2: suttantapiṭakaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya parivattitvā abhisaṅkharitvā ṭhapesi. Tañca kāraṇaṃ cūḷavaṃse vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:196_0: Tassa kira buddhadāsassa rañño puttā asītimattā asītimahāsāvakānaṃ nāmeneva vohāritā
anya-e0702n0:196_1: ahesuṃ. Tesu puttesu sāriputtattherassa nāmena vohārito eko upatisso nāma rājakumāro
anya-e0702n0:197_0: Tato pacchā kaniṭṭho mahānāmo nāma rājakumāro dvāvīsavassāni rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa
anya-e0702n0:197_1: rañño kāle jina cakke tettiṃsādhikanavasatavasse sīhaḷadīpe chasaṭṭhimattānaṃ rājūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:197_2: pūraṇakāle buddhaghoso nāma thero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā sīhaḷabhāsāya likhite aṭṭhakathāganthe
anya-e0702n0:198_0: So pana mahānāma rājā amhākaṃ marammaraṭṭhe siripaccayanagare savilaññikrovi nāmakena
anya-e0702n0:198_1: raññā samakālo hutvā rajjaṃ kāresi. Parittaniddāne pana brūmavi?Thī? Nāmakena raññā
anya-e0702n0:198_2: samakālo hutvā rajjaṃ kāresīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0702n0:199_0: Sīhaḷadīpe pana kittissirimegho nāma rājā hutvā navame vasse tasmiṃyeva dīpe rājūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:199_1: dvāsaṭṭhimattānaṃ pūraṇakāle jinacakke tiṃsādhike aṭṭhasatavasse jambudīpe kaliṅgapurato
anya-e0702n0:199_2: kuhasivassa nāma rañño jāmātā dantakumāro hemamālaṃ nāma rājadhītaṃ gahetvā dāṭhādhātuṃ
anya-e0702n0:199_3: thenetvā navāya taritvā sīhaḷadīpaṃ agamāsi. Jinacakke tiṃsādhikaaṭṭhavassasate jeṭṭhatissarājā
anya-e0702n0:200: Buddhadāsarājā ekūnatiṃsati vassāni upalissarājā cadvicattālīsavassāni mahānāmarājā dvāvīsavassānīti sabbāni sampiṇḍitvā jinasāsanaṃ dvattiṃsādhikanavavassasatappamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0702n0:201: Tasmiñca kāle yadā dvīhi vassehi ūnaṃ ahosi, tadā mahānāmarañño kāle tiṃsādhikanavavassasatamatte sāsane buddhaghoso nāma thero laṅkādīpaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n0:202: Amarapuramāpakassa rañño kāle sīhaḷadīpikehi bhikkhūhi pesitasannesapaṇṇe pana chapaṇṇāsādhikanavavassasatātikkante sūti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:203_0: Ettha ṭhatvā buddhaghosattherassa aṭṭhuppattiṃsaṅkhepamattaṃ vakkhāma. Kathaṃ. Sīhaḷabhāsakkharehi
anya-e0702n0:203_1: parivattitaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ māgadhasāsakkharena ko nāma puggalo parivattituṃ sakkhissatīti
anya-e0702n0:203_2: mahātherā nimantayitvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā ghosaṃ devaputtaṃ disvā saddhiṃ sakkena
anya-e0702n0:203_3: devānamindena taṃ yācitvā bodhirukkhasamīpe ghosagāme kesassa nāma brāhmaṇassa kesiyā
anya-e0702n0:203_4: nāma brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāpesuṃ. Khādatha bhonto pivatha bhontotiādinā
anya-e0702n0:203_5: brāhmaṇānaṃ aññamaññaṃ ghosakāle vijāyanattā ghosoti nāmaṃ akāsi. Sattavassikakāle
anya-e0702n0:204_0: Atha kho ekena arahantena saddhiṃ vedakathaṃ sallapanto taṃ kathaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā kusalā
anya-e0702n0:204_1: dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammātiādinā paramatthavedaṃ nāma buddhamantaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0702n0:204_2: Tadā so sutvā uggaṇhitukāmo hutvā tassa arahantassa santike pabbajitvā devasikaṃ
anya-e0702n0:204_3: devasikaṃ piṭakattayaṃ saṭṭhimattehi padasahassehi sajjhāyaṃ akāsi, vācuggataṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:205_0: Tato paccā raho ekakova nisinnassa etadahosi,– buddhabhāsite piṭakattaye mama vā
anya-e0702n0:205_1: paññā adhikā, udāhu upajjhāyassa vāti. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā upajjhācariyo niggahaṃ katvā
anya-e0702n0:205_2: ovadi. So saṃvegappatto hutvā khamāpetuṃ vandi. Upajjhācariyo tvaṃ āvuso sīhaḷadīpaṃ
anya-e0702n0:205_3: gantvā piṭakattayaṃ sīhaḷassāsakkharena likhitaṃ māgadhabhāsakkharena likhāhi, evaṃ
anya-e0702n0:206_0: Buddhaghoso ca pitaraṃ micchādiṭṭhibhāvato mocetvā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sirasā paṭiggahetvā
anya-e0702n0:206_1: piṭakattayaṃ likhituṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ nāvāya agamāsi. Tadā samuddamajjhe tīhi divasehi
anya-e0702n0:206_2: tarante buddhadattatthero ca sīhaḷadīpato nāvāya āgacchanto antarāmagge devāna ānubhāvena
anya-e0702n0:206_3: aññamaññaṃ passitvā kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā jāni. Jānitvā ca buddhadattatthero evamāha,-
anya-e0702n0:206_4: mayā āvuso kato jinālaṅkāro appassāroti maññitvā piṭakattayaṃ parivattituṃ likhituṃ
anya-e0702n0:206_5: okāsaṃ nādāsuṃ, tvaṃ pana piṭakattayaṃ saṃvaṇṇehīti vatvā attano sakkena devānamindena
anya-e0702n0:206_6: dinnaṃ haritakiphalaṃ ayomayalekhana daṇḍaṃ nisitasilañca buddhaghosattherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:206_7: Evaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ therānaṃ aññamaññaṃ sallapantānaṃyeva nāvā sayameva apanetvā gacchiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:207_0: Buddhaghosatthero ca sīhaḷadīpaṃ patvā paṭhamaṃ saṅghapālattheraṃ passitvā piṭakattayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:207_1: māgadhabhāsakkharena parivattetuṃ āgatomhīti kāraṇaṃ ārocetvā sīhaḷabhikkhū ca sīle
anya-e0702n0:207_2: patiṭṭhāyātiādigāthaṃ niyyādetvā imissā gāthāya atthaṃ piṭakattayaṃ āloletvā saṃvaṇṇehīti
anya-e0702n0:207_3: uyyojesuṃ, tasmiṃyeva divase sāyanhakālato paṭṭhāya yathāvuttagāthaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā
anya-e0702n0:207_4: visuddhimaggaṃ akāsi. Katvā taṃ kammaṃ nipphādetvā tassa ñāṇappabhavaṃ vīmaṃsetukāmo
anya-e0702n0:207_5: devānamindo tañca ganthaṃ antaradhāpesi. Punāpi thero akāsi. Tatheva devānamindo
anya-e0702n0:207_6: antaradhāpesi. Punāpi thero akāsi. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ kārāpetvā pubbaganthepi dassesi.
anya-e0702n0:207_7: Tiṇṇampi ganthānaṃ aññamaññaṃ ekapadamattenapi visesatā natthi saṅghapālatthero ca
anya-e0702n0:207_8: taṃ ārādhayitvā piṭakattayaṃ niyyādesi. Evaṃ visuddhimagge saṅghapālattherassa yācanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:207_9: ārabbha visuddhimaggo katoti āgataṃ. Buddhaghosuppattikathāyaṃ pana saṅgharājattherassa
anya-e0702n0:209_0: Cūḷavaṃse panevaṃ āgato. Buddhaghosatthero nāma mahābodhirukkhasamīpe ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇagāme
anya-e0702n0:209_1: vijāto tiṇṇampi vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi tesu tesu vādesu ca aticheko. So aññehi ca saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:209_2: pucchābyākaraṇakammaṃ kattukāmo jambunīpatale āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ vihāraṃ patvā tasmiṃ
anya-e0702n0:209_3: vā āgantukabhāvena nisīdi. Tasmiñca vihāre revato nāma thero vasi. Tena therena saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:209_4: bhallapanto so brāhmaṇamāṇavo tīsu vedesu aloletvā pañhaṃ pucchi. Pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ
anya-e0702n0:209_5: thero byākāsi. Therassa pana pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ māṇavo na sakkā byākātuṃ. Atha māṇavo
anya-e0702n0:209_6: pucchi,–ko nāmāyaṃ bhante mantoti. Buddhamanto nāmāyanti vutte uggaṇhitukāmo hutvā
anya-e0702n0:209_7: therassa santike pabbajitvā piṭakattayaṃ uggaṇhi. Aciraneva tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ pāragū
anya-e0702n0:209_8: ahosi. Buddhasseva ghoso yassa atthīti buddhaghosoti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:210_0: Buddhaghoso ca āyasmato revatassa santike nisīdanto ñāṇodayaṃ nāma ganthaṃ aṭṭhassāliniñca
anya-e0702n0:210_1: nāma ganthaṃ akāsi. Tato pacchā parittaṭṭhakathaṃ kattukāmo hutvā ārabhi. Tadā ācariyo
anya-e0702n0:210_2: evamāha,– jambudīpe pana āvuso pāḷimattaṃyeva atthi, aṭṭhakathā pana natthi, ācariyavādo
anya-e0702n0:210_3: ca bhinno hutvā atthi, teneva mahāmahindhattherena ānitā aṭṭhakathā tīsu ca saṅgītīsu
anya-e0702n0:210_4: āruḷo pāḷiyo sāriputtattherādīhi desito kathāmaggo sīhaḷadīpe atthi, tvaṃ gantvā
anya-e0702n0:210_5: māgadhabhāsakkharena likhehīti uyyojiyamāno buddhaghosatthero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā
anya-e0702n0:210_6: anurādhapure mahāvihāraṃ pavisitvā saṅghapālattherassa santike saddhiṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0702n0:210_7: theravāde sutvā aṭṭhakathaṃ karissamīti ārocesi. Sīhaḷabhikkhū ca pubbe vuttanayeneva
anya-e0702n0:210_8: sīle patiṭṭhāyātiādi gāthā niyyādesuṃ. Buddhaghoso ca saddhiṃ aṭṭhakathāya piṭakattayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:211: Pubbe vuttanayeneva sakko antaradhāpetvā tikkhattuṃ kārāpesi. Saṅghapālattheropi arādhayitvā piṭakattayaṃ niyyādesīti.
anya-e0702n0:212_0: Kiñcāpi nānā ganthesu nānākārehi buddhaghosuppatti āgatā, tathāpi buddhaghosattherassa
anya-e0702n0:212_1: sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā piṭakattayassa likhanaṃ aṭṭhakathānañca karaṇameva pamāṇanti manokiliṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:212_2: na uppādetabbanti. Buddhaghosatthero vikaṭattayaṃ likhitvā jambudīpaṃ paccāgamāsi.
anya-e0702n0:213_0: Iccevaṃ pāḷibhāsāya pariyattiṃ parivattitvā pacchā ācariyaparamparasissānusissavasena
anya-e0702n0:213_1: sīhaḷadīpe jinacakkaṃ majjhanti kaṃsumāsī viya atidibbati, anekakoṭippamāṇehi sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantehi
anya-e0702n0:213_3: viya satapattapadumādīhi mahāpokkharaṇī viya tesu tesu ṭhānesu maggamahāmaggaāpakagharadvāratitthavanapabbataguhamandiravihārasālādīsu
anya-e0702n0:213_4: aladdhamaggaphalaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiñci natthi, thokaṃ āgametvā piṇḍāya patiṭṭhamānapadesepi
anya-e0702n0:214_0: Maggaphalāni sacchikarontānaṃ puggalānaṃ bāhullatāya ayaṃ puthujjano ayaṃ puthujjanoti
anya-e0702n0:214_1: aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo hoti. Ekasmiṃ kāle sīhaḷadīpe puthujjana bhikkhu nāma
anya-e0702n0:214_2: natthi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, ekavāraṃ puthujjanabhikkhu nāma natthīti.
anya-e0702n0:215: Abhiññālābhīnaṃ kira mahiddhikānaṃ gamanāgamanavasena sūriyossāsaṃ alabhitvā dhaññakoṭṭakā mātugāmā dhaññakoṭṭituṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:216_0: Devalokato sumanasāmaṇero dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ anetvā tassa pāṭihāriyaṃ dassanavasena
anya-e0702n0:216_1: uddhakabindhūhi tiyojanasataṃ sakalampi laṅkādīpaṃ byāpatvā bhagavatā paribhuttacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:216_2: viya hutvā navāya gacchantā mahāsamudde udakato nāḷikeramattampi disvā sakalaṅkādīpaṃ
anya-e0702n0:216_3: pūjenti, mahāmahindattherassa santike ariṭṭhattherena saddhiṃ pañcamattā bhikkhusatā
anya-e0702n0:216_4: paṭhamaṃ tāva vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhiṃsūti imehi kāraṇehi laṅkādīpaṃ jinacakkassa patiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:217_0: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva piṭakattayaṃ potthakāruḷavasena patiṭṭhāpetvā tato pacchā coranāgassa
anya-e0702n0:217_1: nāma rañño kāle sakalalaṅkādīpaṃ dubbhikkhabhayena pīḷetvā piṭakattayaṃ dhārentā
anya-e0702n0:217_2: bhikkhū jambudīpaṃ āgamaṃsu. Anāgantvā tattheva ṭhitāpi bhikkhū chātakabhayena pīḷetvā
anya-e0702n0:217_3: udarapaṭalaṃ bandhitvā kucchiṃ vālukarāsimhi ṭhapetvā piṭakattayaṃ dhāresuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:218_0: Kuṭa kaṇṇatissassa rañño kāleyeva dubbhikkhabhayaṃ vūpasamitvā jambudīpato bhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:218_1: puna gantvā sīhaḷadīpe ṭhitehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ mahāvihāre piṭakattayaṃ avirodhāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:218_2: samasamaṃ katvā ṭhapesuṃ. Ṭhapetvā ca pana sīhaḷadīpeyeva suṭṭhu dhāresuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:219_0: Tattheva aṭṭhakathāyo buddhaghosatthero māgadhabhāsāya parivattetvā viraci. Pacchā
anya-e0702n0:220_1: ācariyadhammapālatthero akāsi. So ca ācariyadhammapālatthero sīhaḷadīpassa samīpe
anya-e0702n0:220_2: damilaraṭṭhe badaratitthamhi nivāsitattā sīhaḷadīpeyeva saṅgahetvā vattabbo.
anya-e0702n0:221_0: Paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathaṃ mahānāmo nāma thero ākāsi. Mahāniddesaṭṭhakathaṃ upaseno
anya-e0702n0:221_1: nāma thero akāsi. Abhidhammaṭīkaṃ pana ānandatthero akāsi. Sā ca sabbāsaṃ ṭīkānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:222: Visuddhimaggassa mahāṭīkaṃ dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkaṃ majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkañhāti imāyo ācariyadhammapālatthero akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:223: Sāratthadīpaniṃ nāma vinayaṭīkaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṭīkañca parakkamabāhuraññā yācito sāriputtatthero akāsi. Vimativinodaniṃ nāma vinayaṭīkaṃ damilaraṭṭhavāsikassapatthero akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:224: Anuṭīkaṃ pana ācariyadhammapālatthero. Sā ca mūlaṭīkāya anuttānatthāni uttānāni saṃvaṇṇitattā anuṭīkā tivuccati.
anya-e0702n0:225_0: Visuddhimaggassa cūḷaṭīkaṃ makhudīpaniñca aññetarā therā akaṃsu. Sā ca mūlaṭīkāya
anya-e0702n0:225_1: atthāvasesāti ca anuttānatthāti ca katvā mūlaṭīkāya saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā katattā madhura
anya-e0702n0:225_2: sattā ca madhudīpaninti vuccati. Mohavicchedaniṃ pana lakkhaṇaganthaṃ kassapatthero akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:226_0: Ābhidhammāvatāraṃ pana rupārūpavibhāgaṃ vinayavinicchayañca buddha dattatthero. Vinayasaṅgahaṃ
anya-e0702n0:226_2: abhidhammatthasaṅgañca anuruddhatthero. Saccasaṅkhepaṃ dhammapālatthero. Khemaṃ khematthero.
anya-e0702n0:226_3: Te ca saṅkhepato saṃvaṇṇitattā sukhena ca lakkhaṇiyattā lakkhaṇaganthāti vuccanti.
anya-e0702n0:227_0: Tesaṃ pana saṃvaṇṇanāsu abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa porāṇaṭīkaṃ navavimalabuddhitthero
anya-e0702n0:228_2: aññataratthero. Vinayavinicchayaṭīkaṃ revatatthero. Khuddasikkhāya purāṇaṭīkaṃ mahāyasatthero.
anya-e0702n0:229_0: Vajirabuddhiṃ nāma vinayagaṇṭhipadatthaṃ vajirabuddhitthero. Cūḷagaṇṭhiṃ majjhimagaṇṭhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:229_1: mahāgaṇṭhiñca sīhaḷadīpavāsino therā. Te ca padakkamena asaṃvaṇṇetvā anuttānatthāyeva
anya-e0702n0:230: Abhidhānappadīpikaṃ pana mahāmoggalānatthero. Atthabyakkhānaṃ cūḷabuddhatthero. Vuttodayaṃ sambandhacintanaṃ subodhālaṅkārañca saṅgharakkhitatthero. Byākaraṇaṃ moggalānatthero.
anya-e0702n0:231_0: Mahāvaṃsaṃ cūḷavaṃsaṃ dīpavaṃsaṃ thūpavaṃsaṃ bodhivaṃsaṃ dhātuvaṃ sañca sīhaḷadīpavāsino
anya-e0702n0:231_1: therā. Dāṭhādhātuvaṃsaṃ pana dhammakittitthero akāsi. Ete ca pāḷimuttakavasena vuttattā
anya-e0702n0:232_0: Iccevaṃ buddhaghosādayo thera varā yathābalaṃ yathāsattiṃ pariyattiṃ sāsanaṃ upatthambhetvā
anya-e0702n0:232_1: bahūhi mūlehi bahuhisākhāhi bahūhi ca viṭapehi upatthambhiyamāno vepullamā pajjamāno
anya-e0702n0:232_2: mahānigrodharukkho viya thiraṃ hutvā cirakālaṃ tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:233: Idaṃ sīhaḷadīpe potthakāruḷhato pacchā sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:243: 3. Idāni yathāṭhapitamātikāvasena suvaṇṇabhūmi raṭṭhe sāsanavaṃsakathāmaggassa vatthuṃ okāso anuppattho, tasmā suvaṇṇabhūmiraṭṭhasāsanavaṃsakathāmaggaṃ ārabhissāmi.
anya-e0702n0:244_0: Tattha suvaṇṇabhūmīti tīsu rāmaññaraṭṭhesu ekassa nāmaṃ. Tīṇihi rāmaññaraṭṭhāni honti
anya-e0702n0:244_2: Tattha pana ukkalāpajanapade tapussabhallike ādiṃ katvā bhagavato abhisambujjhitvā
anya-e0702n0:246_0: Bhagavato abhisambuddhakālato pubbeyeva aparaṇṇakaraṭṭhe subhinnanagare tissarañño
anya-e0702n0:246_1: kāle ekassa amaccassa tisso jayo cāti dveputtā ahesuṃ. Te gihibhāve saṃvegaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0702n0:246_2: mahāsamuddassa samīpe gajjagirimhi nāma pabbate itthusipabbaṃ pabbajitvā nisīdisuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:246_3: Tadā nāgiyā vijjādharo santavaṃ katvā dve aṇḍāni vijāyitvā sā nāgī lajjāya tāni vijahitvā gacchi.
anya-e0702n0:247_0: Tadā jeṭṭho tissakumāro tāni labhitvā kaniṭṭhena saddhiṃ vibhajitvā ekaṃ ekassa santike
anya-e0702n0:247_1: ṭhapesi. Kāle atikkante tehi aṇḍehi dve manussā vijāyiṃsu. Te dasa vassavaye sampatte
anya-e0702n0:247_2: kaniṭṭhassa aṇḍato vijāyanadaharo kālaṃ katvā majjhimadese mithilanagare gavaṃpati
anya-e0702n0:247_3: nāma kumāro upajji. So sattavassikakāle buddhassa bhagavato santike niyyādetvā pabbājetvā
anya-e0702n0:248_0: Jeṭṭhassa pana aṇḍato vijāyanadaharo dvādasavassikakāle sakko devānamindo āgantvā
anya-e0702n0:248_1: rāmaññaraṭṭhe sudhammapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpetvā sīharājāti nāmena tattha rajjaṃ
anya-e0702n0:248_2: kārāpesi. Silālone pana sirimāsokoti nāmenāti vuttaṃ. Gavaṃpatitthero ca attanā mātaraṃ
anya-e0702n0:248_3: daṭṭhukāmo mithilanagarato āgantuṃ ārabhi. Tadā dibbacakkhunā mātuyā kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0702n0:248_4: ñatvā idāni me mātā kuhiṃ uppajjatīti āvajjanto bāhullena nesādakevaṭṭānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānabhūte
anya-e0702n0:248_5: dese uppajjatīti ñatvā sacāhaṃ gantvā na ovādeyyaṃ, mātā me apāyagamaniyaṃ apuññaṃ
anya-e0702n0:248_6: vicinitvā catūsu apāyesu uppajjeyyāti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ yācitvā rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:248_7: vehāsamaggena āgacchi. Rāmaññaraṭṭhe sudhammaparaṃ patvā attano bhātunā sīharājena
anya-e0702n0:248_8: saddhiṃ raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:249_0: Atha sīharājā āha, lokesu bhante tvamasi aggataro puggaloti. Na mahārāja ahaṃ aggataro,
anya-e0702n0:249_1: tīsu pana bhavesu sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ makuṭasaṅkāso gotamo nāma mayhaṃ satthā atthi,
anya-e0702n0:249_2: idāni majjhimadesaṃ rājagahaṃ paṭivasatīti. Evaṃ pana bhante sati tumhākaṃ ācariyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:249_3: mayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ arahāma vā no vāti pucchi. Gavaṃpatittheroca āma mahārāja arahatha
anya-e0702n0:249_4: bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ, ahaṃ yācitvā āgacchāmīti vatvā bhagavantaṃ yāci. Bhagavā ca
anya-e0702n0:249_5: abhisambujjhitvā aṭṭhame vasse saddhiṃ anekasatabhikkhūhi rāmaññaraṭṭhe sukhammapuraṃ
anya-e0702n0:249_6: ākāsena āgamāsi. Rājavaṃse pañcahi bhikkhusatehi āgamāsīti vuttaṃ. Silālekhane pana
anya-e0702n0:249_7: vīsatisahassamattehi bhikkhūhīti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca yasmā bhagavā saparisoyeva āgacchi,
anya-e0702n0:249_8: na ekakoti ettakameva icchitabbaṃ, tasmā nānā vādataṃ paṭicca cittassākulitā na uppādetabbāti.
anya-e0702n0:250_0: Atha āgantvā ratanamaṇḍape nisīditvā sarājikānaṃ raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ amatarasaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:250_1: Tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Atha bhagavā dassanatthāya āgatānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:250_2: channaṃ tāpasānaṃ cha kesadhātuyo pūjanatthāya adāsi. Tato pacchāsattatiṃsavassāni
anya-e0702n0:250_3: pūretvā parinibbānakālepi bhagavato adhiṭṭhānānurūpena citakaṭṭhānato tettiṃsa dante
anya-e0702n0:250_4: gahetvā gavaṃpatitthero sudhammapuraṃ ānetvā sīharañño datvā tettiṃsacetiyāni patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:250_5: Evaṃ bhagavato parinibbānato aṭṭhameyeva vasse gavaṃpatitthero rāmañña raṭṭhe sudhammapure
anya-e0702n0:252_0: Bhagavato parinibbutapañcatiṃsādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ satānaṃ uparisuvaṇṇabhūmiṃ nāma rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:252_1: āgantvā soṇatthero uttarattherocāti dve therā pañcavaggakammārahehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:252_2: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Te ca therā mahāmoggaliputtatissattherassa saddhivihārikāti
anya-e0702n0:253_0: Tapussabhallike gavaṃpatittherañca paṭicca sāsanaṃ tāva patiṭṭhahi. Tañca na sabbena
anya-e0702n0:253_1: sabbaṃ ogāhetvā ye ye pana saddhā pasannā, te te attano icchāvaseneva sāsanaṃ pasīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:253_2: Pacchā pana soṇuttarattherā mahussāhena ācariya āṇattiyā sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya
anya-e0702n0:253_3: ussukkaṃ āpannā patiṭṭhāpesuṃ. Tena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:254_0: Tadā pana suvaṇṇabhūmiraṭṭhe sudhammapure sirimāsoko nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tañca
anya-e0702n0:254_1: sudhammapuraṃ nāma kelāsapabbatamuddhani dakkhiṇāya anudisāya pubbaḍḍhabhāgena pabbatamuddhani
anya-e0702n0:254_2: aparaḍḍhabhāgena bhūmitale tiṭṭhati. Taṃyeva guḷapācakānaṃ massānaṃ gehasadisāni
anya-e0702n0:254_3: gehāni yebhuyyena, teneva goḷamittika nāmenāpi vohāriyati. Tassa pana nagarassa mahāsamuddasamīpe
anya-e0702n0:254_4: ṭhitattā dakayakkhinī sabbadā āgantvā rājagehe jāte jāte kumāre khādi.
anya-e0702n0:255_0: Soṇuttarattherānaṃ sampattadivasayeva rājagehe ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. Dakayakkhinīca
anya-e0702n0:255_1: khādissāmīti saha pañcahi yakkhinisatehi āgatā. Taṃ disvā manussā bhāyitvā mahāviravaṃ
anya-e0702n0:255_2: ravanti. Tadā therā bhayānakaṃ sīhasīsavasena ekasīsasarīradvayasambandhasaṇṭhānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:255_3: manusīharūpaṃ māpetvā dassetvā taṃ yakkhiniṃ saparisaṃ palāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:256_0: Therā ca puna yakkhiniyā anāgamanatthāya parittaṃ akaṃsutasmiñca samāgame āgatānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:256_1: manussānaṃ brahmajālasuttaṃ adesayyuṃ. Saṭṭhimattasahassā sotāpannādiparāyanā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:256_2: Kuladārakānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni sahassāni pabbajiṃsu. Kuladhītānaṃ pana dighaḍḍhasahassaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:256_3: Rājakumārānaṃ pañcasatādhikasahassamattaṃ pabbajiṃsu. Avasesāpi manussā saraṇe patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:256_4: Evaṃ so tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesītii. Vuttañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ,–
anya-e0702n0:259_0: Tato paṭṭhāya rājakumārānaṃ soṇuttaranāmehiyeva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Avasesadvārakānampi
anya-e0702n0:259_1: rakkhasabhayato vimocanatthaṃ tālapattabhujapattesu therehi māpitaṃ manusīharūpaṃ
anya-e0702n0:259_2: dassetvā matthake ṭhapesuṃ. Manussāca silāmayaṃ manusīharūpaṃ katvā sudhammapurassa
anya-e0702n0:259_3: esanne padese ṭhapesuṃ. Taṃ yāvajjatanā atthīti. Iccevaṃ bhagavato parinibbānato
anya-e0702n0:259_4: pañcatiṃsādhike dvivassasate sampatte soṇuttarattherā āgantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:261_0: Tato pacchā chasatādhike sahasse sampatte pubbe vuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi sāsanassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
anya-e0702n0:261_2: tīhi bhayehi ākulitaṃ ahosi. Tadā ca tattha sāsanaṃ dubbalaṃ ahosi, yathā udake mande
anya-e0702n0:261_3: tatrajātaṃ uppalaṃ uppalaṃ dubbalanti. Tattha bhikkhūpi sāsanaṃ yathā kāmaṃ pūretuṃ na sakkā.
anya-e0702n0:262_0: Sūriyakumārassa nāma manoharirañño pana kāle sāsanaṃ ativiya dubbalaṃ ahosi. Jinacakke
anya-e0702n0:262_1: ekachasatādhike vassasahasse sampatte kaliyugeca ekūnavīsatādhike catuvassasate sampatte
anya-e0702n0:262_2: arimaddananagare anuruddhā nāma rājā tato saha piṭakena bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ānesi.
anya-e0702n0:263: Tato pacchā jinacakke navādhike sattasate sahasse ca sampatte laṅkādīpe sirisaṅghabodhiparakkamabāhumahārājā sāsanaṃ sodhesi.
anya-e0702n0:264: Tato channaṃ vassānaṃ upari kaliyuge dvattiṃsādhike pañcasate sampatte uttarājīvo nāma thero sāsane pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:265_0: So pana rāmaññaraṭṭhavāsino ariyāvaṃsattherassa saddhivihāriko. Ariyāvaṃsatthero
anya-e0702n0:265_1: pana kappuṅganagaravāsino mahākāḷattherassa saddhivihāriko. Mahākāḷatthero pana sudhammapuravāsino
anya-e0702n0:265_2: prānadassittherassa saddhivihāriko. Ayaṃ pana uttarājīvachappadattherānaṃ vaṃsadīpanatthaṃ vuttā.
anya-e0702n0:266_0: So pana prānadassitthero lokiyābhiññāyo labhitvā niccaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pātova magadharaṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:266_1: uruvelanigame mahābodhiṃ gantvā mahābodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā puna āgantvā sudhammapure
anya-e0702n0:266_2: piṇḍāya cari. Idaṃ therassa nibaddhavattuṃ. Ayañca attho sudhammapurato magadharaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:266_3: gantvā uruvelanigame vāṇijakammaṃ karontā tadākāraṃ passitvā paccāgamanakāle sudhammapura
anya-e0702n0:267_0: Tasmiñca kāle uttarājīvatthero paripuṇṇavīsativassena chappadena nāma sāmaṇerena
anya-e0702n0:267_1: saddhiṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ gacchi. Sīhaḷadīpavāsino ca bhikkhū mayaṃ mahāmahindattherassa
anya-e0702n0:267_2: vaṃsikā bhavāma, tumhepi soṇuttarattherānaṃ vaṃsikā bhavatha, tasmā mayaṃ ekavaṃsikā
anya-e0702n0:267_3: bhavāma samāna vādikāti vatvā chappadasāmaṇerassa upasampadakammaṃ akaṃsu. Tato pacchā
anya-e0702n0:267_4: cetiya vandanādīni kammāni niṭṭhāpetvā uttarājīvatthero saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅkhena arimaddananagaraṃ paccāgamāhi.
anya-e0702n0:268_0: Chappadassa pana etadahosi,- sacāhaṃ ācariyena saha jambudīpaṃ gaccheyyaṃ, bahūhi
anya-e0702n0:268_1: ñātibalibodhehi pariyattuggahaṇe antarāyo bhaveyya, tena hi sīhaḷadīpeyeva vasitvā
anya-e0702n0:269_0: Tato ācariyassa okāsaṃ yācitvā sīhaḷadīpeyeva paṭivasi. Sīhaḷadīpe vasitvā yāva laddhattherasammutikā
anya-e0702n0:269_1: pariyattiṃ pariyāpuṇitvā puna jambudīpaṃ paccāgantukāmo ahosi. Atha tassa etadahosi,–
anya-e0702n0:269_2: ahaṃ ekakova gacchanto sace mama ācariyo natthi, sacepi jambudīpavāsinā bhikkhusaṅghena
anya-e0702n0:269_3: saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kātuṃ na iccheyyaṃ, evaṃ sati visuṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkūṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:269_4: tasmā piṭakadharehi catūhi therehi saddhiṃ gacceyyaṃ, iccetaṃ kusalanti.
anya-e0702n0:270_0: Evaṃ pana cintetvā tāmalittigāmavāsinā sivalittherena kambojarañño puttabhūtena tāmalindattherena
anya-e0702n0:270_1: kiñcipuravāsinā ānandattherena rāhulattherenacāti imehi catūhi therehi saddhiṃ nāvāya
anya-e0702n0:270_2: paccāgacchi. Te ca therā piṭakadharā ahesuṃ dakkhā thāmasampannā ca. Tesu visesato
anya-e0702n0:270_4: hutvā arimaddananagare ācariyassa santikaṃ asampāpuṇitvā kusimanagarayeva vassaṃ
anya-e0702n0:270_5: upagamiṃsu. Tesaṃ vassūpagamanavihāravatthu ārāmapākāro ca kusimanagarassa dakkhiṇadisāsāge yāvajjatanā atthi.
anya-e0702n0:271_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle pana mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā te pañca therā arimaddananagaraṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:271_1: Uttarājīvattheroca arimaddananagara vāsīhi bhikkhūhi visuṃ hutvā saṅghakammāni akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:271_2: Kiñcāpi cettha uttarājīvattherādayo sīhaḷadīpato paccāgantvā arimaddananagare vasitvā
anya-e0702n0:271_3: sāsanaṃ anuggahesuṃ, rāmaññaraṭṭhe pana jātattā pubbe ca tattha nivāsattā idha dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0702n0:272_0: Tasmiñca kāle dalanagare padīpajeyyagāme jāto sāriputto nāma mahallakassamaṇero eko
anya-e0702n0:272_1: arimaddananagaraṃ gantvā ānandattherassa santike upasampajjitvā pariyatti pariyapuṇi.
anya-e0702n0:272_2: So bahussuto ahosi dakkho thāmasampanno ca. Tamatthaṃ sutvā narapaticaññisūrājā cintesi,-
anya-e0702n0:272_3: saceso aṅgapaccaṅgasampanno bhaveyya, ācariyaṃ katvā ṭhapessāmi anuggahessāmīti.
anya-e0702n0:272_4: Rājā evaṃ cintetvā rājapurise pesetvā vīmaṃsāpesi. Rājapurisā ca tassa chinnapādaṅguṭṭhaggataṃ
anya-e0702n0:272_5: passitvā tamatthaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā taṃ sutvā evaṃ vikalaṅgapaccaṅgo bhaveyya,
anya-e0702n0:272_6: padhānācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ na yuttoti katvā padhānācariyabhāvaṃ na akāsi. Pūjāsakkā
anya-e0702n0:272_7: ramatteneva anuggahaṃ akāsi. Ekasmiñca kāle dhammavilāsoti lañchaṃ datvā rāmaññaraṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:272_8: sāsanaṃ sodhetvā parisuddhaṃ karohīti rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:273_0: Soca rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā dalanagare bahunaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhamma vinayaṃ vācetvā sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:273_1: paggahesi. Tattha ca rāmaññamanussā tassa dhammavilāsattherassa sissānusissā sīhaḷabhikkhu
anya-e0702n0:273_2: gaṇāti vohāranti. Iccevaṃ sīhaḷadīpikassa ānandattherassa sissaṃ dhammavilāsaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0702n0:275_0: Tasmiñca kāle muttimanagare aggamahesiyā ācariyā buddhavaṃsattheramahānāgattherā
anya-e0702n0:275_1: sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā mahāhāravāsigaṇavaṃsabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike puna sikkhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:275_2: gaṇhitvā muttimanagaraṃ paccāgantvā muttimanagaravāsīti bhikkhūhi visuṃ hutvā saṅghakammāni
anya-e0702n0:275_3: katvā sāsanaṃ paggahesuṃ. Teca there paṭicca rāmaññaraṭṭhe puna sīhaḷadīpato sāsanaṃ āgatanti.
anya-e0702n0:277_0: Tato pacchāca muttimanagare setibhindassa rañño mātuyā ācariyo medhaṅkaro nāma thero
anya-e0702n0:277_1: sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā sīhaḷadīpe araññavāsīnaṃ mahātherānaṃ santike puna sikkhaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0702n0:277_2: pariyattiṃ pariyāpuṇitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaye tipusīsacchanne setibhindassa rañño mātuyā
anya-e0702n0:277_3: kārāvite vihāre nisiditvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesi. Lokadīpakasārañca nāma ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:277_4: Athāparimpi muttimanagareyeva suvaṇṇasobhaṇo nāma thero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā mahāvihāravāsigaṇavaṃsabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:277_5: therānaṃ santike puna sikkhaṃ gahetvā muttimanagarameva paccāgacchi.
anya-e0702n0:278_0: So pana thero araññeyeva vasi. Dhutaṅgadharo ca ahosi appiccho santuṭṭho lajjī kukkuccako
anya-e0702n0:278_1: sikkhā kāmo dakkho thāmasampanno ca. Sīhaḷadīpe kalambumhi nāma jātassare udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:278_2: atirekapañcavaggena vanaratanaṃ nāma saṅgharājaṃ upajjhāyaṃ katvā rāhulabhaddaṃ nāma
anya-e0702n0:278_3: vijayabāhurañño ācariyabhūtaṃ theraṃ kammavācācariyaṃ katvā upasampajji. Soca thero
anya-e0702n0:278_4: punāgantvā muttimanagareyeva vasitvā gaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sāsanaṃ anuggahesi. Ete ca dve
anya-e0702n0:278_5: there paṭicca rāmaññaraṭṭhe sīhaḷadīpato sāsanaṃ āgataṃ.
anya-e0702n0:280_0: Tato pacchā sāsanavasena dvivassādhike dvisahasse kaliyugato ekāsītike sampatte haṃsāvatīnagare
anya-e0702n0:280_2: muttimamaṇḍale ca raṭṭhavāsino sapajaṃviya dhammena samena rakkhitvā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:280_3: So ca rājā tīsu piṭakesu catūsu ca vedesu byākaraṇacchandālaṅkārādīsu ca cheko sikkhitanānāsippo
anya-e0702n0:281_0: Ekasmiṃ kāle so cintesi, bhagavato sāsanaṃ nāma pabbajjaupasampadatāvena sambandhaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:281_1: upasampadabhāvo ca sīmaparisavatthu ñattikammavācāsampattīhi sambandhoti. Evañca
anya-e0702n0:281_2: pana cintetvā sīmavinicchayaṃ tassaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ vinayasaṅgahaṃ tassaṃvaṇṇanaṃ sīmālaṅkāra
anya-e0702n0:281_3: sīmasaṅgahañca saddato atthato ca punappunaṃ upaparikkhitvā aññamaññaṃ saṃsanditvā
anya-e0702n0:281_4: pubbāparaṃ tulayitvā bhagavato adhippāyo īdiso ganthakārānaṃ adhippāyo īdisoti passitvā
anya-e0702n0:281_5: amhākaṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhe baddhanadīsamuddajātessarādayo sīmāyo bahukāpi samānā ayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:281_6: parisuddhāti vavatthapetuṃ dukkaraṃ, evaṃ sati sīmaparisāparisuddhā bhavituṃ dukkarāti paṭibhāti.
anya-e0702n0:282: Tato pacchā rāmaññaraṭṭhe tipiṭakadharabyattappaṭibalattherehi mantetvā rañño paṭibhānānurūpaṃ sīmaparisā parisuddhā bhavituṃ dukkarāti therā vinicchaniṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:283_0: Atha rājā evampi cintesi,– ahovata sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassāni
anya-e0702n0:283_1: patiṭṭhatissatīti ganthesu vuttopi samāno abhisambuddhato catusaṭṭhādhikadvisahassamatteneva
anya-e0702n0:283_2: kālena sāsane malaṃ hutvā upasampadakamme kaṅkhāṭṭhānaṃ tāva uppajji, kathaṃ pana
anya-e0702n0:283_3: pañcavassasahassāni sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti. Evaṃ dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā
anya-e0702n0:283_4: punāpi evaṃ cintesi,- evaṃ ettakaṃ sāsane malaṃ dissamānopi samāno upasampadakamme
anya-e0702n0:283_5: kaṅkhāṭṭhānaṃ dissamānopi samāno parisuddhatthāya anārabhitvā mādiso appossukko majjhatto
anya-e0702n0:283_6: nisīdituṃ ayutto, evañhi sati bhagavati saddho pasannomhīti vattabbataṃ anāpajjeyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:284_0: Kuto nukho dāni sāsanaṃ āharitvā thiraṃ patiṭṭhā peyyanti āvajjanto evaṃ cintesi,-
anya-e0702n0:284_1: bhagavato kira parinibbānato chattiṃsādhike dvisate sampatte mahāmoggali puttatissatthero
anya-e0702n0:284_2: mahāmahindattheraṃ pesetvā sīhaḷadīpe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, tadā devānaṃ piyatissarājā
anya-e0702n0:284_3: mahāvihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi, sāsanavarañca ekāsitādhikāni dvivassasatāni vimalaṃ
anya-e0702n0:284_4: hutvā patiṭṭhahi, bhikkhusaṅghopi mahāvihāra vāsigaṇavasena ekatova aṭṭhāsi, tato
anya-e0702n0:284_5: pacchā abhayagirivāsije tavanavāsivasena dvedhā hutvā bhijji, jinacakke aṭṭhasattasatādhike
anya-e0702n0:284_7: mahāvihāra vāsigaṇaṃ anuggahetvā yathāvutte dvegaṇe visodhesi, sāsanaṃ nimmalaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0702n0:284_8: tato pacchā vijayabāhuparakkamabāhurājūnaṃ dvinnaṃ kālepi sāsanaṃ nimmalaṃ hutvāyeva
anya-e0702n0:284_9: aṭṭhāsi, teneva byattappaṭibalabhikkhū āyācitvā sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhā
anya-e0702n0:284_10: pessāmi, tesaṃ pana paramparavasena pavattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena amhākaṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:284_11: sāsanaṃ nimmalaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahissatīti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā moggalānattheraṃ somattherañca
anya-e0702n0:284_12: sīhaḷadīpaṃ gamanatthāya yāci. Therāca sāsanappaṭiyattakammamidanti manasikaritvā paṭiññaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:285_0: Rājā ca dāṭhādhātupūjanatthāya bhikkhusaṅghassa pūjanatthāya bhūvanekabāhurañño paṇṇākāratthāya
anya-e0702n0:285_1: deyyadhammapaṇṇākāravatthūni paṭiyādetvā citradūtaṃ rāmadūtanti ime dve amacce dvīsu
anya-e0702n0:285_2: nāvāsu nāyakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā kaliyuge sattatiṃsādhike aṭṭhavassasate sampatte māghamāsassa
anya-e0702n0:285_3: puṇṇamito ekādasamiyaṃ sūravāre citradūtaṃ saddhiṃ moggalānattherappamukhehi bhikkhūhi
anya-e0702n0:285_4: ekāya nāvāya gamāpesi. Phagguṇamāsassa aṭṭhamiyaṃ sīhaḷadīpe kalambutitthaṃ pāyāsi.
anya-e0702n0:286_0: Rāmadūtaṃ pana tasmiṃyeva vasse māghamāsassa puṇṇamito dvādasamiyaṃ candavāre saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:286_1: somattherappamukhehi bhikkhūhi ekāya nāvāya gamāpesi. Ujukaṃ pana vātaṃ alabhitvā
anya-e0702n0:287_0: Tato pacchā tepi dve amaccā dvīsu nāvāsu ābhatāni dātabbapaṇṇākāravatthūni sandesapaṇṇāni
anya-e0702n0:287_1: ca bhūvanekabāhurañño bhikkhūsaṅghassa ca adāsi. Raññā pesitabhikkhūnañca sandesapaṇṇe
anya-e0702n0:287_2: kathitaniyāmeneva kalyāṇiyaṃ nāma nadiyaṃ udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:288_0: Upasampajjitvā ca bhūvanekabāhurājā nānāppakāre bhikkhūnaṃ sāruppe parikkhāre datvā
anya-e0702n0:288_1: idaṃ pana āmisadānaṃ yāva jīvitapariyosānāyeva paribhuñjitabbaṃ bhavissati, nāmalañchaṃ
anya-e0702n0:288_2: pana na jīrissatīti katvā rāmadūtassa nāvāya pakhānabhūtassa somattherassa sirisaṅghabodhisāmīti
anya-e0702n0:288_3: nāmaṃ adāsi. Avasesānaṃ pana dasannaṃ therānaṃ kittisirimeghasāmi parakkamabāhusāmi
anya-e0702n0:289_1: nāmaṃ adāsi. Avasesānaṃ pana sirivanaratanasāmi maṅgalattherassāmi kalyāṇatissassāmi
anya-e0702n0:289_3: udumbaragirisāmi cūḷābhayatissasāmīti nāmāni adāsi. Bāvīsatiyā pana pacchā samaṇānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:289_4: nāmaṃ na adāsi. Abhinavasikkhaṃ pana sabbesaṃyeva adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:290_0: Tato pacchā cetiyapūjanādīni katvā taṃtaṃkiccaṃ nipphādetvā puna āgamaṃsu. Bhūvanekabāhurājā
anya-e0702n0:290_1: citradūtaṃ evamāha, rāmādhipatirañño paṇṇākāraṃ paṭidātuṃ icchāmi, paṭidūtañca pesetuṃ
anya-e0702n0:290_2: tāva tvaṃ āgamehīti. Evaṃ pana vatvā pacchā āgamanakāle caṇḍavātabhayena mahāsamuddamajjhe
anya-e0702n0:290_3: nāvā avagacchati. Tena sīhaḷaraññā pesitanāvāya sabbe sannipatitvā āruhitvā āgacchantā
anya-e0702n0:290_4: tīṇi divasāni atikkamitvā puna caṇḍavātabhayena agambhīraṭṭhāne silāya ghaṭṭetvā
anya-e0702n0:290_5: laggitvā gantuṃ asakkuṇitvā ekaṃ uḷumpaṃ bandhitvā jaṅgheneva agamaṃsu. Sīhaḷarañño
anya-e0702n0:290_6: ca dūto paṇṇākāraṃ datvā paccāgamāsi. Bhikkhūsu ca bhikkhū antarāmaggeyeva maccu
anya-e0702n0:290_7: ādāya gacchati. Aho aniccā vata saṅkhārāti. Honti cettha,–
anya-e0702n0:291: Imesaṃ pana āraddhaṃ, na kiccaṃ yāva niṭṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0702n0:292: Na tāva ādiyissanti, maccu natthi āpekkhanā.
anya-e0702n0:295_0: Rāmādhipatirājāca tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pattakāle haṃsāvatīnagarassa pacchimasmiṃ disābhāge
anya-e0702n0:295_1: narasūrena nāma amaccena paribhutte gāmakhette pāḷiaṭṭhakathāḷīkādayo punappunaṃ
anya-e0702n0:295_2: passitvā upaparikkhitvā sīmasamūhanasīmasammutikammāni kārapesi. Sīhaḷadīpe bhagavatā
anya-e0702n0:295_3: nhāyitapubbāya kalyāṇiyā nāma nadiyaṃ udakukkhepasīmaṃ katvā tattha mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:295_4: bhikkhūnaṃ santike upaladdhaupasampadabhāvehi bhikkhūhi katattā kalyāṇīsīmāti samaññaṃ
anya-e0702n0:295_5: akāsi. Iccevaṃ rāmādhipatirājā pattalaṅke bhikkhū nissāya sāsanaṃ suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0702n0:295_7: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vaṃse asītimattā gaṇapāmokkhattherā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ sissajātāni pana
anya-e0702n0:295_8: chabbisādhikāni dvisatāni catusahassāni dasasahassāni ahesuṃ. Evaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:295_9: rāmaññaraṭṭhe vuḍḍhiṃ rāmaññaraṭṭhe vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullamāpajjiti.
anya-e0702n0:297_0: Yadā pana arimaddananagare anuruddho nāma rājā sudhammapuraṃ sarājikaṃ abhibhavitvā
anya-e0702n0:297_1: viddhaṃsi, tadā rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ rājasuññaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahi. Rāmaññaraṭṭhe muttimanagare
anya-e0702n0:297_2: soṇuttaravaṃso eko gaṇo, sivalivaṃso eko, tāmalindavaṃso eko, ānandavaṃso eko, buddhavaṃso
anya-e0702n0:297_3: eko, mahānāgavaṃso ekoti chaggaṇā visuṃ visuṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu nānāsaṃvāsakā nānānikāyā.
anya-e0702n0:298_0: Dhammacetiyaraññā pana kārāpitasāsanampi abhijjamānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Samānasaṃvāso
anya-e0702n0:298_1: ekanikāyoyeva ahosi. Haṃsāvatīmuttimasuvasena tīṇipi rāmaññaraṭṭhāni sunāparanta
anya-e0702n0:298_2: saṅkhātena ekābaddhāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Pubbeca marammaraṭṭhindarājūnaṃ āṇāpavattanaṭṭhānāni
anya-e0702n0:298_3: ahesuṃ. Tasmā marammaraṭṭhato ekacce bhikkhū rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā kalyāṇīsīmāyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:298_4: puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Dhammacetiyaraññākārāvitasāsanaṃ sakalaṃ marammaraṭṭhampi
anya-e0702n0:299_0: Rāmaññaraṭṭhe soṇuttarattherānaṃ sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva sudhammapure
anya-e0702n0:299_1: manohariraññā arahantānaṃ saṃvijjamānatā veditabbā. Tato pacchā pana uttarā jīvāriyāvaṃsamahākāḷaprānadassittherānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:299_2: kāle lokiyajjhānābhiññālābhiyoyeva saṃvijjaṃsūti. Adhunā pana tīsupi rāmaññaraṭṭhesu
anya-e0702n0:299_4: ādiantavasene ca sāsanavaṃsaṃ paññāya tulayitvā āditova dassitehi tīhi nayehi yathāpaveṇī
anya-e0702n0:299_5: ghaṭṭiyati, tathā gaṇheyyāti. Ayañca sāsanavaṃso lajjipesalasikkhākāmānaṃyeva vasena
anya-e0702n0:300_0: Tāya ca theraparamparāya muttimanagaravāsimedhaṅkaratthero lokadīpakasāraṃ nāma ganthaṃ
anya-e0702n0:300_1: akāsi. Haṃsāvatīnagaravāsī pana ānandatthero madhusāratthadīpaniṃ nāma abhidhammaṭīkāya
anya-e0702n0:300_2: saṃvaṇṇanaṃ, haṃsāvatīnagaravāsīyeva dhammabuddhatthero kavissāraṃ nāma chandovaṇṇanaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:300_4: tatheva aññataro thero apheggusāraṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ anekappakārānaṃ ganthakārānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:300_5: mahātherānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hutvā sāsanaṃ ogāhetvā virūḷaṭṭhānaṃahosīti.
anya-e0702n0:304_0: 4. Idāni pana yonakaraṭṭhe sāsanassuppattiṃ kathessāmi. Bhagavā hi veneyyahitāvaho
anya-e0702n0:304_1: yonakaraṭṭhe mamasāsanaṃ cirakālaṃ pabhiṭṭhahissatīti āpekkhitvā saddhiṃ bhikkhu
anya-e0702n0:304_2: saṅghena desacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto labhuñjaṃ nāma nagaraṃ agamāsi. Tadā eko nesādo hariphalaṃ
anya-e0702n0:304_3: datvā taṃ paribhuñjitvā haribīje khipite pathaviyaṃ apatitvā ākāseyeva patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n0:304_4: Taṃ disvā sitaṃ patvākāsi. Tamatthaṃ disvā ānandatthero pucchi. Anāgate kho ānanda
anya-e0702n0:304_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne mama dhātucetiyaṃ patiṭṭhahissati, sāsanaṃ virūḷamāpajjissatīti byākāsi.
anya-e0702n0:304_6: Bhagavatā pana hariphalassa bhuñjitaṭṭhānattāharibhuñjoti tassa raṭṭhassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:304_7: Dvinnaṃ tāpasānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ jalasuttikaṃ paṭicca yonakānaṃ bhāsāya labhuñjoti nāmaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:305_0: Tadā tattha mapinnāya nāma ekissā mātikāya samīpe nisinno eko lavakulikajeṭṭhako
anya-e0702n0:305_1: attano puttaṃ sattavassikaṃ bhagavato niyyādetvā pabbājesi. Kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena
anya-e0702n0:305_2: acireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Sattavassi kassaca sāmaṇerassa arahattaṃ sacchikataṭṭhānataṃ
anya-e0702n0:305_3: paṭicca yonakabhāsāya etaṃ ṭhānaṃ caṅgamaṅgha iti vuccati. Cirakāla vasena jaṅgamaṅgha
anya-e0702n0:305_4: iti vuccati. Tato paṭṭhāyayeva yonakaraṭṭhe sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhātīti.
anya-e0702n0:307_0: Sāsane pana pañcatiṃsādhike dvivassasate sampatte mahārakkhitatthero yonakaraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:307_1: gantvā kambojakhemāvara haribhuñjāyuddhayādīsu anekesu raṭṭhesu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0702n0:307_2: Tāni hi sabbāni raṭṭhāni saṅgahetvā dassentehi aṭṭhakathācariyehi yonakalokanti okāsakālokavācakena
anya-e0702n0:307_3: sāmaññasaddena vuttaṃ. Pakati hesā ganthakārānaṃ yena kenacākārena atthantarassa viññāpanāti.
anya-e0702n0:308_0: Mahārakkhitatthero ca saddhiṃ pañcahi bhikkhūhi pāṭaliputtato anilapathamaggena yonakalokaṃ
anya-e0702n0:308_1: āgantvā kāḷakārāmasuttena yonake pasādesi. Sattatisahassādhikapāṇasatasahassaṃ maggaphalālaṅkāraṃ
anya-e0702n0:308_2: adāsi. Santike cassa dasasahassāni pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ so tatthasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:309: Yonakaraṭṭhaṃ tadā gantvā, so mahārakkhito isi;
anya-e0702n0:311: Tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ sissaparamparā bahū honti, gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
anya-e0702n0:314_0: Yonakaraṭṭhe lakunnanagare jinacakke pañcavassasate maṇimayaṃ buddhappaṭimaṃ māpetvā
