anya-e0702n0:314_1: visukammadevaputto nāgasenattherassa adāsi. Nāgesenatthero ca tasmiṃ paṭimamhi dhātu
anya-e0702n0:314_2: āgantvā patiṭṭhātūti adhiṭṭhāsi. Adhiṭṭhānavaseneva sattadhātuyo āgantvā tattha patiṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0702n0:315_0: Tañca vacanaṃ mama parinibbānato pañcavassasate atikkante ete uppajjissantīti milindapañhāyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:315_1: vuttavacanena kālaparimāṇavasena ca sameti. Yonakaraṭṭhe milindarañño kāle jinacakke
anya-e0702n0:315_2: pañcavassasateyeva nāgasenattheraṃ paṭissa jinacakkaṃ virūḷaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n0:318: Kaliyuge pañcasaṭṭhivasselabhuñjanagarato saṅkamitvā kyuṅgaranagare māpikassa baññācomaṅgara nāmakassa rañño kāle majjhimadesato kassapatthero pañcahi therehi saddhiṃ āgacchi.
anya-e0702n0:319_0: Tadā so rājā vihāraṃ katvā tesaṃ adāsi. Sīhaḷadīpato ca dhātuyo ānetvā eko thero
anya-e0702n0:319_1: āgacchi. Dhātuto pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasīditvā labhuñjacetiya nidhānaṃ akāsi. Te ca
anya-e0702n0:319_2: there paṭicca yonakaraṭṭhe sāsana vaṃso āgato.
anya-e0702n0:321_0: Kaliyuge dvāsaṭṭhādhike sattasate sampatthe cinaraṭṭhindo rājā abhibhavitvā sakalampi
anya-e0702n0:321_1: yonakaraṭṭhaṃ saṅkhubtitaṃ hoti. Tadā mahādhammagambhīratthero mahāmedhaṅkaratthe
anya-e0702n0:321_2: rocāti dve thero yonakaraṭṭhato saddhiṃ bahūhi bhikkhūhi sīhaḷadīpaṃ agamaṃsu. Tadā
anya-e0702n0:321_3: ca sīhaḷadīpe dubbhikkhabhayena abhibhūto hutvā tato syāmaraṭṭhe sokkatayanagaraṃ puna agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:322_0: Tato pacchā lakunnanagaraṃ gantvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhantānaṃ lajjipesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:322_1: santike puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Te ca thero syāmaraṭṭhe yonakaraṭṭhe ca sabbattha
anya-e0702n0:323: Idaṃ yonakaraṭṭhe pattalaṅke dve there paṭicca pañcamaṃ
anya-e0702n0:325_1: labhuñjacetiyaṃ puna mahantaṃ katvā tassa cetiyassa samīpe cattāro vihāre kārāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:325_2: mahāmedhaṅkarattherassa sāriputtattherassa ca adāsi. Tadāpi te dve therā sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:328_0: Kaliyuge tecattālīsādhike navavassasate sampatte haṃsāvatīnagare anekasetibhindo
anya-e0702n0:328_1: nāma rājā yonakaraṭṭhaṃ abhibhavitvā attano hatthagataṃ katvā bali bhuñjanatthāya
anya-e0702n0:328_2: jeṭṭhaputtassa anuruddhassa nāma rājakumārassa datvā bahūhi amaccehi saddhiṃ tattha
anya-e0702n0:328_3: gantvā anurājatāvena rajjaṃ kārāpesi. Sāsanañca visodhāpetuṃ saddhammacakkasāmittheraṃ
anya-e0702n0:329: Anekasetibhinno kira rājā yonakaraṭṭhaṃ vijayakāle paṭhamaṃ sāsanassa patiṭṭhānabhūtamidanti katvā taṃraṭṭhavāsino karamarānītabhāvena na aggahesīti.
anya-e0702n0:330_0: Yathāvuttattheravaṃsesu ca eko lakunnanagare araññavāsī thero tattha nagare ajja
anya-e0702n0:330_1: asukasmiṃ ṭhāne eko matoti gihīnaṃ kathetvā yathākathitaṃ bhūtaṃ hutvā ayaṃ abhiññālābhīti pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:331_0: Tasmiṃyeva ca nagare mahāmaṅgalo nāma thero anekasetibhindassa rañño yujjhituṃ āgatakāle
anya-e0702n0:331_1: anekasetibhindo rājā maṃ pakkosissati, samānajātikaṃ dūtaṃ pessessatīti pakkositakālato
anya-e0702n0:331_2: paṭhamamevavadi. Yathāvuttaniyāmeneva pakkosanato ayaṃ abhiññā lābhīti kitti ghoso ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:332: Tattha nagare ñāṇavilāsatthero saṅkhyāpakāsakaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Taṃḷīkaṃ pana pattalaṅkattherassa vihāre vasanto sirimaṅgalonāma thero akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:333_0: Visuddhimaggadīpaniṃ pana saṃññvattaaraññavāsī uttarārāmo nāma eko thero. Maṅgaladīpaniṃ
anya-e0702n0:333_1: sirimaṅgalatthero. Uppātasantiṃ aññataro thero. Taṃ kira uppātasantiṃ sajjhāyitvā
anya-e0702n0:333_2: cīnarañño senaṃ ajinīti. Iccevaṃ yonakaraṭṭhe abhiññālābhīnaṃ ganthakārānañca therānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:333_3: ānubhāvena jinasāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāti. Evaṃ hetuphalasambandhavasena
anya-e0702n0:333_4: ādi anta sambandhavasena ca yathāvuttehi tīhi nayehi theraparamparā ghaṭṭetvā gahetabbā.
anya-e0702n0:337_0: 5. Idāni vanavāsīraṭṭhe sirikhettanagarasāsanavaṃsaṃ vakkhāmi. Jinacakke hi ekādhike
anya-e0702n0:337_1: vassasate sampatte jaṭilo sakko nāgo garuḷo kumbhaṇḍo candī paramīsvarocāti ime satta
anya-e0702n0:337_2: sirikhettaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpesuṃ. Tattha dvattapoṅko nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa
anya-e0702n0:337_3: kira tīṇi akkhīni santīti. Tadā bhagavato sāvakā arahantā tisahassamattā tattha vasiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:337_4: So rājā tesaṃ arahantānaṃ devasikaṃ catūhi paccayehi upatthambhi. Cha sarīradhātuyo
anya-e0702n0:337_5: ca ekekaṃ ekekasmiṃ nidahitvā cha cetiiyāni kārāpesi. Dakkhiṇabāhuṃ pana nidahitvā
anya-e0702n0:338_0: Uṇhīsadhātuṃ pana kaṅgarannagarato ānetvā ekampi cetiyaṃ kārāpesi. Taṃ pana tāva
anya-e0702n0:338_1: na niṭṭhitaṃ. Pacchā anuruddharājā gahetvā arimaddananagaraṃ ānetvā caññiṅkhu nāma
anya-e0702n0:338_2: cetiye nidhānaṃ akāsi. Tasmā rakkhitattherassa āgamanato pubbepi sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāsīti
anya-e0702n0:338_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tato pacchā sāsanaṃ dubbalaṃ hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n0:340_0: Mahāmoggaliputtatissattherena pana pesito rakkhitatthero vanavāsīraṭṭhaṃ gantvā ākāse
anya-e0702n0:340_1: ṭhatvā anamataggapariyāyakathāya vanavāsike pasādesi. Kathāpariyosāne panassa saṭṭhisahassānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:340_2: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Sattatisahassamattā pabbajiṃsu. Pañcavihārasatāni patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:340_3: Evaṃ so tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Teneva aṭṭha kathāyaṃ –
anya-e0702n0:345: Evaṃ vanavāsīraṭṭhe pubbeyeva sāsanaṃ ogāhetvā patiṭṭhahi. Na pana tāva sakalaṃ byāpetvā patiṭṭhahi.
anya-e0702n0:348_0: Jinacakke pana tettiṃsādhike catuvassasate kukkuṭa sīso nāma eko rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:348_1: Tassa rañño kāle bhagavato sāvakā arahantā pañcasatamattā ahesuṃ. Tesampi so rājā
anya-e0702n0:348_2: devasikaṃ catūhi paccayehi upatthambhesi. Sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino pana gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:351_0: Iccevaṃ vanavāsīraṭṭhe anekasatehi arahantattherehi sāsanaṃ puṇṇindusaṅkāsaṃ hutvā
anya-e0702n0:351_1: ativiya vijjotesi. Sāsanika ganthakārā pana mahātherā tattha na sandissanti. Arahantattherā
anya-e0702n0:351_2: pana rājūnaṃ āyācanaṃ ārabbha dhammasatthaṃ ekaṃ viracayiṃsūti porāṇā vadantīti. Iccevaṃ–
anya-e0702n0:363_0: 6. Idāni pana marammamaṇḍale aparantaraṭṭhe sāsanavaṃsaṃ vakkhāmi. Amhākañhi marammaraṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:363_1: suppādakatitthe vāṇijagāme vasante cūḷapuṇṇa mahāpuṇṇedve bhātike paṭicca bhagavato
anya-e0702n0:363_2: dharamānasseva atirekavīsativassakālato pabhuti sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Na pana tāva
anya-e0702n0:363_3: byāpetvā patiṭṭhāsi. Teneva puna sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanatthāya mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero
anya-e0702n0:364_0: Bhagavā pana lohitacandanavihāraṃ paṭiggahetvā sattasattāhāni nisīditvā samāgatānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:364_1: devamanussānaṃ dhammarasaṃ adāsi. Sattāhesu ca ekasmiṃ ahu caturāsītipāṇasahassānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:364_2: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Pañcasatamattehi ca pāsādehi āgacchanto antarāmagge saccabandhapabbate
anya-e0702n0:364_3: nisinnassa saccabandhassa nāma isino dhammaṃ desetvā chahi abhiññāhi saddhiṃ arahattaṃ
anya-e0702n0:364_4: pāpesi. Vāṇijagāme ca isidinnaseṭṭhi ādīnampi dhammarasaṃ pāyesi. Iccevaṃ saccabandhaisidinnamahāpuṇṇādayo
anya-e0702n0:367_0: Bhagavato parinibbutato pañcatiṃsādhike dvivassasate sampatte tatiyasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyitvā
anya-e0702n0:367_2: saddhiṃ catūhi bhikkhūhi aparantaraṭṭhaṃ pesesi. Aparantaraṭṭhañca nāma amhākaṃ marammamaṇḍale
anya-e0702n0:368_1: pasādesi. Sattatimattānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammarasaṃ pāyesi. Raṭṭhavāsino ca bahavo
anya-e0702n0:368_2: sāsane pabbajiṃsu. Rājakulatopi sahassamattā pabbajiṃsu. Itthīnaṃ pana atirekasaṭṭhisahassamattā
anya-e0702n0:368_3: pabbajiṃsu. Tañca na aggikkhandhopamasuttantaṃ sutvā pabbajantīnaṃ itthīnaṃ vasena
anya-e0702n0:368_4: vuttaṃ, atha kho ādito paṭṭhāya yāvacirakālā sāsanaṃ pasīditvā pabbajantīnaṃ itthīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:368_5: vasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmāti ce, itthīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santikeyeva pabbajituṃ
anya-e0702n0:368_6: yuttattā yonakadhammarakkhitattherena ca saddhiṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ anāgatattā. Evaṃ cirakālaṃ
anya-e0702n0:368_7: atikkamitvā pacchā bhikkhuniyo āgantvā tāsaṃ santike pabbajitānaṃ vasena vuttanti
anya-e0702n0:368_8: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīhaḷadīpe anuḷādeviyo pabbajitakāle mahāmahindattherassa saṅghamittātheriyā
anya-e0702n0:368_9: pakkosanatā idha ñāpakāti. Evaṃ yonakadhammarakkhitattheraṃ paṭicca aparantaraṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:371_0: Tatthāyaṃ adhippāya viseso gahetabbo. Kathaṃ. Aggikkhandhopamasuttantaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:371_1: paṭipattivasena vuttaṃ, taṃ bhikkhūnaṃyeva desetuṃ vaṭṭati, theropi tattha taṃ desesi,
anya-e0702n0:371_2: tasmā puṇṇasaccabandhādayo paṭicca bhagavato dharamānassa vīsativassakāleyeva sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:371_3: aparantaraṭṭhe patiṭṭhahitvā kasmiñci kasmiñci ṭhāne bhikkhūnaṃ saṃvijjamānattā tesaṃ
anya-e0702n0:371_4: bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgahetvā desetuṃ pacchā āgatānañca bhikkhūnaṃ parisuddhācārataṃ viññāpetuṃ
anya-e0702n0:371_5: aggikkhandhopamasuttaṃ thero desesīti. Evañca sati arimaddananagare samaṇakuttakānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:374_0: Yasmā pana buddhe, bhagavā puṇṇattherassa yācanamārabbha aparantaraṭṭhaṃ āgantvā
anya-e0702n0:374_1: vāṇije hi kārite candanavihāre vasitvā ekasmiṃ samaye ānandena pacchāsamaṇena tambadīparaṭṭhampi
anya-e0702n0:374_2: desacārikaṃ āhiṇḍi. Āhiṇḍitvā arimaddananagaraṭṭhānasamīpaṃ patvā pabbatamuddhani
anya-e0702n0:374_3: ṭhatvā anāgate kho ānanda imasmiṃ padese sammuti nāma rājā arimaddanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ
anya-e0702n0:374_4: māpessati, tasmiñca nagare mama sāsanaṃ virūḷaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhahissatīti byākāsi.
anya-e0702n0:375_0: Yonakadhammarakkhitatthero ca aparantaraṭṭhaṃ āgantvā tambadīparaṭṭhampi āhiṇḍitvā
anya-e0702n0:375_1: tambadīparaṭṭhavāsīnampi dhammarasaṃ pāyesiyeva. Ayamattho khattiyakulato eva purisasahassāni
anya-e0702n0:375_2: pabbajiṃsūti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā viññāyati. Tadā hi aparantaraṭṭhe khattiyo natthi,
anya-e0702n0:375_3: tambadīparaṭṭhindoyeva taṃ anusāsetvā ati vasati, khattiye ca āsante kuto khattiyakulāni
anya-e0702n0:375_4: bhavissanti, teneva tambadīparaṭṭhato purisasahassāni pabbajiṃsūti viññātabbaṃ. Tasmā
anya-e0702n0:376_0: Tenidāni tambadīpikāsāsanavaṃsaṃ pavakkhāmi. Amhākañhi marammamaṇḍale tambadīparaṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:376_1: arimaddananagare sammutirājā nāma bhūpālo rajjaṃ karesi. Tato paṭṭhāya yāva anuruddharaññā
anya-e0702n0:376_2: samathi nāmake dese nisinnānaṃ tiṃsamattānaṃ samaṇakuttakānaṃ saṭṭhisahassamattānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:377_0: Tesaṃ pana samaṇakuttakānaṃ ayaṃ vādo,- sace yo pāṇātipātaṃ kareyya, so īdisaṃ parittaṃ
anya-e0702n0:377_1: bhaṇanto tamhā pāpakammā parimucceyya, sace pana yo mātāpitaraṃ hantvā anantariyakammato
anya-e0702n0:377_2: parimuccitukāmo bhaveyya, īdisaṃ parittaṃ bhaṇeyya, sacepi puttadhitānaṃ āvāhavivāhakammaṃ
anya-e0702n0:377_3: kattukāmo bhaveyya, ācariyānaṃ paṭhamaṃ niyyādetvā āvāhavivāhakammaṃ kātabbaṃ, yo
anya-e0702n0:377_4: idaṃ cārittaṃ atikkameyya, bahu apuññaṃ pasaveyyāti evamādīhi micchāvādehi attano
anya-e0702n0:377_5: attano upagatānaṃ ovādaṃ adaṃsu. Tamatthaṃ sutvā anuruddharājā paricitapuñño tesaṃ
anya-e0702n0:377_6: vādaṃ na ruci. Ayaṃ tesaṃ micchāvādoti.
anya-e0702n0:378_0: Tadā ca arimaddananagare arahanto nāma thero āgantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Ayaṃ arahantattherassa
anya-e0702n0:379_0: Tatthāyaṃ rājavaṃsāgataṭṭhuppatti,– tadā hi sunāparantatambadīparaṭṭhesu sabbena
anya-e0702n0:379_1: sabbaṃ sabbadā thiraṃ sāsanaṃ na tāva patiṭṭhāsi. Teneva bhagavato byākataniyāmena
anya-e0702n0:379_2: sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmāti cintetvā mahātherā sakkassa devānamindassa santikaṃ gantvā
anya-e0702n0:379_3: sāsanaṃ anuggahituṃ samatthaṃ puggalaṃ dehīti yāciṃsu. Sakkoca devānamindo tāvatiṃsabhavane
anya-e0702n0:379_4: ekaṃ devaputtaṃ yācitvā ekissā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāpesi. Dasamāsaccayena
anya-e0702n0:379_5: vijāyanakāle sīlabuddhi nāma thero anurakkhitvā vaye sampatte pabbājesi. Tīsu piṭakesu
anya-e0702n0:379_6: ativiya cheko hutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahantoti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:380_0: Soca thero marammamaṇḍale jinasāsanaṃ vijjotāpetuṃ arimaddananagaraṃ āgantvā nagarato
anya-e0702n0:380_1: avidūre ekasmiṃ araññe nisīdi. Tadā sakko devānamindo ekaṃ nesādaṃ palobhetvā tassa
anya-e0702n0:380_2: theraṃ dassesi. Atha nesādassa etadahosi,– ayaṃ pana amanusso yakkho bhaveyya, sace
anya-e0702n0:380_3: pana manusso bhaveyya, evaṃ sati milakkhujātiko bhaveyyāti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā rañño
anya-e0702n0:380_4: dassanatthāya nagaraṃ ānesi. Thero ca aṭṭhaparikkhāre gahetvā anugacchi. Nesādā ca
anya-e0702n0:381_0: Rājā disvā santindriyo ayaṃ, na milakkhujātiko, imassa abbhantare sāradhammo atthi
anya-e0702n0:381_1: maññeti laddhasūriyobhāsaṃviya padumaṃ phullacittaṃ hutvā vīmaṃsetukāmo theraṃ āha,–
anya-e0702n0:382_0: Thero ca rājapallaṅkaṃ āruhitvā nasīdi. Rājā ca ayaṃ aggāsane nisīdi, avassaṃ aggapuggalo
anya-e0702n0:382_1: bhaveyyāti cintetvā tvaṃ kassa ñāti, kassa bhisso, kuto āgatosīti pucchi. Thero ca
anya-e0702n0:382_2: evamāha,– lokasmiṃ yo navaguṇasampanno bhagavā sammāsambuddho, tassāhaṃ ñāti, sobhagavāyeva
anya-e0702n0:383_0: Rājā ca somanassappatto hutvā āha, tava ācariyena desitaṃ dhammaṃ ekadesato desehīti.
anya-e0702n0:383_1: Atha yathā siridhammāsokarañño nigrodhasāmaṇerena appamādadhammo desito, evaṃ appamādadhammaṃyeva thero desesi.
anya-e0702n0:384_0: Rājā ca puna āha,– kuhiṃ dāni sammāsambuddho nisīdati, tena pana desito dhammo katippamāṇo,
anya-e0702n0:384_1: tassa sāvakā pana katippamāṇā, tumhādisā aññe atthi vā mā vāti. Idāni amhākaṃ ācariyo
anya-e0702n0:384_2: sammāsambuddho parinibbuto, dhātuyoyeva idāni atthi, tena pana desito dhammo caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassappamāṇo,
anya-e0702n0:384_3: sudhammapure piṭakattayaṃ yugaḷavasena tiṃsavidhā atthi, mayā añño paramattha sammutivasena
anya-e0702n0:385_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā bhiyyosomattāya pasanno hutvā puna ārocesi,– mama bhante imasmiṃ paccakkhe
anya-e0702n0:385_1: natthi tayā añño nātho, ajjabhagge pāṇupetaṃ maṃ upāsakoti dhārehi, tava ovādaṃ ahaṃ
anya-e0702n0:386_0: Tato pacchā araññakaṅgārahe ṭhāne vihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi. Samaṇakuttakānampii vādaṃ
anya-e0702n0:386_1: bhindi, yathā pana suvaṇṇapātiṃ labhitvā suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ labhitvā mattikābhājananti.
anya-e0702n0:386_2: Sakalepi ca raṭṭhe samaṇakuttakānaṃ vādaṃ jahāpesi. Tasmiñca kāle samaṇakuttakā hīnalābhā
anya-e0702n0:386_3: hutvā therassa upanāhaṃ bandhiṃsu. Te pana samaṇakuttakā araññe nissāmikāviya koleyakā
anya-e0702n0:387_0: Rājā ca tamatthaṃ ñatvā yathā samaṇakuttakā nābhibhavanti, tathā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:387_1: Te ca samaṇakuttake setavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā āvudhagāhayodhabhāvena rājakamme niyojāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:387_2: Thero ca sāsane pasanne jane pabbājetvā upasampādetvā sāsanaṃ visodhāpesi. Rājā ca
anya-e0702n0:387_3: imasmiṃ raṭṭhe porāṇikā rājāno samaṇakuttakānaṃ vādaṃ gahetvā rajjaṃ kāresuṃ, sace
anya-e0702n0:387_4: hi pana tesaṃ anatthakarajjaṃ puna gaṇhāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ, evaṃ sati ahaṃ tesaṃ anatthakarajjaṃ
anya-e0702n0:389_0: Sīhaḷadīpe kira vippavāsīnagare nisinno eko bhikkhuupadvārāvatīnagaraṃ gantvā pariyattiṃ
anya-e0702n0:389_1: uggaṇhi. Tato pacchā sudhamma puraṃ gantvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhi. Tasmiñca kāle sirikhettanagare
anya-e0702n0:389_2: pāṭalirukkhe eko gantho atthīti sutvā sudhammapurato sirikhettanagaraṃ agamāsi. Antarāmagge
anya-e0702n0:389_3: luddhako theraṃ passitvā ayaṃ yakkhoti maññitvā gahetvā anuruddharañño dassesi.
anya-e0702n0:390_0: Tadā rājā theraṃ pucchi,– ko pana tvanti. Ahaṃ mahārāja gobhamassa sāvakoti. Puna
anya-e0702n0:390_1: rājā pucchi,–tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ kīdisoti. Thero āha,– mahosadhapaṇḍitoviya mahārāja
anya-e0702n0:390_2: buddho daṭṭhabbo, umaṅgoviya dhammo, videhasenā viya saṅghoti. Evaṃ upamāhi pakāsito
anya-e0702n0:390_3: rājā puna pucchi,–kiṃ nukho ime gotamassa sāvakāti. Na kho mahārāja ime gotamassa
anya-e0702n0:390_4: sāvakā, ime pana amhehi visabhāgā samaṇakuttakāye vāti. Evaṃ vutte tato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0702n0:390_5: te samaṇakuttake vijahi, tiṇaṃ viya nātimaññi. Pāṭalirukkhasu siratopi laddhaṃ tesaṃ
anya-e0702n0:390_6: ganthaṃ laddhaṭṭhāneyeva agginā jhāpesi. Tampi ṭhānaṃ yāvajjatanā aggijhāpanathalanti pākaṭanti.
anya-e0702n0:391: Thero ca vimāna vatthuṃ rañño desesi. Rājā ca pasīditvā sirikhettanagarato arimaddananagaraṃ paccāgamanakāle ānesi.
anya-e0702n0:392_0: Idaṃ pana pāṭalisusire laddhaganthassa kāraṇaṃ,- tesañhi samaṇakuttakānaṃ abbhantare
anya-e0702n0:392_1: eko upāyaccheko samaṇakuttako attano vādānurūpaṃ ganthaṃ katvā sirikhettanagare dvattiṃsaratanakkhandhassa
anya-e0702n0:392_2: pāṭalirukkhassa susire pavesetvā punappunaṃ udakena temetvā mattikāya limpetvā puna
anya-e0702n0:392_3: tacaṃ uppādetvā uṭṭhāpesi. Tadā mayaṃ supine pāṭalirukkhe sāragantho atthabyañjanasampanno
anya-e0702n0:392_4: eko atthītii passāmāti kolāhalaṃ uppādesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā rājā sirikhettanagaraṃ gantvā
anya-e0702n0:392_5: taṃ pāṭalirukkhaṃ bhinditvā gavesento taṃ ganthaṃ labhi. Ganthe pana sakavādavasena
anya-e0702n0:392_6: samaṇakuttakasāmaññatā īdisāyeva, ete gotamāsāvakā hontii, etesaṃyeva ācāro saggamaggapathabhūtoti
anya-e0702n0:392_7: evamādīhi kāraṇehi vuttaṃ. Rājā ca pasīditvā samaṇakuttakānaṃ bahūni dātabbāni adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:392_8: Tato pacchā therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā taṃ agginā jhāpesīti evaṃ samaṇakuttakānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:392_9: vacanaṃ sutvā sirikhettanagaraṃ gantvā arimaddananagaraṃ paccāgacchanto theraṃ ānesīti
anya-e0702n0:392_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Arimaddananagaraṃ sampattakāle jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:392_11: Thero ca tattha sāsānaṃ visodhetvā nisīdi. Rājā devasikaṃ udakaṃ ānetvā aggamahesī
anya-e0702n0:392_12: pana devasikaṃyeva piṇḍapātaṃ ānetvā bhojesi. Uppannakaṅkhā kālepi taṃtaṃkaṅkhāṭṭhānaṃ pucchīti.
anya-e0702n0:394_0: Sudhammapure hi samāpattilābhī anomadassī nāma thero soṇuttarattherānaṃ vaṃsānurukkhaṇavasena
anya-e0702n0:394_1: saddhiṃ pañcahi bhikkhu satehi nisīdi. Tassa pana padhānasisso adhisīlonāma, tassa
anya-e0702n0:394_2: padhānasisso prānadassī nāma, tassa padhānasisso kāḷo nāma, tassa padhānasisso arahanto
anya-e0702n0:395_0: Idañca vacanaṃ-ko panesa uttarājīvamahātheroti. Ayañhi thero rāmaññadesiyaputto ariyavaṃsattherassa
anya-e0702n0:395_1: sisso. Ariyavaṃsatthero pana kappuṅganagaravāsī mahākāḷattherassa sisso. So pana
anya-e0702n0:395_2: sudhammanagaravāsino prānadassī mahātherassa sissoti kalyāṇī silālekhane vuttavacanena
anya-e0702n0:395_3: na sameti. Evampi sati yathicchita adhippāyo na nassatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:396_0: Evaṃ nānācariyānaṃ vādo nānākārena dissamānopi arahantattherassa arimaddananagare
anya-e0702n0:396_1: sāsanaṃ anuggahetvā patiṭṭhānatāyevettha pamāṇanti katvā nāvamaññitabbo. Sabbesañhi
anya-e0702n0:396_2: ācariyānaṃ vādepi arahantatthero arimaddananagaraṃ āgantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesīti
anya-e0702n0:397_0: Arahantatthero pana mūlanāmena dhammadassīti pākaṭo sudhammapuravāsī sīlabuddhittherassa
anya-e0702n0:397_1: sissoti daṭṭhabbo. So ca thero pubbeva pabbajjakālato catūsu vedesu sikkhitasippo.
anya-e0702n0:397_2: Pabbajitvā pana sāḷakathaṃ piṭakattayaṃ uggaṇhitvā pāraṃ gantvā sabbattha pākaṭo.
anya-e0702n0:397_3: Sokkatayanagaraṃ anetvā manussā pūjenti. Tattha dasavassāni vasitvā puna sudhammapuraṃ
anya-e0702n0:398_0: Tato pacchā jinacakke ekasaṭṭhādhike pañcasate sahasseca sampatte kaliyuge ekūnāsītādhike
anya-e0702n0:398_1: tisate sampatte anuruddharājā rajjaṃ pāpuṇi. Tadā arimaddananagare samaṇakuttakā
anya-e0702n0:398_2: mayaṃ gotamasāvakāti vatvā tiṃsatiṃsavaggā hutvā nisīdiṃsu. Vaggavasena kira sahassamattāti.
anya-e0702n0:398_3: Anuruddharājā ca tesaṃ samaṇakuttakānaṃ āgāriyābrahmacariyādīni sutvā na pasīdi.
anya-e0702n0:398_4: Evampi paveṇiyā āgabhattā na pajahi. Arahantaṃ pana theraṃ passitvā tato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0702n0:398_5: tesaṃ samaṇakuttakānaṃ nibaddhavattāni bhinditvā sāsane pasīdi.
anya-e0702n0:400: Nāma theraṃ paṭicca tatiyaṃ sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:401_0: Tasmiñca kāle arahantatthero anuruddharājānaṃ āha,-tīsu sāsanesu pariyattisāsane
anya-e0702n0:401_1: tiṭṭhanteyeva paṭipatti sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati, paṭipattisāsane tiṭṭhanteyeva paṭivedhasāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:401_2: tiṭṭhati, yathā hi gunnaṃ satepi sahassepi vijjamāne paveṇipa,likāya dhenuyā asati
anya-e0702n0:401_3: so vaṃso sāpaveṇī na ghaḷīyatii, evamevaṃ dhutaṅgadharānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satepi sahassepi
anya-e0702n0:401_4: vijjamāne pariyattiyā antarahitāya paṭivedho nāma na hoti, yathā pana nimikumbhiyo
anya-e0702n0:401_5: jānanatthāya pāsāṇa piṭṭhe akkharesu ṭhapitesu yāva akkharāni dharanti, tāva nidhikumbhiyo
anya-e0702n0:401_6: naṭṭhā nāma na honti, evamevaṃ pariyattiyā dharamānāya sāsanaṃ anantarahitaṃ nāma
anya-e0702n0:401_7: hoti, yathā ca mahato taḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:401_8: udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṃ, evamevaṃ mahātaḷākassa
anya-e0702n0:401_9: thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake buddhavacane sati udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā
anya-e0702n0:401_10: natthīti na vattabbaṃ, tesu sati padumādipupphasadiso paṭivedho natthīti na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:401_11: evaṃ ekantato pariyattimeva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā antamaso dvīsu pātimokkhasu vattamānesupi
anya-e0702n0:401_12: sāsanaṃ anantarahitameva, pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassāpi dhammābhisamayo
anya-e0702n0:401_13: natthi, anantarahitāya eva dhammābhisamayo atthi, idānipi amhākaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:401_14: paripuṇṇaṃ natthi, sarīradhātuyo ca natthi, tasmā yattha pariyattisāsanaṃ sarīradhātuyo
anya-e0702n0:401_15: ca atthi, tattha paṇṇākārena saddhiṃ dūtaṃ pesetvā ānetabbā, evaṃ sati amhākaṃ raṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:402_0: Evaṃ pana bhante sati kattha yācissāmāti. Suvaṇṇabhūmiraṭṭhe mahārāja sudhammapure
anya-e0702n0:402_1: tīhi vārehi piṭakattayaṃ likhitvā ṭhapesi, sarīradhātuyo ca bahū tattha atthīti.
anya-e0702n0:402_2: Rājā evaṃ bhanteti paṭiggaṇhitvā bahū paṇṇākāre paṭiyādetvā rājalekhanaṃ likhitvā
anya-e0702n0:402_3: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ ekaṃ amaccaṃ dūtaṃ katvā pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:403_0: Sudhammapurindo manohari nāma rājāpi maccheracitto hutvā tumhādisānaṃ micchādiṭṭhīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:403_1: ṭhāne piṭakattayaṃ sarīradhātuyo ca pahiṇituṃ na yuttā, tilokaggassa hi sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0702n0:403_2: sāsanaṃ sammādiṭṭhīnaṃ ṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhahissati, yathā nāma kesarasīharājassa vasā
anya-e0702n0:404: Dūtā paccāgantvā anuruddharañño tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā anuruddharājā kujjhi, tattakakapāle pakkhittatilaṃviya taṭa taṭāyi.
anya-e0702n0:405_0: Atha rājā nadīmaggena nāvānaṃ asītisatasahassehi nāvikānaṃ yodhānaṃ aṭṭhakoṭīhi senaṃ
anya-e0702n0:405_1: byūhitvā thalamaggena saddhiṃ catūhi mahāyodhanāyakehi hatthīnaṃ asīti sahassehi
anya-e0702n0:405_2: assānaṃ navutiisatasahassehi yodhānaṃ asītikoṭiyā senaṃ byūhitvā sayameva yujjhituṃ
anya-e0702n0:406: Taṃ sutvā manoharirājā sītatasito hutvā attano bahū yodhe saṃvidahitvā sudhammapurayeva paṭisenaṃ katvā nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:407_0: Atha athabbaṇavede āgatappayogavasena punappunaṃ vāyamantāpi nagaramūlaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ
anya-e0702n0:407_1: na sakkā. Tadā rājā vedaññuno pucchi,–kasmā panettha nagaramūlaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ na
anya-e0702n0:407_2: sakkomāti. Vedaññuno āhaṃsu,-athabbaṇavedavidhānaṃ mahārāja atthi maññeti. Atha rājā
anya-e0702n0:407_3: pathaviyaṃ nidahitvā matakaḷevaraṃ uddharitvā mahāsamudde khipesi.
anya-e0702n0:408_0: Ekaṃ kira manussaṃ hindukulaṃ jeṅgunāmakaṃ kīṭaṃ khādāpetvā taṃ māretvā hatthapādādīni
anya-e0702n0:408_1: aṅgapaccaṅgāni gahetvā chinnachinnāni katvā nagarassa sāmantā pathaviyaṃ nadahitvā
anya-e0702n0:408_2: ṭhapesi. Tadā pana nagaraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ sakkā. Nagarañca pavisitvā anuruddharājā
anya-e0702n0:408_3: manoharirājānaṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gaṇhi. Sudhammapure porāṇikānaṃ rājūnaṃ paveṇīāgatavasena
anya-e0702n0:408_4: ratanamayamañjūsāyaṃ ṭhapetvā pūjitaṃ sahadhātūhi piṭakattayaṃ gahetvā manoharirañño
anya-e0702n0:409_0: Arimaddananagaraṃ pana patvā dhātuyo ratanamayamañjūsāyaṃ ṭhapetvā sirisayanagabbhe
anya-e0702n0:409_1: ratanamañce sīsopadesassa samīpe ṭhapesi. Piṭakattayampi ratanamaye pāsāde ṭhapetvā
anya-e0702n0:409_2: bhikkhusaṅghassa uggahadhāraṇādiatthāya niyyādesi. Tato kira ānītaṃ piṭakattayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:410_0: Sudhammanagaraṃ vijayitvā piṭakena saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ānetvā sāsanassa patiṭṭhāpanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:410_1: jinacakke ekādhike chasate vassasahasse kaliyuge ca soḷasādhike catusate sampatteti
anya-e0702n0:411_0: Anuruddharañño kāle puññānubhāvena tiiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ paripuṇṇattā puṇṇagāmotii samaññā
anya-e0702n0:411_1: ahosi. Cirakālaṃ atikkante ṇṇakāraṃ lopavasena makārassa ca niggahita vasena pugamīti
anya-e0702n0:412_0: Anuruddharājāyeva cattāro mahāyodhe sīhaḷadīpaṃ pesetvā tatopi piṭakattayaṃ ānesi.
anya-e0702n0:412_1: Sīhaḷadīpato ānītapiṭakattayena sudhammapurato ānītapiṭakattayaṃ aññamaññaṃ yojetvā
anya-e0702n0:412_2: saṃsandetvā arahantatthero vīmaṃsesi. Tadā gaṅgādakenaviya yamunodakaṃ aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0702n0:412_3: anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ ahosi. Tehi piṭakehi aññānipi vaḍḍhetvā tipiṭakagabbhe ṭhapetvā
anya-e0702n0:413_0: Manoharirājānampi mraṅkapā nāma dese upaṭṭhākehi saha ṭhapesi. Tassa ca kira rañño
anya-e0702n0:413_1: mukhaṃ viravitvā kathaṃ sallāpentassa mukhato obhāso pajjalitvā nikkhami. So kadāci
anya-e0702n0:413_2: kadāci anuruddharañño santikaṃ āgantvā gāravavasena vandanādīni akāsi. Tadā anuruddharañño
anya-e0702n0:413_3: lomahaṃso uppajji ubbiggo ca. Tasmā tassa rañño nitthejatthāya buddharūpassa cetiyassa
anya-e0702n0:413_4: bhattaṃ pūjetvā taṃ gahetvā manoharirañño bhājesi. Tadā tassa tadānubhāvo antaradhāyi.
anya-e0702n0:413_5: Manoharirājā saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā saṃsāre saṃsaranto yāva nibbānaṃ na pāpuṇāmi, tāva
anya-e0702n0:413_6: paravase nānuvatteyyanti patthanaṃ akāsi. Sudhammapurato ābhataṃ attano santakaṃ
anya-e0702n0:413_7: manomaya maṇiṃ ekassa seṭṭhino santike vikkiṇitvā laddhamūlena pañcavāharajatena
anya-e0702n0:413_8: abhujitapallaṅkavasena ekaṃ mahantaṃ buddha bimbaṃ parinibbānākārena ekanti dve buddhappaṭibimbāni
anya-e0702n0:413_9: kārāpesi. Yāvajjatanā tāni santīti. Iccevaṃ anuruddharājā sudhammapurato sīhaḷadīpato
anya-e0702n0:416: Uttarājīvattheropi soṇuttarānaṃ vaṃsato sāsanaṃ gahetvā sudhammapurato arimaddananagaraṃ āgantvā sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:417: Idaṃ amhākaṃ marammamaṇḍale tambadīparaṭṭhe arimaddananagare uttarājīvattheraṃ paṭicca pañcamaṃ sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:418_0: Uttarājīvattherassa sīhaḷadīpaṃ gatakāle tena saddhiṃ gataṃ chappadaṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ
anya-e0702n0:418_1: sīhaḷadīpeyeva sīhaḷadīpikā pabbajiṃsu. Pabbajitvā ca chappadasāmaṇero pariyattiṃ
anya-e0702n0:418_2: uggaṇhitvā dasavassaṃ tattha vasitvā arimaddananagaraṃ paccāgacchi. Sivalittherañca
anya-e0702n0:418_3: tāmalindattherañca ānandattherañca rāhulatthe rañca anesi. Te pana therā tipiṭakadharā
anya-e0702n0:418_4: honti byattā dakkhā ca. Ayañcattho vitthārena heṭṭhā vutto.
anya-e0702n0:419_0: Arimaddananagaraṃ patvā arimaddana vāsīhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vinayakammāni akatvā
anya-e0702n0:419_1: puthu hutvā nisīdiṃsu. Narapatirājā ca tesu theresu ativiya pasīdi. Erāvatīnadiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:419_2: uḷumpaṃ bandhitvā tattheva upasampadakammaṃ kārāpesi. Cirakālaṃ atikkamitvā so gaṇo
anya-e0702n0:420_0: Narapatirājā ca te there saddhiṃ saṅghena nimantetvā mahādānaṃ adāsi. Tadā chaṇe
anya-e0702n0:420_1: ākappasampannaṃ rūpasobhaggappakkaṃ ekaṃ nāṭakittiṃ disvā rāhulatthero paṭibaddhacitto
anya-e0702n0:420_2: lepe laggitavānaroviya kaddame laggitamātaṅgoviya ca kāma guṇalepakaddamesu laggito
anya-e0702n0:420_3: sāsane viramitvā hī nāyāvattītuṃ ārabhi. Maraṇanti karogena abhibhūto viya atekiccho
anya-e0702n0:420_4: hutvā sesattheresu ovādaṃ dinnesu pinādiyi. Tadā sesattherā taṃ evamāhaṃsu,-mā tvaṃ
anya-e0702n0:420_5: ekaṃ taṃ paṭicca sabbepi amhe lajjāpetuṃ na arahasi, mā idha hīnāyā vattehi, mallārudīpaṃ
anya-e0702n0:420_6: gantvā yathāruciṃ karohīti pesesuṃ. Rāhulatthero ca kusimatitthato nāvaṃ āruyha mallārudīpaṃ
anya-e0702n0:420_7: agamāsi. Mallārudīpaṃ pattakāle mallārurājā vinayaṃ jānitukāmo saha ṭīkāya khuddasikkhāpakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:420_8: tassa santike uggaṇhitvā ekapattamattaṃ maṇiṃ adāsi. Soca taṃ labhitvā hīnāyāvattīti. Honti cettha,-
anya-e0702n0:422: Itthiyo nāma bhikkhūnaṃ, bhavanti idha verino.
anya-e0702n0:423: Tāva tiṭṭhantu duppaññā, mayaṃ porāṇikāpi ca;
anya-e0702n0:425: Tasmā hi paṇḍito bhikkhu, antamasova itthibhi;
anya-e0702n0:426: Vissāsaṃ na kare loke, rāgo ca duppavāritoti.
anya-e0702n0:427_0: Sesesu ca theresu chappado nāma thero paṭhamaṃ kālaṅkato. Sivalitāmalindānandattherāyeva
anya-e0702n0:427_1: tayo pariyattiuggahaṇadhāraṇādivasena sāsanaṃ upatthambhetvā arimaddananagare nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:427_2: Ekasmiñca kāle rājā tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ ekekaṃ hatthiṃ adāsi. Sivalitāmalindattherā
anya-e0702n0:427_3: paṭiggahetvā vane vissajjāpesuṃ. Ānandatthero pana kiñcipuranagaraṃ pahiṇitvā ñātakānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:427_4: dehīti kusimatitthaṃ gantvā nāvaṃ āropesi. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā sivalitāmalindattherātaṃ
anya-e0702n0:427_5: evamāhaṃsu,– mayaṃ pana āvuso hatthīnaṃ sukhatthāya vane vissajjema,tvaṃ pana adhammikaṃ
anya-e0702n0:427_6: karosīti. Kinnāma bhante ñābhakānaṃ saṅgaho na vaṭṭati, nanu ñātakānañca saṅgahoti bhagavatā vuttanti.
anya-e0702n0:428: Therā āhaṃsu,-sace tvaṃ amhākaṃ vacanaṃ nakareyyāsi,bhava icchānurūpaṃ karohi, mayaṃ pana tayā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ na karissāmāti visuṃ nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:429_0: Tato paṭṭhāya dve gaṇā bhijjiṃsu. Tato pacchākāle atikkante tāmalindatthero bahussutānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:429_1: byattibalānaṃ sissānaṃ anuggahatthāya gahaṭṭhānaṃ santike ayaṃ bahussuto ayaṃ mahāpaññoti
anya-e0702n0:429_2: evamādinā vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, evaṃ kate kulaputtā sulabhapaccayavasena sāsanassa
anya-e0702n0:429_3: hitaṃ āvahibhuṃsakkhissantīti katvā. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā sivalitthero evamāha,- kasmā
anya-e0702n0:429_4: tvaṃ vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā buddhappaṭikucchitaṃ kammaṃ karosīti. Bhagavatā
anya-e0702n0:429_5: attano atthāyayeva vacīviññattiṃ paṭikkhittā, ahaṃ pana paresaṃyeva atthāya vacīviññattiṃsamuṭṭhāpemi,
anya-e0702n0:429_6: nāttano atthāya, sāsanassa hi vepullatthāya evaṃ vacīviññattiṃsamuṭṭhāpemi. Sivalittheropi
anya-e0702n0:429_7: na tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ karosi, yaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ icchasi, taṃ taṃ karohi, ahaṃ pana tayā
anya-e0702n0:429_8: saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nakarissāmīti visuṃ hutvā saddhiṃ sakapakkhena nisīdi. Tato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0702n0:430: Evaṃ arimaddananagare arahantattherassa eko vaṃso, sivalittherassa eko, tāmalindattherassa eko, ānandattherassa ekoti cattāro gaṇā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:431: Tesu arahantattheragaṇo sudhammapurato paṭhamaṃ āgatattā purimagaṇoti vohāriyati, aññe pana pacchā āgatattā pacchāgaṇāti.
anya-e0702n0:432: Sivalitthero arimaddananagare yāvījīvaṃ sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā kaliyuge navutādhike pañcavassasate kāle kālamakāsi.
anya-e0702n0:433: Ānandatthero pana arimaddananagareyeva catucattālīsa vassāni sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā chanavutādhike pañcavassasate kāle kālamakāsi.
anya-e0702n0:434: Tāmalindattheropi yāvajīvaṃ sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā aṭṭhana vutādhike pañcavassasate kāle kālamakāsīti. Aho saṅkhārasabhāvoti.
anya-e0702n0:436: Laggo saso samitvāpi, disaṃ gacchati taṃ mukhaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:439: Iccevaṃ arimaddanapure arahantehi ca ganthakārehi ca puthujjanehi jinasāsanaṃ nabhe candoviya vijjotati.
anya-e0702n0:440: Tattha hi yadā anuruddharājā sudhammapurato sāsanaṃ ānesi, tadā arahantā chasatasahassamattā āgatā, sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino pana gaṇanapathaṃ vīti vattāti.
anya-e0702n0:441_0: Chattaguhindassa nāma rañño kālepi himavante gandhamādanapabbatato aṭṭha arahantā
anya-e0702n0:441_1: piṇḍāya rājagehaṃ āgamaṃsu. Rājā ca pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātena bhojetvā idāni kuto
anya-e0702n0:441_2: āgatatthābhi pucchi. Himavante mahārāja gandha mādanapabbatatoti. Atha rājā atippasanno
anya-e0702n0:441_3: hutvā idha temāsaṃ vassaṃ upagacchathāti yācitvā vihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi. Temāsampi
anya-e0702n0:442_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ arahantānaṃ gandhamādanapabbate nandamūlaguhaṃ viya ekaṃ guhaṃ māpetvā
anya-e0702n0:442_1: dassehīti yāci. Te ca arahantā nandamūlaguhaṃviya ekaṃ guhaṃ iddhiyā māpetvā dassesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:442_2: Rājā ca tāya guhāya sadisaṃ ekaṃ guhaṃ kārāpesi. Nandamūlaguhākārena pana katattā
anya-e0702n0:442_3: nandāti nāmampi akāsi. Iccevaṃ chattaguhindassa rañño kāle gandhamādanapabbate nandamūlaguhato
anya-e0702n0:443_0: Arahantabhāvo ca nāmesa yathābhūtaṃ jānituṃ dukkaro, anupasampannānaṃ uttarimanussadhammadassanassa
anya-e0702n0:443_1: paṭikkhittattā, arahattaṃ vā patvāpi vāsanāya appajahitattā. Arahāpi hi samāno ahaṃ
anya-e0702n0:443_2: arahāti anupasampannānaṃ kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati, arahattaṃ patvāpi ekacco vāsanaṃ pajahituṃ
anya-e0702n0:443_3: na sakkā, pilindavacchattheravatthucettha ñāpakaṃ. Evaṃ loke arahanta bhāvo jānituṃ
anya-e0702n0:443_4: dukkaro. Teneva mahākassapattherassa upaṭṭhāko eko bhikkhu attano upajjhāyassa mahākassapattherassa
anya-e0702n0:443_5: santike vasitvāpi tassa arahanta bhāvaṃ na jāni.
anya-e0702n0:444_0: Mahākassapattherañhi ekena saddhivihārikena saddhiṃ araññavihārato gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
anya-e0702n0:444_1: carantaṃ antarāmagge pattā diparikkhāre gahetvā pacchā gacchantoyeva ekosaddhi vihāriko
anya-e0702n0:444_2: evamāha,–lokasmiṃ bhante arahā arahāti pākaṭo, sutamattovāhaṃ bhavāmi, na kadāci
anya-e0702n0:444_3: diṭṭhapubboti. Taṃ sutvā thero pacchā parivattatvā olokento parikkhāre āvuso gahetvā
anya-e0702n0:444_4: arahantassa pacchāgacchantoyeva arahantabhāvaṃ na jānātīti āhāti.
anya-e0702n0:445_1: hi khaṇitti pādapabbataṃ gantvā paccāgamanakāle antarāmagge ekissā mātikāya maṇobhāsaṃ
anya-e0702n0:445_2: disvā idha puññaṃ kāretukāmo sakko dasseti maññeti manasikaritvā cetiyaṃ kārāpessāmīti
anya-e0702n0:446_0: Atha eko sīlabuddhi nāma thero evamāha,– puññaṃ mahārāja karissamīti idaṃ bhūmiparikammaṃ
anya-e0702n0:446_1: kārāpesi, evaṃ kārāpentassa te apuññaṃyeva bhavati, nopuññanti vatvā bahū sattā mā
anya-e0702n0:446_2: kilamantūti manasikatvā rañño daṇḍakammena tajjanatthāya raññā dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0702n0:446_3: nabhuñji. Rājā ca sace tvaṃ mayā dinnaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitukāmo bhaveyyāsi, mama
anya-e0702n0:446_4: vijite vasantoyeva tvaṃ mama piṇḍapātā na mucceyyāsi, raṭṭhavāsīhipi dinnapiṇḍapāto
anya-e0702n0:446_5: mayhameva santako, nanu nāma mama piṇḍapātaṃyeva tvaṃ bhuñjasīti āha.
anya-e0702n0:447: Sīlabuddhittheropi sace ahaṃ evaṃ bhaveyyāmi, sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā vasissāmīti cintetvā araññe vasi.
anya-e0702n0:448: Atha tamatthaṃ jānitvā nagaradvāre ārakkho eko yakkho rañño āgatakāle abhimukhaṃ ṭhitova bhayānakarūpaṃ nisīdi. Atha nānāvijjākammehi apanentopi na sakkā apanetuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:449_0: Atha rājā nimittapāṭhake pakkosāpetvā pucchi,-kena kāraṇena ayaṃ yakkho idha nisinnoti.
anya-e0702n0:449_1: Tvaṃ mahārāja sīlabuddhittheraṃ agāravavasena pubbe kathesi, yakkhāpi there ativiya
anya-e0702n0:449_2: pasannāti amhehi sutapubbā, taṃ paṭicca yakkho bhayānakarūpaṃ dassetvā nisinno bhavissatīti āha.
anya-e0702n0:450_0: Rājāpi amacce āṇāpesi theraṃ pakkāsathāti. Thero nāgacchi. Sīhaḷadīpaṃyeva gamissāmīti
anya-e0702n0:450_1: ārabhi. Tamatthaṃ sutvā rājā ekaṃ caturaṅgapaccayaṃ nāma amaccaṃ pakkosāpetvā tvaṃ
anya-e0702n0:450_2: gantvā theraṃ pakkosāhīti pesesi. Caturaṅgapaccayo ca chekatāya ekaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:450_3: buddhappaṭibimbaṃ nāvāya ṭhapetvā mahāsamuddatitthaṃ agamāsi. Atha theraṃ sampāpuṇitvā
anya-e0702n0:450_4: idāni idha bhagavā sammāsambuddho agamāsi, sīlabuddhitthero bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0702n0:450_5: dassanatthāya āgacchatūti dūtaṃ pesesi. Theropi bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa dassanatthāya
anya-e0702n0:450_6: āgacchatūti vacanaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ buddhagāravavasena avisahatāya āgacchīti.
anya-e0702n0:453_0: Nāvaṃ abhirūhitvā thero bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa vandanāmānapūjāsakkāradīni akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:453_1: Therassa evaṃ vandanāmānapūjāsakkārādīni karontasseva vegena nāvaṃ ānetvā gacchi.
anya-e0702n0:453_2: Atha caturaṅgapaccayo evamāha,– idāni bhante tumhākaṃ ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0702n0:453_3: sāsanaṃ paggaṇhituṃ yuttoti. Rājā ca amaccehi parivārito paccuggacchi. Nāvāya therassa
anya-e0702n0:453_4: hatthe gahetvā rājagehaṃ ānesi. Dvāraṃ pattakāle yakkho pathaviyaṃ nisīditvā theraṃ vandi.
anya-e0702n0:454_0: Rājā rājagehaṃ patvā theraṃ nānābhojanehi bhojesi. Evañca avoca,–ajjatagge bhante
anya-e0702n0:454_1: tvamasi mamācariyo, bhagavatova ovādaṃ sirasā paṭiggahetvā anuvattissāmāti attano
anya-e0702n0:454_2: pañcaputtepi therassa adāsi. Te ca pañcakumārā therena saddhiṃ anuvattiṃsu. Thero
anya-e0702n0:454_3: te pakkosetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi. Antarāmagge kappiyapathaviyaṃ pañca parimaṇḍalākārāni
anya-e0702n0:454_4: likhitvā tesaṃ rājakumārānaṃ dassetvā nivattāpesi. Rājakumārā paṭinivattitvā taṃ
anya-e0702n0:454_5: kāraṇaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā ca tumhākaṃ puññaṃ kārāpanatthāya dassetīti vatvā tulāvasena
anya-e0702n0:454_6: tehi rājakumārehi suvaṇṇaṃ samaṃ katvā tena suvaṇṇena mūlaṃ katvā bhagavato dharamānakāle
anya-e0702n0:454_7: passenadikosalaraññā kārāpitaṃ candanappaṭibimbaṃviya visuṃ visuṃ paṭibimbaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:455_0: Tesaṃ nidhānaṭṭhānabhūtāni pañca cetiyānipi sakko kamma vidhāyako hutvā patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:455_1: Ettha ca pubbe raññā pasīditvā therassa rājakumārā dinnā, mūlaṃ ratanattayassa datvā
anya-e0702n0:455_2: puna rājakumāre bhūjisse kāretukāmatāya thero evaṃ saññaṃ adāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:457_0: Arimaddananagareyeva narapati rañño kāle kassapo nāma thero desacārikaṃ caramāno
anya-e0702n0:457_1: polloṅkanāmakaṃ desaṃ, tadavasari. Atha dve mahallakapolloṅkā manussā there atippasannatāya
anya-e0702n0:458_0: Polloṅkamanussānaṃ atippasannataṃ paṭicca theropi polloṅkattheroti vohāriyati. Yadā
anya-e0702n0:458_1: ca pana so thero sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantukāmo ahosi, tadā sakko devānamindo byaggharūpaṃ
anya-e0702n0:458_2: māpetvā piṭṭhiyā yāva mahāsamuddatīraṃ ānesi. Mahāsamuddatīraṃ pana patvā nāvaṃ abhirūhitvā
anya-e0702n0:459_0: Mahāsamuddamajjhe pana patvā sā nāvā na gacchi, niccalāva aṭṭhāsi. Atha vāṇijā mantesuṃ,-amhākaṃ
anya-e0702n0:459_1: nāvāya alakkhī pāpajano atthi maññeti. Evaṃ pana mantetvā salākādānaṃ akaṃsu. Yāva
anya-e0702n0:459_2: tatiyampi therasseva hatthe salākā pubbe katakammavipākavasena nipati. Idaṃ pana
anya-e0702n0:459_3: therassa pubbe katakammaṃ,-thero hi tato attabhāvato sattame bhave ekasmiṃ gāme kuladārako
anya-e0702n0:459_4: hutvā kīḷanatthāya ekaṃ sunakhaṃ nadiyaṃ otāretvā udake kīḷamāpesi. Evaṃ kīḷamantaṃ
anya-e0702n0:459_5: sunakhaṃ sayameva urena uggahetvā tīraṃ ānesīti evaṃ pubbe katakammavipākavasena
anya-e0702n0:460_0: Tadā vāṇijā udakapiṭṭhe khipiṃsu. Atha sakko devānamindo kumbhīlarūpaṃ māpetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:460_1: āropetvā ānesi. Thero yakkhadīpaṃ patvā andhacakkhukānaṃ yakkhānaṃ mettānubhāvena
anya-e0702n0:460_2: cakkhuṃ labhāpesi. Yakkhā ca therassa guṇaṃ ñatvā dve yakkhabhātike adaṃsu. Thero
anya-e0702n0:460_3: ca sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā mahācetiyarūpaṃ lohapāsādarūpaṃ sarīradhātuṃ mahābodhibijāni
anya-e0702n0:461_0: Sumedhatthero ca halaṅkassa nāma nagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge mhattipāme puratthimāya
anya-e0702n0:461_1: anudisāya dinnanāmike vihāre vasi. Ṭhānassa pana nāmavasena therassopi dinnavihāro
anya-e0702n0:461_2: tveva nāmaṃ ahosi. Sopi thero paṃsukūliko lajjīpesalo sikkhākāmo jhānalābhī arahāyeva.
anya-e0702n0:461_3: So hi devasikaṃ devasikaṃ aṭṭhanavayojanappamāṇe pādacetiyaṃ gantvā vandi. Cetiyaṅgaṇavattañca
anya-e0702n0:461_4: akāsi. Tato āgantvā mhattigāme piṇḍāya cari. Idaṃ therassa nibaddhavattaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:462_0: Aparānipi vatthūni bahūni santi, sabbāni pana tāni vitthāretvā vattabbānipi ganthapāravabhayena
anya-e0702n0:462_1: na vakkhāma. Sabbānipi hi vuccamānāni ayaṃ sāsanavaṃsappadīpikā atippapañcā bhavissati.
anya-e0702n0:463_0: Sammāsambuddhassa hi parinibbānato yāvajjatanā therānaṃ paramparavasena saṅghaṭṭetvā
anya-e0702n0:463_1: ānayanamevettha adhippetaṃ. Yathāvuttāni pana vatthūni adhunā abhiññālābhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:463_2: akhettabhāvena pasaṅgañāṇappaṭibāhaṇatthaṃ arimaddananagare ca bahūnaṃ abhiññālābhīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:463_3: puggalānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānatā dassanatthaṃ vuttāni. Vuttañcetaṃ bhikkhunīkhandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ,–
anya-e0702n0:464_0: Paṭisambhidāpattehi vassasahassaṃ sukkhavipassakehi vassasahassaṃ anāgāmīhi vassasahassaṃ
anya-e0702n0:464_1: sakadāgāmīhi vassasahassaṃ sotāpannehi vassasahassanti evaṃ pañcavassasahassāni paṭivedhadhammo ṭhassatīti.
anya-e0702n0:465_1: chaḷābhiññehi vassasahassaṃ tevijjehi vassasahassaṃ sukkhavipassakehi vassasahassaṃ
anya-e0702n0:466_0: Aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vibhaṅgakathāyañca buddhānaṃ parinibbānato vassasahassameva
anya-e0702n0:466_1: paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti, tato paraṃ cha abhiññā, tatopi asakkontā tisso
anya-e0702n0:466_2: vijjā nibbattiṃsu. Gacchante kāle tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti.
anya-e0702n0:466_3: Eteneva nayena anāgāmino sakadāgāmino sotāpannāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:467_0: Evaṃ nānānayehi aṭṭhakathāyapi āgatattā adhunā loke ariyapuggalā bhavituṃ na sakkāti
anya-e0702n0:467_1: na vattabbaṃ. Ariyānameva khettassa adhunāpi sambhavato, sace āraddhavipassako bhaveyya
anya-e0702n0:467_2: so arahā bhavituṃ sakkāyevāti niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana nānābhāṇakattherānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:467_3: nānāvādavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettakeneva pana nānākārena vādo bhinnopi sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:467_4: bhijjatiyeva. Sāsanassa abhinnaṃyeva hi ettha pamāṇanti.
anya-e0702n0:468_0: Evaṃ marammamaṇḍale arimaddananagare anekehi arahantasatehi sāsanaṃ vijjotati. Bhagavato
anya-e0702n0:468_1: pana parinibbānato tiṃsādhikānaṃ navavassasatānaṃ upari parammaraṭṭhe señilaññikrodhināmena
anya-e0702n0:468_2: raññā samakālavasena sīhaḷadīpe rajjaṃ pattassa mahānāmarañño kāle buddhaghosabuddhadattattherehi
anya-e0702n0:469_0: Tato pacchā satisamādhipaññāmandavasena sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ ṭīkāyo akaṃsu. Arimaddananagare
anya-e0702n0:469_1: jinacakkesattanavutādhike chasate sahasse ca sampatte tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ mūlabhūtesu
anya-e0702n0:469_2: saddanayesu sotārānaṃ chekatthāya mahāsamuddeviya ānando nāma mahāmaccho tīsu piṭakesu
anya-e0702n0:469_3: sāṭṭhakathesu viloletvā aggavaṃso nāma thero saddanītippakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Arimaddananagare
anya-e0702n0:469_4: hi uttarājīvattherādīnaṃ sīhaḷadīpaṃ gamanato pubbeyeva tayo mahātherā pariyattivisāradā,
anya-e0702n0:469_5: mahāaggapaṇḍito, tassa saddhivihāriko dutiyaaggapaṇḍito, tassa bhāgineyyo tatiyaaggapaṇḍitoti.
anya-e0702n0:470_0: Tasmiñca kāle arimaddananagaravāsino saddakovidā bahavo santīti yāva laṅkādīpā kittighoso
anya-e0702n0:470_1: patthari. Tasmā sīhaḷadīpikā saddakovidā vīmaṃsetukāmā hutvā arimaddananagaraṃ āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:471_0: Sīhaḷadīpikā ca taṃ disvā upadhārentā saddavisaye ayaṃ ganthoviya sīhaḷadīpe gantho
anya-e0702n0:471_1: itthi, imasmiṃ pakaraṇe āgatavinicchayampi sakalaṃ na jānimhāti nānāppakārehi thomesunti
anya-e0702n0:472_0: Arimaddananagare sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā paccāgato chappado nāma saddhammajotipālatthero
anya-e0702n0:472_1: saddanaye chekatāya suttaniddesaṃ akāsi. Paramatthadhamme ca chekatāya saṅkhepavaṇṇanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:472_2: nāmacāradīpakañca. Vinaye chekatāya vinayagūḷatthadīpaniṃ sīmālaṅkārañca akāsi. Attanā
anya-e0702n0:472_3: kathānaṃ ganthānaṃ nigame saddhamma jotipāloti mūlanāmena vuttaṃ. Kusimanagare pana
anya-e0702n0:472_4: chappada gāme jātattā ṭhānassa nāmena chappadoti pākaṭo.
anya-e0702n0:473_0: Kukhananagare pana chappadoti vohāritopi eko thero atthi. So alajjī dussīlo. Ekacce
anya-e0702n0:473_1: pana nāmasāmaññalesamattena pattalaṅkaṃ sīlavantaṃ pesalaṃ sikkhākāmaṃ chappadattheraṃ
anya-e0702n0:473_2: alajjidussīlabhāvena upavadanti, yathā nāma sāmaññalesamattena mallaputtaṃ āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0702n0:474_0: Arimaddananagarayeva aloṅgacaññisūnāmakassa rañño kāle mahāvimalabuddhitthero cūḷavimalabuddhittheroti
anya-e0702n0:474_1: dve therā pariyattivisāradā ahesuṃ. Tesu mahāvimalabuddhitthero kaccāyanassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ nyāsaganthamakāsi.
anya-e0702n0:475_0: Keci pana sīhaḷadīpavāsī vimalabuddhitthero tamakāsīti vadanti. Cūḷavimalabuddhitthero
anya-e0702n0:475_1: pana vuttodayassa porāṇaṭīkamakāsi. Chandosāratthavikāsiniṃ saddhammañāṇatthero akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:475_2: Vacanatthajotiṃ pana vepullatthero akāsi. Nyāsaganthassaporāṇaṭīkaṃ narapatirañño
anya-e0702n0:476_0: So hi rañño ekaṃ orodhaṃ paṭicca jātaṃ ekaṃ dhītaraṃ disvā vānaroviya lepe laggito
anya-e0702n0:476_1: tissaṃ paṭibandhacitto hutvā laggi. Tamatthaṃ jānitvā rājā evamāha,– sace etaṃ iccheyyāsi,
anya-e0702n0:476_2: ekaṃ ganthaṃ paripuṇṇavinicchayaṃ gūḷatthaṃ karohi, sace tvaṃ tādisaṃ ganthaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e0702n0:476_3: sakkuṇeyyāsi, etaṃ labhissasīti. Atha so nyāsassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ porāṇaṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:477_0: Tato pacchā hīnāyāvattitvā dhītaraṃ datvā rajjuggāhāmaccaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi, yaṃ marammavohārena
anya-e0702n0:477_1: saṃpyaṅgaiti vuccati. Tena pana katattā sopi gantho taṃ nāmena vuccati. Kārikaṃ tassā
anya-e0702n0:477_2: ca saṃvaṇṇanaṃ chattaguhindassa nāma rañño kāledhammasenāpatitthero akāsi. Tena kira
anya-e0702n0:477_3: kārapite nandaguhāya samīpe nandavihāre nisīditvā akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:478_0: Tasmiñcakāle ganthamādanapabbate nandamūlaguhato arahantā āgantvā tasmiṃ vihāre vassaṃ
anya-e0702n0:478_1: upagacchiṃsu. Tesaṃ sammukhe katattā te ca ganthā paṇḍitehi sārato paccetabbāti ācariyā vadanti.
anya-e0702n0:479: Vāccavācakaṃ pana dhammadassī nāma sāmaṇero akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:480_1: samīpe ekasmiṃ gāme vasanto saddhammasiri nāma thero akāsi. Soyeva thero brahajaṃ
anya-e0702n0:481_0: Ekakkharakosaṃ pana saddhammakittitthero akāsi. So hi kaliyuge sattāsītādhike aṭṭhasate
anya-e0702n0:481_1: sampatte micchā diṭṭhikānaṃ jalumasaññitānaṃ kulānaṃ bhayena sakalepi tambadīparaṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:481_2: sāsanobhāso milāyati. Bahūnipi potthakāni aggibhayena nassesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:482_0: Tadā taṃ pavattiṃ passitvā sace pariyattidhammovinasseyya, paṭipattidhammopi nassissati,
anya-e0702n0:482_1: paṭipattidhamme nassante kuto paṭivedhadhammo bhavissatīti saṃvegaṃ apajjitvā imaṃ
anya-e0702n0:484_0: Kaliyuge ekāsītādhike pañcasate sampatte ekaṃ daharaputtaṃ kālaṅkataṃ paṭicca saṃvegaṃ
anya-e0702n0:484_1: āpajjitvā paccekabuddhattaṃ patthayantassa jeyyasiṅkhanāmakassa rañño putto kyacvānāmako
anya-e0702n0:484_2: rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Dhammarājātipi nāmalañchaṃ paṭiggaṇhi. Tīsu pana piṭakesu yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0702n0:485_0: So ca kira rājā pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu atichekatāya piṭakattaye sākacchamattampi
anya-e0702n0:485_1: kātuṃ samattho nāma natthīti uggahitatipiṭako hutvā bhikkhusaṅghampi divase sattahi
anya-e0702n0:486_0: Khaṇittipādapabbatassa samīpepi ekaṃ taḷākaṃ kārāpetvā tattha rājāgāraṃ kārāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:486_1: tattha nisīditvā ganthaṃ vāceti. Sabbāni pana rājūnaṃ kiccāni puttasseva uparājassa
anya-e0702n0:486_2: niyyādesi. Ganthaṃ uggaṇhantānaṃ orodhānamatthāya saṅkhepato saddabinduṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:486_3: paramatthabinduñca nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Tassa hi cittaṃ pariyattiyaṃyeva ramati.
anya-e0702n0:486_4: Aññaṃ pana rājakiccaṃ suṇitumpi na icchi. Anuruddharājā anāgate ahaṃ rājā bhaveyyāmi,
anya-e0702n0:486_5: tadāyeva imāni tāḷibījāni uṭṭhahantūti adhiṭṭhahitvā ropesi. Tāni tassa rañño kāle
anya-e0702n0:486_6: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Teneva anuruddharājāyevāyanti raṭṭhavāsino sañjāniṃsu. Sammutirājā hi
anya-e0702n0:486_7: anuruddharājā kyacvārājāti ime tayo ekasantānāti vadanti.
anya-e0702n0:487_0: So rājā ekampi cetiyaṃ akāsi, na taṃ niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi, pariyattiyaṃyeva paricārakattāti
anya-e0702n0:487_1: rājavaṃse āgataṃ. Lokasammutivasena kakkhaḷadine iṭṭhakāni kārāpetvā tasmiṃyeva dine
anya-e0702n0:487_2: bhūmisamaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva dine aññampi sabbaṃ kārāpesi. Tena marammavohārena prassadā
anya-e0702n0:488: Tassa rañño ekā dhibhā vibhatyatthaṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0702n0:489_0: Pubbe kira arimaddananagare uggahadhāraṇādivasena sāsanaṃ ativiya virūḷamāpajji.
anya-e0702n0:489_1: Arimaddananagareyeva hi eko vuḍḍhapabbajito bhikkhu ganthaṃ likhituṃ silālekhanadaṇḍena
anya-e0702n0:489_2: icchanto rājagehaṃ pāvisi. Rājā kena āgatosīti pucchi. Ganthaṃ likhituṃ silālekhanadaṇḍena
anya-e0702n0:489_3: icchanto āgato mhīti. Evaṃ mahallako tvaṃ ganthaṃ mahussāhena pariyāpuṇantopi ganthesu
anya-e0702n0:489_4: chekassa okāsaṃ na passāmi, sace himusalo aṅkuraṃ uṭṭhāpetvā rūheyya, evaṃ sati tvaṃ
anya-e0702n0:490_0: Tato pacchā vihāraṃ gantvā devasikaṃ devasikaṃ ekadantakaṭṭhappamāṇattaṃ lekhanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:490_1: uggahetvā kaccāyanaabhidhammetthasaṅgahappakaraṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā ācariyassa santike
anya-e0702n0:490_2: uggaṇhi. So acireneva ganthesu chekataṃ patvā musale jamburukkhaṅkuraṃ bandhitvā
anya-e0702n0:491_0: Atha taṃ rājā pucchi,-kenaāgatosīti. Ayaṃ mahāraja musalo aṅkuraṃ uṭṭhāpetvā rūhatīti
anya-e0702n0:491_1: ācikkhituṃ āgatomhīti vutte rājā etassa ganthesu chekataṃ pattomhīti vuttaṃ hotīti
anya-e0702n0:491_2: jānāsi. Taṃ saccaṃ vā alikaṃ vāti vīmaṃsanatthāya mahātherānaṃ santikaṃ pahiṇi. Mahātherāpi
anya-e0702n0:491_3: gūḷaṭṭhānaṃ pucchiṃsu. Sopi pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0702n0:492_0: Aatha so bhikkhu mahāthere evamāha,-tumhe bhante maṃ bahū pucchatha, ahampi tumhe
anya-e0702n0:492_1: pucchituṃ icchāmi, okāsaṃ dethāti yācitvā aññasamānacetasikanti ettha aññasaddassa
anya-e0702n0:492_2: avadhyāpekkhattā avadhipadaṃ uddharitvā dassethāti pucchi. Mahātherāpi pubbe amanasikatattā
anya-e0702n0:492_3: sīghaṃ vissajjituṃ na sakkhiṃsu. Rājā tamatthaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhacitto hutvā disā pāmokkhanamena
anya-e0702n0:492_4: ācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. So pana bhikkhu aganthakārakopi ganthakārakoviya pacchimānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:492_5: janatānaṃ dinnopadesavasena upakāraṃ katvā sāsane uppajjīti. Honti cettha,–
anya-e0702n0:503_0: Pubbe kira arimaddananagare mātugāmāpi ganthaṃ uggaṇhiṃsu. Yebhuyyena uggahadhāraṇādivasena
anya-e0702n0:503_1: pariyattisāsanaṃ paggahesuṃ. Mātugāmā hi aññamaññaṃ passantā tumhe kittakaṃ ganthaṃ
anya-e0702n0:503_2: uggaṇhatha, kittakaṃ ganthaṃ vācuggataṃ karothāti pucchi sunti.
anya-e0702n0:504_0: Eko kira mātugāmo ekaṃ mātugā,maṃ pucchi,-tvaṃ idāni kittakaṃ ganthaṃ vācuggataṃ
anya-e0702n0:504_1: karosīti. Ahaṃ pana idāni daharaputtehi balibodhattā byākulaṃ patvā bahuṃ ganthaṃ
anya-e0702n0:504_2: vācuggataṃ kātuṃ nasakkā,samantamahāpaṭṭhāne pana kusalattikamattaṃva vācuggataṃ karomīti āhāti.
anya-e0702n0:505: Idampi arimaddananagaravāsīnaṃ mātugāmānampi pariyattuggahaṇe ekaṃ vatthu,–
anya-e0702n0:506_0: Ekaṃ kira bhikkhuṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ ekā dvādasavassikā daharitthī pucchi,-kinnāmosi
anya-e0702n0:506_1: tvaṃ bhanteti. Khemānāmāhanti. Kathañhi bhante pumāva samāno itthiliṅgena nāmaṃ akāsīti
anya-e0702n0:506_2: āha. Atha antogehe nisinnā mātā sutvā dhītaraṃ āha,-tvaṃ rājādigaṇassa lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:506_3: na jānāsīti. Āma jānāmi, ayaṃ pana khemasaddo na rājādigaṇapakkhaṃ bhajatīti. Atha
anya-e0702n0:506_4: mātā evamāha,-ayaṃ pana khemasaddo ekadeseneva rājādigaṇapakkhaṃ bhajatīti.
anya-e0702n0:507_0: Ayaṃ panettha dhītu adhippāyo,-na rājādisaddo kadāci rājoti paccattavacanavasena
anya-e0702n0:507_1: okāranto dissati vinā devarājotiādisamāsavisayaṃ, khemasaddo pana katthaci khemoti
anya-e0702n0:507_2: ca khemanti ca liṅgantaravasena rūpantaraṃ dissati, teneva khemasaddo na rājādigaṇoti veditabboti.
anya-e0702n0:508_0: Ayaṃ pana mātu adhippāyo,-khemasaddo abhidheyyaliṅgattā tiliṅgako,yadā pana saññāsaddādhikāre
anya-e0702n0:508_1: paccattavacanavasena khemāti ākāranto dissati, tadā ekadesena khemasaddo rājādigaṇapakkhaṃ bhajatīti.
anya-e0702n0:510_0: Arimaddananagare kira ekassa kuṭumbikassa eko putto dve dhītaro ahesuṃ. Ekasmiñca
anya-e0702n0:510_1: kāle ghammābhibhūtattā gehassa uparitale nahāyitvā nisīdi. Atha ekā dāsī gehassa
anya-e0702n0:510_2: heṭṭhā ṭhatvā kiñci kammaṃ karontī tassa kuṭumbikassa guyhaṭṭhānaṃ olokesi. Tamatthaṃ
anya-e0702n0:510_3: jānitvā kuṭumbiko sākhaṃ olokesīti ekaṃ vākyaṃ bandhitvā puttassa dassesi,imassa
anya-e0702n0:510_4: atthayojanaṃ karohīti. Atha putto atthayojanaṃ akāsi,-sākhaṃ rukkhasākhaṃ olekesi
anya-e0702n0:510_5: udikkhatīti. Atha pacchā ekāya dhītuyā dassesi, imassa atthayojanaṃ karohīti. Sāpi
anya-e0702n0:510_6: atthayojanaṃ akāsi,- sā sunakho khaṃ ākāsaṃ olokesi udikkhatīti. Atha pacchā ekāya
anya-e0702n0:510_7: dhītuyā dassesi, imassa attha yojanaṃ karohīti. Sāpi atthayojanaṃ akāsi,-sā itthī
anya-e0702n0:510_8: khaṃ aṅgajātaṃ olokesi mukhaṃ uddhaṃ katvā olokesīti.
anya-e0702n0:512_0: Eko kira sāmaṇero ratanapūravāsī arimaddananagare mātugāmāpi saddanayesu atikovidāti
anya-e0702n0:512_1: sutvā ahaṃ tattha gantvā jānissāmīti arimaddananagaraṃ gato. Atha antarāmagge arimaddananagarassa
anya-e0702n0:512_2: samīpe ekaṃ daharitthiṃ kappāsavatthuṃ rakkhitvā nisinnaṃ passi. Atha sāmaṇero tassā
anya-e0702n0:512_3: santikaṃ maggapucchanatthāya gacchi. Atha daharitthī sāmaṇeraṃ pucchi,-kuto āgatosīti.
anya-e0702n0:513_0: Sāmaṇero āha,-ratanapūrato ahaṃ āgacchatīti. Kuhiṃ gatosīti vutte arimaddananagaraṃ
anya-e0702n0:513_1: gacchatīti āha. Atha daharitthī evamāha,-tvaṃ bhante saddayogavinicchayaṃ anupadhāretvā
anya-e0702n0:513_2: kathesi, amhayogaṭṭhāne hi tvaṃ nāma yogasaddena yojetvā kathesi, nanu paṇḍitānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:513_3: vacanena nāma paripuṇṇatthena aviruddhasaddanayena puṇṇindusaṅkāsena bhavitabbanti.
anya-e0702n0:513_4: Atha sāmaṇero khettavatthūni rakkhantī duggatā daharitthīpi tāva saddanayakovidā
anya-e0702n0:513_5: hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana bhogasampannā mahallakitthiyoti lajjitvā tatoyeva paṭinivattitvā paccāgamāsīti.
anya-e0702n0:514: Idaṃ marammamaṇḍale tambadīparaṭṭhe arimaddananagare theraparamparavasena sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:515: Idāni marammamaṇḍaleyeva jeyyavaḍḍhanaraṭṭhe ketumatīnagare sāsanavaṃsaṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n0:516_0: Kaliyuge hi dvisattatādhike aṭṭhavassasate sampatte jeyyavaḍḍhanaraṭṭhe ketumatīnagare
anya-e0702n0:516_1: mahāsirijeyyasūro nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Ekaṃ atichekaṃ devanāga nāmakaṃ ekaṃ hatthiṃ
anya-e0702n0:516_2: nissāya vijitaṃ vitthāramakāsi. Tassa pana rañño kāle kaliyuge dvinavutādhike aṭṭhavassasate
anya-e0702n0:516_3: sampatte mahāparakkamo nāma thero sīhaḷadīpato nāvāya āgantvā ketumatīnagaraṃ sampatto.
anya-e0702n0:516_4: Rājā ca dvārā vatīnagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge mahāvihāraṃ kārāpetvā tassa adāsi niccabhattampi.
anya-e0702n0:516_5: Tasmiñca vihāre sīmaṃ sammannitvā tissaṃ sīmāyaṃ tulāvasena attanā samaṃ katvā lohamayabuddhappaṭibimbaṃ
anya-e0702n0:516_6: kārāpesi. Tañca buddhappaṭibimbiṃ sampattalaṅkādīpanti nāmena pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:517_0: Tassa rañño kāle surāmerayasikkhāpadaṃ paṭicca vipādo ahosi. Kathaṃ. Bījato paṭṭhāyāti
anya-e0702n0:517_1: sambhāre paṭiyā detvā cāṭiyaṃ pakkhittakālato paṭṭhāya tālanālikerādīnaṃ puppharaso
anya-e0702n0:517_2: pupphato galitābhinavakālato paṭṭhāya ca na pātabboti kaṅkhāvitaraṇīṭīkādīsu vuttavacane
anya-e0702n0:517_3: adhippāyaṃ vipallāsato gahetvā tālanālikerādīnaṃ raso galitābhinavato paṭṭhāya pivituṃ
anya-e0702n0:517_4: na vaṭṭatīti ekacce vadanti. Ekacce pana evaṃ vadanti,–tālanālikerādīnaṃ raso galitābhinavakāle pivituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0702n0:519: Bījato paṭṭhāyāti ettha sambhāre paṭiyādetvā cāṭiyaṃ pakkhittakālato paṭṭhāya na pātabbo. Tālanālikerādīnaṃ puppharaso ca galitābhinavakālatoyeva na pātabboti.
anya-e0702n0:521_0: Bījato paṭṭhāyāti ettha sambhāre paṭiyādetvā cāṭiyaṃ pakkhittakālato paṭṭhāya na
anya-e0702n0:521_1: pātabbo. Tālanālikerādīnaṃ sambhārehi paṭiyādito puppharaso pupphato galitābhinavakālato na pātabboti.
anya-e0702n0:522_0: Evaṃ tālanālikerādīnaṃ raso galitābhinavakālato paṭṭhāya pātuṃ vaṭṭati na vaṭṭatīti
anya-e0702n0:522_1: vivādaṃ karontānaṃ majjhe nisīditvā sampattalaṅko mahāparakkamatthero tādiso pivituṃ
anya-e0702n0:522_2: vaṭṭatīti vinicchindi, surāvinicchayañca nāma ganthaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ ketumatīnagaraṃ
anya-e0702n0:522_3: māpentaṃ mahāsirijeyyasūraṃ nāma rājānaṃ nissāya ketumatiyaṃ sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhahi.
anya-e0702n0:526_0: Kaliyuge hi catusaṭṭhādhike chavassasate tayo bhātikā kittitaranāmakaṃ rājānaṃ rajjato
anya-e0702n0:526_1: cāvetvā khandhapuranagare rajjaṃ kāresuṃ. Tadā kittitaranāmakassa rañño eko putto
anya-e0702n0:526_2: cīnaraṭṭhindarājānaṃ yācitvā bahūhi senaṅgehi khandhapuranagaraṃ samparivāretvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n0:526_3: Atha tīsu piṭakesu chekaṃ ekaṃ mahātheraṃ pakkosetvā mantesuṃ. Thero evamāha,– janapadāyattamidaṃ
anya-e0702n0:526_4: kammaṃ samaṇānaṃ na kappati vicāretuṃ, ahampi samaṇo, nāṭakehi pana saddhiṃ mantethāti.
anya-e0702n0:526_5: Atha nāṭake pakkosetvā mantesuṃ. Nāṭakāpi sace kāraṇaṃ natthi, evaṃ sati phalaṃ na
anya-e0702n0:526_6: bhaveyya, sace pūti natthi, makkhikā na sannipateyyunti gītaṃ gāyitvā udake kīḷanti.
anya-e0702n0:527_0: Atha teca tayo bhātikā taṃ sutvā kittitaranāmakaṃ rājānaṃ bandhanāgārato gahetvā
anya-e0702n0:527_1: māretvā idāni yaṃ rajje ṭhapayissāmāti cintetvā tumhe gacchatha, ayaṃ tassa sīso,
anya-e0702n0:527_2: idāni esa paralokaṃ gatoti sīsaṃ dassesuṃ. Atha cīnaraṭṭhasenāyopi idāni rājavaṃsiko
anya-e0702n0:527_3: natthi, te nahi yujjhituṃ na icchāma, yaṃ rajje ṭhapayissāmāti katvā mayaṃ āgatā,
anya-e0702n0:527_4: idāni so natthīti vatvā nivattetvā agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:528: So ca thero nāṭakehi saddhiṃ mantethāti ettakameva vuttattā bhikkhubhāvato na mocetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuttañcetaṃ,–
anya-e0702n0:531: Tasmiṃ pana khandhapure arimaddananagare arahantagaṇavaṃsikā chappadagaṇavaṃsikā ānanda gaṇavaṃsikā ca therā bahavo vasanti. Tehi pana katagantho nāma koci natthīti.
anya-e0702n0:533: Idāni marammamaṇḍale tambadīpareṭṭheyeva vijayapure sāsanavaṃsaṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n0:534_0: Kaliyuge hi catusattatādhike chavassasate sīhasūro nāma rājā vijayapuraṃ māpesi.
anya-e0702n0:534_1: Tato pacchā dvīsu saṃvaccharesu atikkantesu camuṃnadiyaṃ matasetibhaṃ ekaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0702n0:534_2: ekasetibhinnoti tassa nāmaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi. Tassa rañño kāle vijayapure sīlavantā
anya-e0702n0:534_3: lajjīpesalā bhikkhū bahavo natthi. Arimaddananagarato anuruddharājakāle rājabhayena
anya-e0702n0:534_4: nilīyitvā avasesā samaṇakuttakāyeva bahavo atthi. Pacchā cūḷaarahantattheradibbacakkhuttherānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:534_5: āgatakāleyeva lajjīpesalā bhikkhū balavantā hutvā gaṇaṃ vaḍḍhāpesuṃ. Rājā ca dibbacakkhuttheraṃ
anya-e0702n0:534_6: antepuraṃ pavesetvā devasikaṃ piṇḍapātena bhojesi. Anuruddharaññā tambulamañjūsāyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:534_7: ṭhapetvā pūjitā satta dhātuyo labhitvā tāsaṃ pañcadhātuyo caññiṅkhucetiye nidhānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:534_8: akāsi. Avasesā pana dve dhātuyo puññassa nāma amaccassa pūjanatthāya niyyādesi. Soca
anya-e0702n0:535_0: Tadā ca kira samaṇakuttakā gahaṭṭhāviya rājarājamahāmattānaṃ santike upaṭṭhānaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:535_1: Kaliyuge catuasītādhike chavassasate sampatte sīsasūrarañño jeṭṭha putto ujano nāma
anya-e0702n0:535_2: rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. So pana avapaṅkyā nāmake dese campakakaṭṭhamaye sattavihāre kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:535_3: Dvi vassādhike sattavassasate kāle te vihārā niṭṭhaṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:536: Tesu vihāresu campakaṃ nāma padhānavihāraṃ amaccaputtassa sudhammamahāsāmittherassa adāsi. So pana thero arimaddananagare arahantattherassa vaṃsikoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0702n0:537: Veḷūvanaṃ nāma parivāravihāraṃ pana ābhidhammikassa ñāṇadhajassa nāma therassa adāsi. Sopi arahantattherassa vaṃsiko.
anya-e0702n0:538: Jetavanaṃ nāma parivāravihāraṃ pana sakalavinayapiṭakaṃ vācuggataṃ karontassa guṇārāmattherassa adāsi. So pana thero arimaddananagareyeva ānandattherassa vaṃsiko.
anya-e0702n0:539: Kulavihāraṃ nāma parivāravihāraṃ ādiccaraṃsino nāma therassa adāsi. Sopi ānandattherassa vaṃsikoyeva.
anya-e0702n0:540: Suvaṇṇavihāraṃ nāma parivāravihāraṃ sudhammālaṅkārassa nāma therassa adāsi. Sopi ānandattheravaṃsikoyeva.
anya-e0702n0:541: Nīcagehaṃ nāma parivāravihāraṃ varapattassa nāma therassa adāsi. So pana sudhammamahāsāmittherassa antevāsiko.
anya-e0702n0:542: Dakkhiṇakoṭiṃ nāma parivāravihāraṃ siripuññavāsino nāma therassa adāsi. Sopi sudhammamahāsāmittherassa antevāsikoti.
anya-e0702n0:543: Tesaṃ vihārānaṃ esannaṭṭhāne rājā sayameva hatthena gahetvā mahābodhirukkhaṃ ropesi. Tesaṃ vihārānaṃ paṭi jagganatthāya bahūnipi khettavatthūni adāsi ārāmagopaka kulāni ca.
anya-e0702n0:544: Tesaṃ pana therānaṃ sudhammapurārimaddanapurabhikkhuvaṃsikattālajjipesalatā viññātabbā. Teneva vijayapure sāsanaṃ ativiya parisuddhaṃ ahosīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:545_0: Tesampi sissaparamparā anekasahassappamāṇā ahesuṃ. Evaṃ lajjīpesalānaṃyo bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:545_1: santikā keci saddhivihārikā kīṭāgirimhi assajipunabbasukāviya alajjī dussīlā uppajjiṃsu,
anya-e0702n0:545_2: seyyathāpi nāma madhurambarukkhato ambilaphalanti. Te pana bahuanācāraṃ cariṃsuyeva.
anya-e0702n0:546_0: Rājā hi tadā tesaṃ vihārānaṃ paṭijagganatthāya bahūni khettavatthūni adāsi. Tesu
anya-e0702n0:546_1: khettavatthūsu balivicāraṇatthāya sudhammamahāsāmitthero ekacce bhikkhū ārakkhaṇaṭṭhāne
anya-e0702n0:546_2: ṭhapesi. Ārakkhaṇabhikkhū pana dhammānulomavasena kassakānaṃ ovādāpesi, khettavatthusāmibhāgampi
anya-e0702n0:546_3: paṭiggaṇhāpesi. Tasmiñca kāle khettavatthūni paṭicca bhikkhū vivādaṃ akaṃsu. Atha
anya-e0702n0:546_4: taṃ vivādaṃ sutvā sāsanadharatthero ca dve parakkamattherā ca tato nikkhamiṃsu. Nikkhamitvā
anya-e0702n0:546_5: sāsanadharatthero khaṇitti pādapabbate nisīdi. Dve parakkamattherā ca caṅgakiṅgapabbatakandare
anya-e0702n0:546_6: nisīdiṃsu. Tesañhi nivāsaṭṭhānattā yāvajjatanā taṃ ṭhānaṃ parakkamaṭṭhānanti pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0702n0:546_7: ahosi. Te pana therā ekacārāti vohāriṃsu. Avasesā pana bhikkhū gāmavāsībahucārāti
anya-e0702n0:546_8: vohāriṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya araññavāsīgāmavāsīvasena visuṃ gaṇā honti. Vihārassa ninnānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:547: Kaliyuge catuvassādhike sattasate ujanassa rañño dharamānasseva kaniṭṭhabhātiko kyecvā nāma rājā kumāro rajjaṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e0702n0:548_0: Ayaṃ pana tassa aṭṭhuppatti,– ujano nāma rājā tvaṃ samuddamajjhaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gantvā
anya-e0702n0:548_1: tattha nisīditvā tatruppādabaliṃ bhuñjāhīti niyyādesi. So pana rājakumāro luddakammesuyeva
anya-e0702n0:548_2: abhirammaṇasīlo. Ekasmiṃ samaye pigavaṃ gantvā paccāgatakāle rattiyaṃ supinaṃ passi,–
anya-e0702n0:548_3: sakko devānamindo āgantvā uposathasīlaṃ samādiyāhi, evaṃ sati acireneva setibhe labhissasatīti
anya-e0702n0:549_0: Soca rājakumāro tato paṭṭhāya uposathasīlaṃ samādiyi. Pacchā kālepi attano hatthe
anya-e0702n0:549_1: guthena kilinnaṃ bhavatīti puna supinaṃ passi. So acireneva pañca setibhe labhi.
anya-e0702n0:549_2: Atha eko amacco gantvā rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Rājā tuṭṭhacitto hutvā mama kira
anya-e0702n0:549_3: bhonto kaniṭṭhabhātiko pañca setibhe labhīti rājapurisānaṃ majjhe saṃvaṇṇesi. Amacco
anya-e0702n0:549_4: puna rājakumārassa santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Rājakumāropi mama bhātiko rājā
anya-e0702n0:549_5: akathitapubbaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ vadatīti ārādhayitvā puna gantvā tamatthaṃ rañño ārocāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:549_6: Rājāpi tatheva vadatīti. Taṃ sutvā rājakumāro bhiyyoso pasīdi.
anya-e0702n0:550_0: Kasmā pana ujano rājā kittitaraṃ nāma rājakumāraṃ kaniṭṭhavohārena na vadatīti. Ekasetibhindo
anya-e0702n0:550_1: hi rājā aparassa rañño deviṃ gabbhiniṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi, ṭhapetvā
anya-e0702n0:550_2: acireneva ujanaṃ vijāyi, teneva na ujano ekasetibhindassa putto, kittitaro nāma rājakumāroyeva
anya-e0702n0:550_3: ekasetibhindassa putto, tasmā taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca so taṃ kaniṭṭhavohārena na vadatīti.
anya-e0702n0:551_0: Kaniṭṭho pañcasetibhe labhatīti sutvā rājā bhāyitvā kaniṭṭhassa rajjaṃ upaniyyādesi.
anya-e0702n0:551_1: Rājā rājagehassa pacchimadvārena nikkhami. Kaniṭṭho purimadvārena pāvisi. Pañcannaṃ
anya-e0702n0:551_2: pana setibhānaṃ laddhattā pañcasetibhindoti pākaṭo. Mūlanāmaṃ panassa sīhasūroti
anya-e0702n0:551_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassa rañño kāle bahū alajjino gāmasāmanta vihāre vasitvā anekavidhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:551_4: ānācāraṃ cariṃsu. Sudhammapuraarimaddanapurato paramparavasena āgatā bhikkhūpi bahū
anya-e0702n0:552_0: Atha tassa rañño bhattaṃ paribhuñjanakāle eko samaṇakuttako aṭṭha parikkhāre gahetvā
anya-e0702n0:552_1: āgantvā rañño sammukhe aṭṭhāsi. Kimatthāya āgatosīti pucchite piṇḍapātatthāya āgatomhīti
anya-e0702n0:552_2: āha. Atha rājā sayaṃ bhuñjissāmīti ārabhitvāpi atippasannatāya pana suvaṇṇapātiyā
anya-e0702n0:552_3: paṭiyāditaṃ sakalampi bhattaṃ adāsi. Atha rājā evaṃ cintesi,– ayaṃ bhikkhu piṇḍapātatthāya
anya-e0702n0:552_4: upamajjhanti kayeva āgantvā aṭṭhāsi, na so puthujjanabhikkhu, atha kho abhiññālābhī
anya-e0702n0:552_5: arahā bhaveyya, mama puññatthāya āgato bhaveyya maṃ anukampaṃ upādāyāti.
anya-e0702n0:553_0: Evaṃ pana cintetvā ekaṃ rājapurisaṃ āṇāpesi tassa pacchā anugantvā oloketuṃ. So pana
anya-e0702n0:553_1: samaṇakuttako sayaṃ alajjibhūtattāva attano bhariyā paccuggantvā pattaṃ gaṇhi. Taṃ
anya-e0702n0:553_2: disvā rājapuriso rañño santikaṃ gantvā paṭhamameva evaṃ cintesi,– sace yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0702n0:553_3: āroceyyaṃ, rañño pasādo vinasseyya, evaṃ pana anārocetvā yathā rañño passādo bhiyyosomattāya
anya-e0702n0:553_4: bhaveyya, mayhampi lābho uppajjeyya, samaṇakuttakopi rājaparādhato vimucceyya, evaṃ
anya-e0702n0:553_5: ārocessāmīti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā ahaṃ mahārāja taṃ anugantvā olokesi, atha mama evaṃ
anya-e0702n0:553_6: olokentassava antaradhāyīti ārocesi. Rājā bhiyyosomattāya pasīditvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā
anya-e0702n0:553_7: yathāhaṃ maññami, tathā avirajjhanamevatanti tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi, rājapurisassa ca dātabbaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:554_0: Tasmiṃyeva divase eko amacco rañño paṇṇākāratthāya velāhakaṃ nāma ekaṃ turaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0702n0:554_1: adāsi. Atha rājā mama puññānubhāvena esa laddhoti sampahaṃsi. Taṃ pana turaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0702n0:554_2: ārohitvā ekaṃ hatthārohaṃ pājāpesi. Atha mahājanassa olokentassa hatthārohassa sīseveṭṭhanadussaṃyeva
anya-e0702n0:554_3: passitvā ākāse pakkhandho bakoviya paññāyati. So pana turaṅgamo pātova vijayapurato
anya-e0702n0:554_4: gacchanto pabbatabbhantaranagaraṃ sāyanhasamaye pāpuṇi. Abbha vijabbhanaassotipi nāmaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:555_0: Iccevaṃ samaṇakuttakā dārampi posesuṃ, pageva itaraṃ anācāraṃ. Teneva te samaṇakuttakā
anya-e0702n0:555_1: rañño mallaraṅgampi pavisitvā mallaṃ yujjhesuṃ. Tesu pana samaṇakuttakesu ovicaṅgākhuṃsaṅghajo
anya-e0702n0:555_2: nāma samaṇakuttako mallakamme ativiya cheko adhiko. So kira saṃvacchare saṃvacchare
anya-e0702n0:555_3: rañño mallaraṅge jayitvā pannarasa vā vīsati vā asse paṭilabhīti.
anya-e0702n0:556_0: Ratanapūranagare mallakamme aticheko adhiko eko kambojakulo atthi. So ratanapūranagare
anya-e0702n0:556_1: jeyyapuranagara ca attanā samathāmaṃ mallapurisaṃ asabhitvā vijaya puraṃ āgantvā
anya-e0702n0:556_2: campakavihārassa dvārasamīpe mallasabhāmaṇḍape pavisitvā mallakammaṃ kātuṃ icchāmīti
anya-e0702n0:556_3: rañño ārocesi. Atha rājā taṃ saṅghajaṃ āmantetvā evamāha,- idāni bho tvaṃ iminā saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:556_4: mallayuddhaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasīti. Āmamahārāja pubbe ahaṃ dahare hutvā kīḷanatthāyayeva
anya-e0702n0:556_5: mallakammaṃ akāsiṃ, idāni pana ekūnasattativasso ahaṃ ito pacchā mallayuddhaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e0702n0:556_6: sakkhissāmi vā mā vāti na jānāmi, idāni parapakkhaṃ mallapurisaṃ mallakammena māressāmīti vadati.
anya-e0702n0:557_0: Atha rājūnaṃ mallakammaṃ nāma kīḷanatthāyayeva bhavati, mā māretuṃ ussāhaṃ karohīti
anya-e0702n0:557_1: vatvā aññamaññaṃ mallayuddhaṃ kārāpesi. Saparisassa rañño olokentasseva te mallākārena
anya-e0702n0:557_2: naccitvā aññamaññaṃ samīpaṃ upagacchiṃsu. Atha saṅghajo mallo kambojamallassa pādena
anya-e0702n0:557_3: paharaṇākāraṃ dassetvā dakkhiṇahatthamuṭṭhinā kapāle pahāraṃ adāsi. Atha kambojamallassa
anya-e0702n0:557_4: mukhaṃ pacchato ahosi. Tadā sapariso rājā īdisā pana vimukhato maraṇameva seyyo idāni
anya-e0702n0:557_5: pana imaṃ passituṃ na visahāmīti vadati. Puna saṅghajo vāmahattha muṭṭhinā pahāraṃ
anya-e0702n0:557_6: adāsi. Atha kambojamallassa mukhaṃ parivaṭṭetvā yathā pubbe, tathā patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n0:558_0: Tasmiñca kāle sapariso khattiyo taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā dve asse tiṃsamattāni vattāni
anya-e0702n0:558_1: satakahāpaṇañca adāsīti. Idañca vacanaṃ porāṇapotthakesu āgatattā sādhujanānañca
anya-e0702n0:558_2: saṃvejaniyaṭṭhānattā vuttaṃ. Ṭhapetvā hi saṃvegalābhaṃ natthi aññaṃ kiñci payojananti.
anya-e0702n0:559_0: Kaliyuge terasādhike sattavassasate vijayapureyeva tassa putto kittitaranāmako rājā
anya-e0702n0:559_1: rajjaṃ kāresi. Vitarā sadisanāmavaseneva sīhasūroti nāmaṃ paṭiggaṇhi. Pitu rañño
anya-e0702n0:559_2: kāle laddhesu pañcasu setihesu catunnaṃyeva avasesattā catusetibhindoti nāmaṃ pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:559_3: Tene vāha abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkāyaṃ catusetibhindoti. Tassa rañño kāle caturaṅgabalo
anya-e0702n0:559_4: nāma mahāamacco ganthakovido abhidhānappadīpikāsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ akāsi. So pana sakalabyākaraṇavanāsaṅgañāṇācārī ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:560_0: Ekasmiñca samaye rājā ekaṃ mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā asukaraññā ayaṃ vihāro kārāpito,
anya-e0702n0:560_1: imasmiṃ vihāre sīlavantāyeva nisīdantūti kolāhalaṃ uppādesi. Atha sācaññināmagāmavāsī
anya-e0702n0:562_0: Sācaññigāme kira eko gahapati attano puttaṃ sippuggahaṇatthāya vihāre ekassa bhikkhussa
anya-e0702n0:562_1: santike niyyādesi. Puttassa pana vihāraṃ agantukāmassa tajjanatthāya sakaṇṭakagacchassa
anya-e0702n0:562_2: upari khipati. So ca daharo nikkhamitvā gehaṃ anāgatvā vihāreyeva nisīdi. Mātāpitūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:562_3: santikaṃ anāgantvā thokaṃ thokaṃ dūraṃ gantvā sāmaṇera bhūmito upasampadabhūmiṃ patvā
anya-e0702n0:562_4: arimaddananagaraṃ gacchi. Atipaññavantatāya pana pattappattaṭṭhāne mahāthero saṅgaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:562_5: Tenevesa sakalamarammaraṭṭhe pākaṭo ahosi. Atha mātāpitaro puttassa āgamanaṃ apekkhitvāyeva
anya-e0702n0:562_6: nisīdiṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pana sutvā esa amhākaṃ putto bhavissati vā no vāti vīmaṃsitukāmo
anya-e0702n0:562_7: pitā anugacchi. Arimaddananagare taṃ sampāpuṇitvā upaṭṭhapetvā nisīdi. Sopi bhikkhu
anya-e0702n0:562_8: yathāupaṭṭhāneneva santappetvā ganthaṃ uggaṇhi. Aparasmiṃ pana kāleso bhikkhu ajja
anya-e0702n0:563_0: Atha pitā evamāha,- na pubbe piyaputtaka tayā īdisaṃ vacanaṃ kathitaṃ, idāni pana
anya-e0702n0:563_1: tvaṃ abhiṇhaṃ īdisaṃ vacanaṃ chaṇasi, kāraṇamettha kinti pucchi. Pubbe ganthesu chekattaṃ
anya-e0702n0:563_2: appatvā ganthesu chekatthaṃ byāpannacittatāya na vuttaṃ, idāni pana mayā icchito
anya-e0702n0:563_3: attho matthakaṃ patto, tasmā kāyabalapariggahaṇatthāya mayā īdisaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanti
anya-e0702n0:563_4: vadati. Taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā pitā mātuyā santikaṃ gamanatthāya okāsaṃ yācitvā pitarā
anya-e0702n0:563_5: saddhiṃ sakaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanto vijayapuraṃ cetiyavandanatthāya pāvisi.
anya-e0702n0:564_0: Tadā raññā vuttavacanaṃ sutvā tasmiṃ vihāre aruhitvā nisīdi. Ārakkhapurisā ca taṃ
anya-e0702n0:564_1: bhikkhuṃ vihāre nisinnaṃ disvā tamatthaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā ca caturaṅgabalaṃ amaccaṃ
anya-e0702n0:564_2: āṇepesi,-gantvā tassa bhikkhussa ñāṇathāmaṃ upadhārehīti. Caturaṅgabalo ca gantvā
anya-e0702n0:564_3: taṃ bhikkhuṃ gūḷagūḷaṭṭhānaṃ pucchi. Sopi pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ vissajjesi. Caturaṅgabalo
anya-e0702n0:564_4: ca tamatthaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā tuṭṭhacitto hutvā taṃ vihāraṃ tassa bhikkhussa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:564_5: Tassa pana bhikkhussa daharakāle sakaṇṭakagacche pituno khipanaṃ paṭicca kaṇḍakakhipattheroti
anya-e0702n0:564_6: samaññā ahosi, mūlanāmaṃ panassa nāgitoti. Sotasmiṃ vihāre nisīditvā saddasāratthajaliniṃ
anya-e0702n0:564_7: nāma ganthaṃ akāsi. Tassa kira therassa kāle tasmiṃ nagare āraddha vipassanādhurā
anya-e0702n0:564_8: mahallakā bhikkhū sahassamattā ahesuṃ. Āraddhaganthadhurā pana daharabhikkhū gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
anya-e0702n0:565: Tassa pana pitarampi seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Teneva taṃ gāmaṃ seṭṭhigāmoti nāmena vohariṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:566: Kaccāyanavaṇṇanaṃ pana vijayapureyeva abhayagiripabbate nisinno mahāvijitāpī nāma thero akāsi. Vācako padesampi soyeva akāsi. Saddavuttiṃ pana saddhammagurutthero akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:567: Iccevaṃ vijayapure anekehi ganthakārehi sāsanaṃ vipulaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:568: Kaliyuge pana pañcāsītādhike chavassasate sampatte asaṅkhayācoyonnāmako rājā jeyyapuranagaraṃ māpetvā tattha rajjaṃ kāresi. Tattha pana rājūnaṃ kāle therehi katagantho nāma natthi.
anya-e0702n0:569_0: Kaliyuge chabbisādhike sattavassasate vesākhamāse jeyyapuranagaraṃ vinassi. Tasmiṃyeva
anya-e0702n0:569_1: saṃvacchare jeṭṭhamāse vijayapuraṃ vinassi. Tasmiṃyeva saṃvacchare phaggunamāse satvivarājā
anya-e0702n0:569_2: ratanapūraṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpetvā rajjaṃ kāresīti.
anya-e0702n0:571: Idāni marammamaṇḍale tambanīparaṭṭheyeva ratanapūranagare sāsanavaṃsaṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n0:572_0: Kaliyuge hi aṭṭhāsītādhike sattavassasate narapatirañño dhitāya saddhiṃ aloṅgacaññisūrañño
anya-e0702n0:572_1: putto ānandasūriyo nāma santhavaṃ katvā ekaṃ (siddhikaṃ nāma puttaṃ vijāyi. So vaye
anya-e0702n0:572_2: sampatte rajjasampattiṃ labhi. Tato pabhuti yāva mrenacodighā raññā arimaddananagare
anya-e0702n0:572_3: rajjaṃ akaṃsu). Tato pacchā sirisudhammarājādhipatīti laddhanāmo satvivarājā ratanapūranagare
anya-e0702n0:572_4: rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa rañño kāle kaliyuge ekanavutādhike sattavassasate sampatte laṅkādīpato
anya-e0702n0:572_5: sirisaddhammālaṅkāratthero sīhaḷamahāsāmittherocāti ime dve therā pañca sarīradhātuyo
anya-e0702n0:572_6: ānetvā nāvāya kusimatitthaṃ pāpuṇitvā rāmaññaraṭṭhe baññārani nāmena raññā nivāritā
anya-e0702n0:572_7: anisīdisvā tato soyeva rājā there yāva sirikhettanagarā pahiṇi. Tamatthaṃ ñatvā ratanapūrindo
anya-e0702n0:572_8: rājā cattālīsāya nāvāhi yāva sirikhettanagaraṃ paccuggantvā ānesi. Ānetvā ca mahānavagāmaṃ
anya-e0702n0:572_9: pattakāle saha orodhehi amaccehi ca sayameva rājā paccuggacchi. Ratanapūraṃ ppana
anya-e0702n0:572_10: pattakāle mahāpathavī cali, paṭinādañca nadi. Tadā rājā sammāsambuddhassa tilokaggassa
anya-e0702n0:572_11: sāsanaṃ paggaṇhissāmīti cintetvā sarīradhātuṃ ānetvā idha pattakāle ayaṃ mahāpathavī
anya-e0702n0:572_12: calati, paṭinādañca nadati, idaṃ amhākaṃ raṭṭhe jinasāsanassa cirakālaṃ patiṭṭhānabhāve
anya-e0702n0:573: Tāva tiṭṭhatu jīvamānassa sammāsambuddhassa ānubhāvo, ahovata sarīradhātuyāyeva anubhāvoti bahuraṭṭha vāsino pasidiṃsu. Honti cettha, –
anya-e0702n0:575: Kā kathā pana buddhassa, jīvamānassa seṭṭhassa.
anya-e0702n0:578_0: Kaliyuge dvenavutādhike sattavassasate tā pañca dhātuyo nidahitvā jeyyapuranagarato
anya-e0702n0:578_1: pacchimadisābhāge samabhūmibhāge cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Tañca cetiyaṃ ratanacetiyanti
anya-e0702n0:578_2: paññāpesi, hatthirūpabāhullatāya pana anekibhindoti pākaṭaṃ hoti. Tīhi sirigabbhehi
anya-e0702n0:578_3: sattahi dvārehī ca alaṅkataṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kārāpetvā dvinnaṃ sīhaḷadīpikattherānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:578_4: adāsi. Tato pacchā tesu mahantatthero sakavihārasamīpe pabbatamuddhani attano sissepi
anya-e0702n0:578_5: appavesetvā lajjīpesalabahussutasikkhākāmehi sabbehi tīhi therehi saddhiṃ sīmaṃ sammannati.
anya-e0702n0:578_6: Iccevaṃ sīmasammutipariyattivācanādikammehi marammaraṭṭhe sāsanaṃ virūḷaṃ katvā patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:580: Dve there paṭicca paṭhamaṃ sāsanassa patiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:581_0: Kaliyuge chabbīsādhike sattavassasate sampatte phaggunamāse satvavarājā ratanapūranagaraṃ
anya-e0702n0:581_1: māpesi. Tassa rañño kāle jeyyapuranagare ekā pūpikā itthī alajjino ekassa bhikkhussa
anya-e0702n0:581_2: santike dhanaṃ upanidahi. Aparabhāgesā taṃ dhanaṃ yāci. Atha so bhikkhu tava dhanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:581_3: ahaṃ na paṭiggaṇhāmīti musā bhaṇati. Evaṃ vivādaṃ katvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ rañño ārocesi.
anya-e0702n0:581_4: Rājā pakkosāpetvā sayameva taṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi,-tvaṃ bhante tassā itthiyā dhanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:581_5: paṭiggaṇhāsi vā mā vāti. Ahaṃ mahārāja samaṇo alikaṃ bhaṇituṃ na vaṭṭati, na paṭiggaṇhāmīti
anya-e0702n0:581_6: vadati. Taṃ kāraṇaṃ rājā ca punappunaṃ pucchitvā vīmaṃsanto bhikkhussa kerāṭikabhāvaṃ
anya-e0702n0:581_7: jānitvā taṃ samaṇo samāno bhagavato paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ akkamitvā musā bhaṇatīti
anya-e0702n0:581_8: kujjhitvā sayameva aparādhānurūpaṃ sīyaṃ chinditvā rājagehato heṭṭhā khipi.
anya-e0702n0:582: Tañca kāraṇaṃ sakalamarammaraṭṭhe pākaṭaṃ. Alajjībhikkhūpi aññe pāpakammaṃ kātuṃ na visahiṃsu. Raññā bhāyitvāyeva sikkhāpadaṃ na akkamesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:583_0: Kaliyuge tiṃsādhike sattavassasate sampatte maṅgakricvācoṅka nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:583_1: So pana rājā raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ sukhatthāya nimittaṃ gahetvā tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā rājagehaṃ
anya-e0702n0:583_2: paṭiggaṇhi. So ca rājā sakkarāje pañcacattālīsādhike sattavassasate sampatte caññiṅkhuṃ
anya-e0702n0:583_3: nāma cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Yaṅgaranāmakassa silāpabbatassa samīpe porāṇikaṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0702n0:583_4: cetiyaṃ nadīudakaṃ bhindi. Tadā sakaraṇḍakā pañca dhātuyo udake nimmujjantiyo erāpatho
anya-e0702n0:583_5: nāma nāgo gahetvā pacchā caññiṅkhuṃ nāma cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmīti raññā āraddhakāleyeva
anya-e0702n0:583_6: dāṭhānāgassa nāma therassa saha karaṇḍakena pañca dhātuyo niyyādesi. So ca thero
anya-e0702n0:583_7: rañño adāsi. Rājā dve dhātuyo muṭṭhocetiye nidhānaṃ akāsi. Tisso pana caññiṅkhuṃ
anya-e0702n0:584_0: So rājā kumārakāle sikkhāpakassa ācariyassa setacchattaṃ datvā saṅghanāyakaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:584_1: niyyādesi. Khemācāro nāma eko thero rattibhāge majjhantikakāle cetiyaṅgaṇe olambetvā
anya-e0702n0:584_2: ṭhapitaṃ bheriṃ anekavāraṃ pahari. Atha rājā rājagehatoyeva sutvā yathāṭhapitantiyāmavasena
anya-e0702n0:584_3: vihāre koci bhikkhu kālaṃ kato bhaveyyāti maññitvā vihāraṃ gantvā pucchāhīti dūtaṃ
anya-e0702n0:584_4: pesesi. Dūto vihāraṃ gantvā kāraṇaṃ pucchi. Bhikkhū ca evamāhaṃsu,- na amhesu kālaṅkatabhikkhu
anya-e0702n0:584_5: nāma atthi, atha kho sakko devānamindo idāni kālaṅkatoti bahūnaṃ manussānaṃ ñāpanatthāya
anya-e0702n0:584_6: bheriṃ paharimhāti. Puna rājā bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā pucchi,-kasmā pana bhante tumhe
anya-e0702n0:584_7: sakkassa devānamindassa kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ jānāthāti. Atha bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu,-bhagalato
anya-e0702n0:584_8: parinibbānakāle sāsanaṃ rakkhissāmīti sakko devānamindo paṭiññaṃ katvāpi idāni sāsane
anya-e0702n0:584_9: vasantānaṃ amhākaṃ anupālanakammaṃ nāma kiñci na akāsi, sace pana sakko devānamindo
anya-e0702n0:584_10: jīvamāno bhaveyya, sammāsambuddhassa santike paṭiññaṃ daḷaṃ katvā idāni appossukko
anya-e0702n0:584_11: na bhaveyya. Idāni pana sakkassa devānamindassa ārakkhaṇakammaṃ nāma kiñci na dissati,
anya-e0702n0:584_12: tasmā idāni sakko devānamindo kālaṅkatoti jānimhāti.
anya-e0702n0:585: Rājā taṃ sutvā khemācārattherassa pasīditvā vihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi. So ca thero sudhammapuravāsīnaṃ sīhaḷavaṃsikānaṃ mahātherānaṃ vaṃse bhavati lajjī pesalo hotīti.
anya-e0702n0:586_0: Ratanapūranagareyeva adhikarañño kāle ratanapūranagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge mahāsetuṃ
anya-e0702n0:586_1: kārāpesi. Tassa pana ācariyo saṅgharājā lajjīpakkhaṃ na bhajati. Teneva theraparamparāya
anya-e0702n0:587_0: Tassa rañño kāle chasaṭṭhādhike sattavassasate kaliyuge rājādhirājā nāma rāmaññaraṭṭhindo
anya-e0702n0:587_1: bhūpāloti sahassappamāṇāsu nāvāsu saṭṭhisatasahassehi yodhehi saddhiṃ nadīmaggena
anya-e0702n0:588_0: Atha adhikarājā bahavo amacceca bhikkhū ca sannipātāpetvā mantesi,-idāni rāmaññaraṭṭhino
anya-e0702n0:588_1: rājā yujjhanatthāya idha āgacchati, yuddhaṃ akatvā kenupāyena taṃ paṭinivattāpetuṃ
anya-e0702n0:588_2: sakkhissāmāti. Atha sabbe kiñci akathetvā tuṇhībhāveneva nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:589_0: Atha jātavassena ekattiṃsavassiko upasampadāvasena pana ekādasavassiko eko bhikkhu
anya-e0702n0:589_1: evamāha,-eko pana rāmaññaraṭṭhindo rājādhirājā tāva tiṭṭhatu, sace sakalepi jambudīpe
anya-e0702n0:589_2: sabbe rājāno āgaccheyyuṃ, evampi kathāsallāpeneva yuddhaṃ akatvā paṭinivattāpesuṃ sakkomīti.
anya-e0702n0:590: Atha adhikarājā tuṭṭhacitto hutvā āha,- yathā bhante tvaṃ sakkosi rājādhirājaṃ yathāsallāpena paṭini vatthāpetuṃ, tathā karohīti.
anya-e0702n0:591_0: Atha so bhikkhu mettāsandesapaṇṇaṃ pesetvā okāsaṃ yāci tassa rājādhirājassa santikaṃ
anya-e0702n0:591_1: pavisitukāmo. Rājādhirājā ca tassa bhikkhussa mettāsandesapaṇṇaṃ passitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0702n0:591_2: sīṅghaṃ ānethāti dūtaṃ pesesi. Dūto ānetvā rañño dassesi. Atha so bhikkhu rājādhirājaṃ
anya-e0702n0:591_3: dhammadesanāya ovādaṃ datvā sakaṭṭhānaṃ paṭinivattāpesi. Ayañca bhikkhu arimaddananagare
anya-e0702n0:591_4: catūsu gaṇesu arahantagaṇavaṃso sikkhākāmo lajjī pesalo. Arimaddananagare cāgahe
anya-e0702n0:591_5: nāma dese pana jātattā cāgruhi bhikkhūti vohāriyati.
anya-e0702n0:592_0: Kaliyuge aṭṭhāsītādhike sattavassasate sampatte miññhaṅga dhammarājā ratanapūreyeva
anya-e0702n0:592_1: rajjaṃ sampatto. Tassa rañño kāle sīhaḷadīpato dve mahātherā ratanapūraṃ āgantvā
anya-e0702n0:593_0: Tadā kaliyuge aṭṭhasate sampuṇṇe porāṇakaṃ kaliyugaṃ apanetvā abhinavaṃ ṭhapetuṃ
anya-e0702n0:593_1: okāso anuppatto. Atha cāgrihi thero ca rājavihāravāsitthero ca evamāhaṃsu,- apanītabbakāle
anya-e0702n0:594_0: Atha rājā puna evamāha,-apanītabbe sampatte anapanetvā ajjhupekkhitvā vasantassa
anya-e0702n0:594_1: ko dosoti. Sace apanītabbe sampatte anapanetvā ajjhupekkhitvā nisīdeyya, raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:594_2: dukkhaṃ bhavissatīti vedasatthesu āgataṃ, sakkarājaṃ apanentopi rājā tasmiṃyeva vasse
anya-e0702n0:595_0: Atha rājā sattānaṃ sukhaṃ labhīyamānataṃ jānantoyeva mādiso attano bhayaṃ apekkhitvā
