anya-e0702n0:794_4: hontūti āṇaṃ ṭhapesi. Tato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā sakalepi marammaraṭṭhe pārupanavasena
anya-e0702n0:795_0: Ayamettha saṅkhepo,-tesañhi dvinnaṃ pakkhānaṃ sannipatitvā vacanappaṭivacana vasena
anya-e0702n0:795_1: vivādakathā vitthārena vuccamānā chapañcasāṇavāramattampi patvā niṭṭhaṃ na pāpuṇeyya.
anya-e0702n0:795_2: Yasmā pana sabbaṃ anavasesetvā vuccamānaṃ ayaṃ sāsanavaṃsappaṭīpikā atippapañcā bhavissati,
anya-e0702n0:796_1: amarapuranikāyikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ādibhūto ācariyo bahūpakāro. Amarapuranikāyoti tattherappabhavoti.
anya-e0702n0:797_0: Kaliyuge pana ekāsītādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte tassa rañño nattā siritribhavanādityapavarapaṇḍitamahādhammarājādhirājā
anya-e0702n0:797_1: nāma rajjaṃ kāresi. So pana amarapurato saṅkamitvā ratanapūraṃ catutthaṃ māpesi.
anya-e0702n0:797_3: sīlācāraṃ nāma theraṃ araññavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāmokkhaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Rājāgāranāmake
anya-e0702n0:798_0: Kaliyuge ekāsītādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte calaṅgapurato paññāsīhaṃ nāma
anya-e0702n0:799_0: Kaliyuge catūsīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte munindābhivaṃsadhammasenāpatimahādhammarājādhirājagurūti
anya-e0702n0:799_1: nāmalañchaṃ datvā mahājeyyabhūmivihārarammaṇīyaṃ nāma vihāraṃ datvā taṃyeva mahātheraṃ
anya-e0702n0:800: Ekasmiñca samaye mahāthere rājā pucchi,-catasso dāṭhā nāma cattālīsāya dantesu antogadhā vā, udāhu cattālīsāya dantehi visuṃ bhūtāti pucchi.
anya-e0702n0:801_0: Atha ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu,-catasso dāṭhā nāma cattālīsāya dantesu antogadhāti.
anya-e0702n0:801_1: Ekacce pana catasso dāṭhā nāma cattālīsāya dantehi visuṃ bhūtāti āhaṃsu. Atha rājā
anya-e0702n0:801_2: ganthaṃ āharathāti āha. Atha antogadhavādikā therā ganthaṃ āhariṃsu,- aññesaṃ paripuṇṇadantānampi
anya-e0702n0:801_3: dvattiṃsadantā honti, imassa pana cattālīsaṃ bhavissantīti ca.
anya-e0702n0:802_0: Dantāti paripuṇṇadantassa dvattiṃsadantaṭṭhikāni. Tepi vaṇṇato setā, saṇṭhānato anekasaṇṭhānā.
anya-e0702n0:802_1: Tesañhi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0702n0:802_2: ṭhapitaālābubījasaṇṭhānā, tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno,
anya-e0702n0:802_3: tato ekeko dvimūlako dvikoṭiko yānakaupatthamphinisaṇṭhāno, tato dve dve timūlakā
anya-e0702n0:802_4: tikoṭikā, tato dve dve catumūlakā catukoṭikāti. Uparimāya dantapāḷiyāpi eseva nayoti ca.
anya-e0702n0:803: Tassa kira uttaroṭṭhaappakatāya tiriyaṃ phāletvā apanītaddhaṃviya khāyati, cattāro dante dve ca dāṭhā na chādeti, tena naṃ oṭṭhaddhoti voharantīti ca.
anya-e0702n0:804_0: Tattha tassāti licchavino nāma rājakumārassa, uttaroṭṭhaappakatāyāti upari oṭṭhassa
anya-e0702n0:804_1: appakatāya. Apanītaddhaṃ viyāti upari oṭṭhassa upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ apanītaṃ viya khāyatīti
anya-e0702n0:804_2: attho. Na chādetīti upari oṭṭhassa upaḍḍhabhāge pana na paṭicchādeti. Tenāhi yena
anya-e0702n0:804_3: cattāro dante dve ca dāṭhā na chādeti, tena naṃ licchavīrājakumāraṃ oṭṭhaddhoti voharantīti.
anya-e0702n0:804_4: Evaṃ antogadhavādehi therehi ganthaṃ āharitvā dassite sabbepi tasmiṃ vāde patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n0:805: Ekasmiñca kāle rājā mantiniṃ amaccaṃ pucchi,-pubbarājūhi vihārassa cetiyassa vā dinnāni khettavatthuādīni pacchimarājūnaṃ kāle yathādinnaṃ tāni patiṭṭhahanti vā mā vāti.
anya-e0702n0:806_0: Atha mantiniāmacco evaṃ kathesi,- saṅghikāya bhūmiyā puggalikāni bījāni ropayanti,
anya-e0702n0:806_1: bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbānīti dasakoṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmissāmikānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:806_2: dātabboti ca vinayapāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā pubbe ekena raññā dinnāni khettavatthuādīni
anya-e0702n0:806_3: pacchā ekassa rañño kāle yathādinnaṃ ṭhitāni. Ettha hi saṅghikāya bhūmiyāti vuttattā
anya-e0702n0:806_4: lābhasīmāyaṃviya baliṃyeva adatvā saha bhūmiyā dinnattā paveṇīvasena saṅghikā bhūmi
anya-e0702n0:806_5: atthīti viññāyati. Etthaca paṭiggāhakesu matesu tadañño catuddisasaṅgho anāgatasaṅgho
anya-e0702n0:806_6: ca issaro, tassa santako, tena vicāretabboti.
anya-e0702n0:807_0: Cetiya padīpatthāya paṭisaṅkhāraṇatthāya vā diinnaārāmopi jaggitabbo, vettanaṃ atvāpi
anya-e0702n0:807_1: jaggāpetabboti cetiye chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā paṭisaṅkharontena sudhākammādīni
anya-e0702n0:807_2: vā karontena cetiyassa upanikkhepato kāretabbanti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pubbarājūhi
anya-e0702n0:807_3: cetiyassa dinnāni khettavatthuādīni pacchimarājūnaṃ kālepi cetiyasantakasāveneva
anya-e0702n0:808: Athāparampi pucchi,- kadā kassa rañño kāle ādiṃ katvā khettavatthuādīni vihārassa cetyassa vā dinnānīti.
anya-e0702n0:809_0: Atha mantinamacco evamāha,-purimakappesu purimānaṃ rājūnaṃ kālepi vihārassa cetiyassa
anya-e0702n0:809_1: vā dinnānīti veditabbāni, teneva sujātassa nāma bhagavato amhākaṃ bodhisatto cakkavattirājā
anya-e0702n0:809_2: saddhiṃ sattahi ratanehi dvisahasse khuddakadīpe cattāro mahādīpe ca adāsi, raṭṭhavāsino
anya-e0702n0:809_3: ca ārāmagopakakiccaṃ kārāpesīti ganthesu āgataṃ, tasmā cirakālatoyeva paṭṭhāya pubbarājūhi
anya-e0702n0:810_0: Rājavaṃsesupi bhagavato parinibbānato vassasatānaṃ upari sirikhettanagare ekāya āpūpikāya
anya-e0702n0:810_1: pañcakarīsa mattaṃ khettaṃ ekassa therassa dinnaṃ, taṃ dvattapoṅko nāma rājā vilumpitvā
anya-e0702n0:810_2: gaṇhi. Atha pahāraghaṇṭabheriyo paharitāpi saddaṃ na akaṃsu. Rañño kuntacakkampi
anya-e0702n0:810_3: yathā pubbe, tathā pesitaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchi. Atha taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā āpūpikāya yathādinnameva
anya-e0702n0:811_0: Kaliyuge pana navanavutādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte tassa kaniṭṭho siripavarādityalokāpeti
anya-e0702n0:811_1: vijayamahādhammarājādhirānā rajjaṃ kāresi, so pana rājā ratanapūrato saṅkamitvā amarapuraṃ
anya-e0702n0:811_2: dutiyaṃ māpesi. Tassa rañño rajjaṃ pattasaṃvacchareyeva jeṭṭhamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:811_3: ratanapūranagare māravijayaratanasudhammāya nāma piṭakasālāya sūriyavaṃsassa nāma
anya-e0702n0:811_4: therassa parisamajjhe rājalekhanaṃ vācāpetvā saṅgharajjaṃ niyyādesi. Sūriyavaṃsābhisiripavarālaṅkāradhammasenāpatimahādhammarājādhirājagurūti
anya-e0702n0:812_0: So pana thero kaliyuge pañcavīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte migasiramāsassa
anya-e0702n0:812_2: sampatte saṅgharajjaṃ patto santindriyo khantī dhammo sikkhākāmo pariyattivihārado
anya-e0702n0:812_4: dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte tassa rañño kāleyeva maccuvasaṃ patto.
anya-e0702n0:813_0: Atha rājā anekasahassehi pāsādehi abhūtapubbehi acchariyakammehi sarīrajhāpanakiccaṃ
anya-e0702n0:813_1: akāsi. Atha kaliyuge seḷasādhike vassasate sahasseca sampatte tassa mahātherassa
anya-e0702n0:813_2: sissaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ nāma theraṃ puna saṅgharājaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Paṭhamaṃ ñeyyadhammālaṅkāradhamma
anya-e0702n0:813_3: senāpatimahādhammarājādhirājagurūti nāmalañchaṃ adāsi. Tato pacchā dutiyaṃ ñeyyadhammābhivaṃsasiripavarālaṅkāradhammasenāpatimahādhammarājādhirāja-
anya-e0702n0:814_0: So pana thero kaliyuge ekasaṭṭhādhike vassasate sahasseca devasūragāme paṭisandhiyā
anya-e0702n0:814_1: vijāto hutvā asītādhike vassasate sahasseca paṭhamaāsāḷimāsassa juṇhapakkhacuddasamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:815_0: Tassa rañño kāle kaliyuge navanavutādhike vassasate sahasseca sampatte sīhaḷadīpato
anya-e0702n0:815_1: paññātisso nāma thero saddhiṃ sunandena nāma bhikkhunā indasārena nāma sāmaṇerena
anya-e0702n0:815_2: ekena upāsakena ekena dārakenaca amarapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ sampatto. Atha saṅgharājā
anya-e0702n0:815_3: tesaṃ paccayānuggahena dhammānuggaheca anuggahesi. Tesu aparabhāge kaliyuge dvivassādhike
anya-e0702n0:815_4: dvisate vassasahasseca sampatte paññātissatthero jararogena abhibhūtattā saṅkhāradhammānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:815_5: sabhāvaṃ anativattattā kālamakāsi. Tassa puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmīti parivitakko matthakaṃ
anya-e0702n0:817: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vāti.
anya-e0702n0:818: Imasmiṃ pana loke paṇḍito puññaṃ kattukāmo abhitthareva kareyya. Ko nāma jaññā ajje vā suve vā parasuve vā maraṇaṃ bhavissabhīti. Tenāha bhagavā, –
anya-e0702n0:820: Dandañhi karato puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramatī manoti.
anya-e0702n0:821_0: Atha mahārājā tassa sarīrajhāpanakiccaṃ bahūhi sādhukīḷanasabhāyehi akāsi. Tato pacchā
anya-e0702n0:821_1: sunandassa nāma bhikkhussa puna sikkhaṃ adāsi. Sāmaṇeraṃ pana upasampadabhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:822_0: Te pana mahārājā kaliyuge tivassādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte māghamāse bahūhi
anya-e0702n0:822_1: paccayehi upatthambhetvā tānitāni sabbāni kammāni tīretvā kusimanagarajeṭṭhassa ekassa
anya-e0702n0:822_2: amaccassa bhāraṃ katvā tasseva sabbāni kiccāni niyyādetvā sīhaḷadīpaṃ pahiṇīti.
anya-e0702n0:823_0: Saṅgharājāmahāthero pana sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthāya sotārānaṃ sukhappaṭibodhanatthāya
anya-e0702n0:823_1: nānāganthehi pāṭhaṃ visodhetvā saddhammappajjotikāya nāma mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0702n0:823_2: atthayojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi. Bahūnaṃ sissānaṃ pariyattivācanavasena jinasāsanassa anuggahaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0702n0:824_0: Aparabhāge kaliyuge aṭṭhavassādhike dvisake sahasseca sampatte migasiramāsassa juṇhapakkhaaṭṭhamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:825: Sopi sīlavā pariyattikovido sikkhākāmo lajjīpesalo. Aṅguttaranikāyapāḷiyā tadaṭṭhakathāyaca attha yojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:826_1: gurutthero saddhammavilāsiniyā nāma paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāya atthayojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:829_1: sisso upasampadāvasena pañcavassiko paññāsāmi nāmāhaṃ saddatthabhedacintānāmakassaganthassa
anya-e0702n0:829_2: gaṇṭhipadatthavaṇṇanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsiṃ. Dasavassikakāle pana abhidhānappadīpikāsaṃvaṇṇanāya
anya-e0702n0:829_3: atthayojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsiṃ. Tassāca pāṭhaṃ bahūhi ganthehi saṃsadditvā visodhesinti.
anya-e0702n0:830_0: Aparabhāge sakkarāje cuddasādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte ayaṃ amhākaṃ dhammiko
anya-e0702n0:830_1: rājā anekasatajātīsu upacitapuññānubhāvena jinasāsanassa paggaṇhanatthāya sammādevalokapālehi
anya-e0702n0:830_3: manoratho matthakaṃ patto ahosi. Mariyādaṃ bhinditvā dinnakatamaggaṃviya udakaṃ laddhokāsatāya
anya-e0702n0:830_4: saddhā mahogho avattharitvā tiṭṭhati. Cattārica vassāni atikkamitvā besākhamāse pañcakakudhabhaṇḍādīhi
anya-e0702n0:830_5: anekehi rājabhoggabhaṇḍehi parivāretvā udumbarabhaddapiṭṭhe saddhiṃ mahesiyā abhisekaṃ
anya-e0702n0:832: Sakkarāje hi sampattiṃ, patvā dāne rato vate.
anya-e0702n0:834: Saddhiṃ mahesiyā sekaṃ, patto hutvā mahātale.
anya-e0702n0:839_0: Tadā yasmā alajjino niggahitabbapuggale avīcinarake nikkhipantoviya niggahakammaṃ
anya-e0702n0:839_1: akāsi, tasmā te aladdhokāsā nilīyanti, yathā aruṇuggamanakāle kosiyāti. Tenāvocumhā
anya-e0702n0:840: Tadā pana jinacakkaṃ, nabhe candova pākaṭaṃ;
anya-e0702n0:842_0: Yasmāca lajjino paggahitabbapuggale bhavaggeukkhipantoviya paggahakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0702n0:842_1: tasmā te laddhokāsā uṭṭhitasīsā nirāsaṅkā hutvā tiṭṭhanti, yathā candimasūriyālokānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_0: Tepiṭakampi navaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ kattukāmo pariyattivissaradehi mahātherehi
anya-e0702n0:845_1: visodhāpetvā lekhakānaṃ bhatiṃ datvā kaṇṭhajamuddhajādividhānaṃ sithiladhanitādividhānañca
anya-e0702n0:845_2: punappunaṃ vicāretvā antamaso paricchedalekhamattampi avirādhetvā antepuraṃ pavisetvā
anya-e0702n0:845_3: suvaṇṇamayesu lohamayesuca potthakesu likhāpesi. Ñāṇathāmasampanneca bhikkhū vicinetvā
anya-e0702n0:845_4: yathābalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhāreti vācuggataṃ kārāpeti. Aggamahesiṃ ādiṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_5: katvā sakala orodhādayo bahū rājasevakā amaccādayo nāgarikeca yathābalaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_7: dhāreti vācuggataṃ kārāpeti. Sayañca anattalakkhaṇādikaṃ anekavidhaṃ suttaṃ devasikaṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_8: sajjhāyaṃ karoti. Jinasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthāyasakalavijiteca araññavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_9: assamassa samantato pañcadhanusatappamāṇe ṭhānethaladakacarānaṃ sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_10: abhayaṃ adāsi. Pariyatti visāradānañca therānutherānaṃ mātāpitādayo ñātake sabbarājakiccato
anya-e0702n0:845_11: balikammatoca mocāpetvā yathāsukhaṃ vasāpeti. Ekāhenevāpi sahassamatte kulaputte
anya-e0702n0:845_12: pabbajūpasampadabhūmīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhi. Aññānipi bahūni puññakammāni
anya-e0702n0:845_13: karoti. Katvāca vivaṭṭameva pattheti, no vaṭṭaṃ. Aññeca orodhādayo tumhe yāni kānici
anya-e0702n0:845_14: puññakammāni katvā vivaṭṭameva pattheta, mā vaṭṭanti abhiṇhaṃ ovadati. Aniccalakkhaṇādisaṃyuttāya
anya-e0702n0:845_15: dhammakathāya niccaṃ ovadati. Sayampi samathavipassanāsu niccāraddhaṃ akāsi. Rājūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_16: pana raṭṭhasāmikānaṃ dhammatāya kiccabāhullatāya kadāci kadāci okāsaṃ na labhati
anya-e0702n0:845_18: na moghavasena kālaṃ khepeti. Loke hi amaṅgalasammatānipi manussasīsakapālaṭṭhiādīni
anya-e0702n0:845_19: susāsanato ānetvā dantakaṭṭhādīni vā taṃsadisāni kārāpetvā attano samīpe ṭhapetvā
anya-e0702n0:846_0: Tadā pana amhākaṃ ācariyavaraṃ pariyattivisāradaṃ tikkha javanagacchirādiñāṇopetaṃ
anya-e0702n0:846_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagurūti tatiyaṃ laddhalañchaṃ taṃ bhikkhusaṅghānaṃ sakalaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:849_0: Tadāca amhākaṃ dhammikamahārājā sakkarāje ekūnavīsatādhike sahasse dvisateca sampatte
anya-e0702n0:849_2: sabbanagarālaṅkārehi parikkhittaṃ manussānaṃ cakkhulolatājanakaṃ nānāratanehi sampuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:849_4: māpesi, mandhātuviya rājagahaṃ, sudassano viyaca kusāvatīnagaranti. Tenāvocumhā nāgarājuppattikathāyaṃ,–
anya-e0702n0:854_0: Seyyathāpi nāma loke ālokatthikānaṃ sattānaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādento upakaronto
anya-e0702n0:854_1: udayapabbatato sahassaraṃsī divākaro uṭṭhahati, evamevaṃ marammaraṭṭhikānaṃ lajjīpesalānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:854_2: sikkhākāmānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gihīnañca pītisomanassaṃ uppādento upakāronto ayaṃ dhammikorājā
anya-e0702n0:855: Imañca dhammikarājānaṃ nissāya marammaraṭṭhe sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ ativiya joteti. Vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0702n0:856_0: Sāsanañca nāmetaṃ rājānaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhatīti. Ayaṃ dhammikarājāyeva na sāsanassūpakāro
anya-e0702n0:856_1: dhammacārī dhammamānī, apica kho dhammikarājānaṃ nissitāpi sabbaraṭṭhavāsikā sāsanassūpakārāyeva
anya-e0702n0:856_2: dhammacārino dhammamānino rājānugatā hutvā. Tenevāha mahābodhijātakādīsu, –
anya-e0702n0:858: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
anya-e0702n0:860: So cepi dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
anya-e0702n0:861: Sabbaraṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammikoti.
anya-e0702n0:862_0: Visesato pana dutiyaṃ amarapuraṃ māpentassa mahādhammarañño aggamahesiyā ajjavamaddavasohajjādiguṇayuttāya
anya-e0702n0:862_1: dhitā amhākaṃ rañño aggamahesī sammācārinī patibbatā. Sabbanārīnaṃ aggabhāvaṃ pattāpi
anya-e0702n0:862_2: samānā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātena surāmadena appamajjitvā puññakammesu appamādavasena niccāraddhavīriyā
anya-e0702n0:862_3: hoti. Niccaṃ pariyattiyā uggahaṇaṃ akāsi. Vedapāragūca ahosi. Sammāsambuddhasāsane
anya-e0702n0:862_4: ativiya pasannā aññāpi orodhādayo mahādhammarañño ovāde ṭhatvā dhammaṃ cariṃsu. Sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:862_5: pasīdiṃsuyeva. Uparājāpi mahādhammarājassa ekamātāpītiko mahādhammarājicchāya avirodhetvāyeva
anya-e0702n0:862_6: sakalaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ gihīnaṃ bhikkhūnañca atthahitamāvahati, seyyathāpi cakkavattirañño
anya-e0702n0:862_7: santike jeṭṭhaputto thāmajavasampanno atisūro uṭṭhānavīriyo. Aññepi amaccā anekasahassappamāṇā
anya-e0702n0:862_8: mahādhammaraññā laddhesu laddhesu ṭhānantaresu ṭhitā mahādhammarañño taṃ taṃ kiccamāvahanti
anya-e0702n0:862_9: puññakammesu abhiramanti. Sakalaraṭṭhavāsinoca manussā dānasīlabhāvanāsuyeva cittaṃ
anya-e0702n0:862_10: ṭhapenti. Bhikkhūca saṅgharājappamukhādayo theranavamajjhimā ganthadhuravipassanādhuresu abhiyuñjanti.
anya-e0702n0:863_0: Evamekassa sādhujjanassa guṇaṃ mahantena ussāhena kathentopi dukkaraṃtāva niṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:863_1: pāpetuṃ, bhagavato pana tilokaggassa anekasahassapāramitānubhāvena pavattaṃ guṇaṃ
anya-e0702n0:863_2: ko nāma puggalo sakkhissati niṭṭhaṃ pāpetvā kathetunti. Evaṃ mahādhammarājassaca
anya-e0702n0:863_3: aggamahesiyāceva uparājādīnañca guṇe vissaṭṭhena vitthārato kathiyamāne imissā sāsanavaṃsappadīpikāya
anya-e0702n0:863_4: anekasatabhāṇavāramattampi patvā pariyanto na paññāyeyya, yasmāca atippapañcā bhaveyya,
anya-e0702n0:863_5: tasmā saṅkhepenevāyaṃ kathitā sādhujjanānaṃ mahāpuññamayāya pītiyā anumodanatthāya.
anya-e0702n0:863_6: Idañhi suṇantehi sādhujjanehi anumoditabbaṃ,- asukasmiṃ kira kāle asukasmiṃ raṭṭhe
anya-e0702n0:863_7: asuko nāma rājā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullamāpajji, seyyathāpi nāma
anya-e0702n0:863_8: rukkho bhūmodakānaṃ nissāya vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullamāpajjīti.
anya-e0702n0:864_1: nāma saṅgharājā mahāthero raññā abhiyācito surājamaggadīpaniṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:864_2: Majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya atthaṃ sissānaṃ vācetvā yathāvācitaniyāmena atthayojanānayaṃ potthake āropāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:865: Medhābhivaṃsasaddhammadhajamahādhammarājādhirājaguru nāma mahāthero jātakapāḷiyā atthayojanānayaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:866_1: soyevāhaṃ dhamma raññā aggamahesiyāca abhiyācito sīlakathaṃ nāma ganthaṃ upāyakathaṃ
anya-e0702n0:866_2: nāma ganthañca akāsiṃ. Rañño ācariyabhūtena disāpāmokkhena nāma upāsakena abhiyācito
anya-e0702n0:866_3: soyevātaṃ akkharavisodhaniṃ nāma ganthaṃ āpattivinicchayaṃ nāma ganthañca. Tathā
anya-e0702n0:866_4: saṅgharaññā codito soye vāhaṃ nāgarājuppatikathaṃ vohāratthabhedañca vivādavinicchayañca
anya-e0702n0:866_5: akāsiṃ. Tathā pañcajambugāmabhojakena lekhakāmaccena dvīhica ārocanalekhakāmaccehi
anya-e0702n0:866_6: abhiyācito so yevāhaṃ rājasevakadīpaniṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsiṃ. Tathā dīghanāvānagarabhojakena
anya-e0702n0:866_7: mahāamaccena abhiyācito soyevāhaṃ nirayakathādīpakaṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsiṃ. Tathā silāleḍḍukanāmakena
anya-e0702n0:866_8: upāsakena abhiyācito soyevāhaṃ uposathavinicchayaṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsiṃ. Tathā bahūhi
anya-e0702n0:866_9: sotujanehi abhiyācito soyevāhaṃ saddanītiyā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ pāḷibhāsāya akāsinti.
anya-e0702n0:867_0: Ekasmiñca samaye kaliyuge vīsādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte rañño etadahosi,-
anya-e0702n0:867_1: idāni buddhassa bhagavato sāsane kesañci bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca kuladūsanādiasāruppakammehi
anya-e0702n0:867_2: uppāditā cattāro paccayā bahū dissanti, kecipi alajjī puggalā jātarūpādinissaggiyavatthumpisādiyanti,
anya-e0702n0:867_3: kecipi vinā paccayaṃ vikāle tambulaṃ khādanti, sannidhiñca katvā dhūmānica pivanti,
anya-e0702n0:867_4: agilānā hutvā saupāhanā gāmaṃ pavisanti, chattaṃ dhārenti, aññepi avinayānulomācāre
anya-e0702n0:867_5: caranti, idāni bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca buddhassa sammukhe buddhaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā
anya-e0702n0:867_6: ime anācāre na carissāmāti paṭiññaṃ kārāpetvā bhagavato sikkhāpadāni rakkhāpetuṃ
anya-e0702n0:867_7: vaṭṭati, evañca sati bhikkhū sāmaṇerāca mayaṃ buddhassa sammukhe evaṃ paṭiññaṃ karoma,
anya-e0702n0:867_8: paṭiññañca katvā vikāraṃ āpajjantānaṃ amhākaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve imasmiṃyeva paccakkhe
anya-e0702n0:867_9: kiñci bhayaṃ uppajjeyyāti paccakkhabhayaṃ apekkhitvā te sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhissantīti.
anya-e0702n0:867_10: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca evaṃ paṭiññaṃ kārāpetuṃ yujjati vā mā
anya-e0702n0:867_11: vāti mayaṃ na jānāma, idāni saṅgharājādayo mahāthere sannipātāpetvā pucchissāmīti puna cintesi.
anya-e0702n0:868_0: Atha sabbepi mahāthere saṅgharājassa vihāre sannipātāpetvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchathāti
anya-e0702n0:868_1: amacce āṇāpesi. Atha amaccā mahāthere sannipātāpetvā pucchiṃsu,-idāni bhante sāsane
anya-e0702n0:868_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca avinayānulomācārāni disvā buddhassa sammukhe buddhaṃ sakkhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:868_3: katvā rājā yathā ime anācāre na carissāmāti paṭiññaṃ kārāpetvā bhagavato sikkhāpadāni
anya-e0702n0:868_4: rakkhāpetuṃ icchati, tathā kārāpetuṃ yujjati vā mā vāti.
anya-e0702n0:869: Atha saṅgharājappamukhādayo mahātherā evamāhaṃsu,- yasmā sāsanassa parisuddhabhāvaṃ icchanto evaṃ karoti, tasmā tathā kārāpetuṃ yujjatīti.
anya-e0702n0:870_1: – idāni bhikkhū nāma saddhābalādīnaṃ thokatāya bhagavato āṇāsaṅkhātaṃ sacittakācittakāpattiiṃ
anya-e0702n0:870_2: āpajjitvā bhagavatāyeva anuññātehi desanāvuṭṭhānakammehi paṭikaritvā sīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:870_3: katvā lajjīpesalabhāvaṃ karonti, na kadāci āpattiṃ anāpajjitvā, tasmā bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ
anya-e0702n0:870_4: kammaṃ sañciccana vītikkamissāmāti buddhassa sammukhe paṭiññākaraṇaṃ atibhāriyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:870_5: hoti, sacepi pubbe paṭiññaṃ katvā pacchā visaṃvādeyya, evaṃ sati paṭissavavisaṃvāde
anya-e0702n0:870_6: suddhacittassa dukkaṭaṃ paṭissavakkhaṇeeva pācitti itarassacāti vacanato taṃ taṃ
anya-e0702n0:870_7: āpattiṃ paṭissavavisaṃvādanadukkapettiyā saheva āpajjeyya, atha paṭiññākaraṇatoyeva
anya-e0702n0:870_8: āpattibahulatā bhaveyya, yathā pana rogaṃ vūpasamituṃ asappāyabhesajjaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e0702n0:870_9: athassa rogo avūpasamitvā atikkameyya, evaṃ āpattiṃ anāpajjitukāmo buddhassa sammukhe
anya-e0702n0:870_10: paṭiññaṃ karoti, athassa āpattibahulāyeva bhaveyyāti, kiñca bhiyyo abhayadassāvino
anya-e0702n0:870_11: bhikkhū anekasatabuddhassa sammukhe anekasatavārānipi paṭiññaṃ katvā sikkhāpadaṃ
anya-e0702n0:871: Atha saṅgharājā mahāthero attano sissaṃ paññāsāmisirikavidhajamahādhammarājādhirājaguruṃ nāma maṃ uyyojesi, tassa therassa vacane paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:872_0: Athāhaṃ evaṃ vadāmi,- dve puggalā abhabbā sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhūca bhikkhuniyoca
anya-e0702n0:872_1: ariyā puggalā, dve puggalā sabbā sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhūca bhikkhuniyoca
anya-e0702n0:872_2: puthujjanāti parivārapāḷiyaṃ vuttattā ariyapuggalānaṃviya puthujjanānaṃ vissaṭṭhena
anya-e0702n0:872_3: paṭiññaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti manasikaritvā puthujjanabhikkhūnaṃ paṭiññākaraṇaṃ atibhāriyanti
anya-e0702n0:872_4: vedeyyace, sabbehipi ariyaputhujjanehi bhikkhūhi upasampadāmāḷake āditova cattāri
anya-e0702n0:872_5: akaraṇīyāni ācikkhitabbānīti vuttesu catūsu akaraṇīyesu antamaso tiṇasalākaṃ upādāya
anya-e0702n0:872_6: yo bhikkhu pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati,
anya-e0702n0:872_7: assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyoti, antamaso kuntakipillikaṃ upādāya yo bhikkhu sañcicca
anya-e0702n0:872_8: manussaviggahaṃ jīvitaṃ voropesi, antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāya assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyoti,
anya-e0702n0:872_9: antamaso suññāgāre abhiramāmīti yo bhikkhupāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ
anya-e0702n0:872_10: ullapati, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyotica upajjhācariyena ovadiyamānehi abhinavopasampannehi
anya-e0702n0:872_11: āma bhanteti paṭiññākathāyeva. Sāmaṇerehipi pabbajjakkhaṇeyeva upajjhāyassa santike
anya-e0702n0:872_12: pāṇātipātāveramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmītiādinā paṭhamaṃ paṭiññā katāyeva. Tathā
anya-e0702n0:872_13: bhikkhūhi taṃtaṃāpattiṃ āpajjitvā desanāya paṭikaraṇakāle sādhu suṭṭhu bhante saṃvarissāmīti
anya-e0702n0:872_14: abhiṇhaṃ paṭiññā katāyeva. Sāmaṇerehipi upajjhācariyassa santike sikkhāggahaṇakālepi
anya-e0702n0:872_15: pāṇātipātāvera maṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmītiādinā abhiṇhaṃ paṭiññā katāyeva. Tāhi
anya-e0702n0:872_16: pana paṭiññāhi abhāyitvā itoyeva bhāyāmīti vuttavacanaṃ acchariyaṃviya hutvā khāyati.
anya-e0702n0:872_17: Imāya hi paṭiññāya tāsaṃ paṭiññānaṃ visesatā na dissatīti.
anya-e0702n0:873_0: Ayaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānattho,- paṭissavadukkaṭāpatti nāma sāvatthiyaṃ passenadikosalaraññā
anya-e0702n0:873_1: imasmiṃ vihāre vassaṃ upagacchāhīti āyācite sādhūti paṭijānitvā lābhabahulataṃ paṭicca
anya-e0702n0:873_2: antarāmagge aññasmiṃ vihāre vassaṃ upagantvā paṭissavavisaṃvādanapaccayā upanandaṃ
anya-e0702n0:873_3: nāma bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattā. Samantapāsādikañca nāma vinayaṭṭhakathāya vassūpanāyikakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:873_4: paṭissaveca āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha na kevalaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vassaṃ vasathāti
anya-e0702n0:873_5: etasseva paṭissave āpatti, imaṃ temāsaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha, ubhopi mayaṃ vassaṃ vasissāma,
anya-e0702n0:873_6: ekato uddissāpessāmāti evamādināpi tassa tassa paṭissave dukkaṭaṃ, tañca kho paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0702n0:873_7: suddhacittassa pacchā visaṃvādanapaccayā, paṭhamampi asuddha cittassa pana paṭissave
anya-e0702n0:874_0: Iccevaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ dāyakehica saddhiṃ paṭijānitvā visaṃvādanapaccayā aññesaṃ
anya-e0702n0:874_1: atthahitabhedeyeva dukkaṭāpatti vuttā, na attano icchāvasena sayameva ahaṃ bhuñjissāmi
anya-e0702n0:874_2: sayissāmīti evamādinā vatvā yathāvuttānurūpaṃ akatvā visaṃvādaneti. Sace pana bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:874_3: paṭhamameva āma bhantetiādinā paṭiññaṃ katvā pacchā kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃtaṃāpattiṃ
anya-e0702n0:874_4: āpajjanto saha paṭissavavisaṃvādena dukkaṭāpattiyā āpajjeyya, evaṃ sati tattha tattha
anya-e0702n0:874_5: sikkhāpadesu dve dve āpattiyo paññāpeyya, na ca evampi paññattā, teneva paṭissavadukkaṭāpatti
anya-e0702n0:874_6: nāma paresaṃ santike paresaṃ matiṃ gahetvā paṭijānitvā visaṃvādanaṭṭhāneyeva paññattāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0702n0:875_0: Idāni rājā sāsanassa suddhiṃ icchanto iminā upāyena bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ sīlaṃ saṃvarāpento
anya-e0702n0:875_1: paccakkhasamparāyikabhayaṃ anupekkhitvā saṃvaraṃ āpajjeyyunti cintetvā buddhassa
anya-e0702n0:875_2: sammukhe paṭiññaṃ kārāpitattā na koci doso dissati. Bhikkhusāmaṇerānampi bhiyyosomattāyasīlaṃ
anya-e0702n0:875_3: saṃvaritvā sīlaparisuddhi bhaveyyāti. Atha rājā sabbesaṃ bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ buddhassa
anya-e0702n0:876: Iccevaṃ imassa rañño kāle pubbe alajjinopi samānā bhayaṃ anupekkhitvā yebhuyyena lajjinova bhavantīti.
anya-e0702n0:877_0: Buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānato tisatādhikānaṃ dvivassasahassānaṃ upari navutime
anya-e0702n0:877_1: saṃvacchare bahinadītīre gāmasīmato paṭṭhāya yāva antoudakukkhepā, tāva kammaṃ karontānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:877_2: bhikkhūnaṃ sukhena gamanatthāya gahaṭṭhā gāmasīmāya udakukkhepasīmaṃ sambandhitvā setuṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:878: Atha tattha ñāṇālaṅkārasumanamahādhammarājagurugaṇā cariyanāmako thero upasampadādivinayakammāni katipaya vassesu akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:879_0: Dhīrānandatthero pana tattha saṅkaradoso hotīti kammaṃ kātuṃ na icchati. Tathā paṭṭhāya
anya-e0702n0:879_1: ye ye ñāṇālaṅkārasumanamahādhammarājagurugaṇācariyassa matiṃ ruccanti, te te tassa
anya-e0702n0:879_2: pakkhikā bhavanti. Ye ye pana dhīrānandattherassamatiṃ ruccanti, tete tassa pakkhikā
anya-e0702n0:879_3: bhavanti. Evaṃlaṅkādīpe amarapuranikāyikā bhikkhū. Dvedhā bhinditvā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0702n0:880_0: Atha dhīrānandapakkhe bhikkhu tappakkhikassa sīlakkhandhattherassa sisse dhammakkhandhavanaratanabhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:880_1: amhākaṃ jambudīpe ratanapuṇṇanagaraṃ pesesuṃ saṅgharājamahātherassa santike ovādassa
anya-e0702n0:880_2: paṭiggāhaṇatthāya. Te ca kaliyuge aṭṭhārasādhike dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte
anya-e0702n0:880_3: kattikamāsassa juṇhapakkhaaṭṭhamiyaṃ sīhaḷadīpato nikkhamitvā āgacchantā ekūnavīsādhike
anya-e0702n0:880_4: dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte phaggunamāsassa juṇhapakkhasattamiyaṃ ratanapuṇṇanagaraṃ sampattā.
anya-e0702n0:881_0: Atha dhammarājā saṅgharājassa ārāme catubhūmikaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā tattha te vasāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:881_1: Catūhi paccayehica saṅgahaṃ akāsi. Saṅgharājāca tesaṃ dvinnaṃ pakkhikānaṃ vacanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:881_2: sutvā bahūhi ganthehi saṃsanditvā vivādaṃ vinicchindi. Tādise ṭhāne saṅkaradosassa
anya-e0702n0:882_0: Mahādhammarājāca tesaṃ puna sikkhaṃ saṅgharājassa santike gaṇhāpetvā piṭakattayapotthakādīni
anya-e0702n0:882_1: dātabbavatthūni datvā tasmiṃyeva saṃvacchare paṭhamaāsāḷimāsassa kāḷapakkhadasamiyaṃ nāvāya te pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:883_1: paññāmolittherassa sisse vimalajotidhammanandabhikkhū pesesuṃ saddhiṃ ariyālaṅkārena
anya-e0702n0:883_2: nāma sāmaṇerena catūhica upāsakehi. Teca kaliyuge vīsādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte
anya-e0702n0:884_0: Tadāpi saṅgharājassa ārāmeyeva ekaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā te vasāpesi. Catūhi paccayehica
anya-e0702n0:884_1: saṅgahaṃ akāsi. Saṅgharājāpi puna vinicchayaṃ adāsi yathāvuttanayena. Dhammarājā
anya-e0702n0:884_2: tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgharājassa santike puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā sāmaṇerañca upasampādetvā
anya-e0702n0:885_0: Tato pacchāca kaliyuge bāvīsādhike dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte māghamāsassa kāḷapakkhaekādasamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:885_1: sīhaḷadīpatoyeva dve bhikkhū tayo sāmaṇerā cattāro upāsakā sarajatasuvaṇṇakaraṇḍakaṃ
anya-e0702n0:885_4: dhammapaṇṇākāratthāya gahetvā ratanapuṇṇaṃ nāma mahārājaṭṭhānīnagaraṃ sampattā. Tesampi
anya-e0702n0:885_5: dhammarājā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ katvā saṅgharañño ārāme vasāpesi. Bhikkhunañca
anya-e0702n0:885_6: puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhāpesi. Sāmaṇerānañca upasampadakammaṃ gahaṭṭhānañca pabbajjakammaṃ gaṇhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:886: Iccevaṃ marammaraṭṭhe bhagavato parinibbānato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā sāsanassa theraparamparavasena patiṭṭhānatā veditabbā.
anya-e0702n0:887: Iccevaṃ marammamaṇḍale arimaddanapure arahantattheragaṇo uttarājīvattherachappadattheragaṇo sivalittheragaṇo ānandattheragaṇo tāmalindattheragaṇoti pañca gaṇā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:888_0: Idāni arimaddananagare pañcagaṇato paṭṭhāya vijayapurajeyyapuraratanapūresu theraparamparavasena
anya-e0702n0:888_1: sāsanassa anukkamena āgatabhāvaṃ dassayissāmi. Sirikhettanagare hi ‘so yāṃ noṃ’ nāma
anya-e0702n0:888_2: rājā parakkamavaṃsikassa sāradassittherassa antevāsikaṃ saddhammaṭṭhitittheraṃ attano
anya-e0702n0:889_0: Kaliyugassa catuvassādhikaaṭṭhasatakāle sirikhettanagarato āgantvā so ratanapūre
anya-e0702n0:889_1: rajjaṃ kāresi. Atha attano puttaṃ anekibhaṃ nāma rājakumāraṃ mahārāja nāmena sirikhettanagaraṃ
anya-e0702n0:889_2: bhuñjāpesi. Dakkhiṇadisābhāge ‘kū vṭhe ṭa-yo mo’ nagaraṃ, pacchimadisābhāge ‘pho
anya-e0702n0:889_3: khoṃ’ nāma ṭhānaṃ, uttaradisābhāge ‘ma loṃ’ nagaraṃ, puratthimadisābhāge ‘koṃ khoṃ’
anya-e0702n0:889_4: nāma ṭhānaṃ, etthantare nisinnānaṃ gihīnaṃ mama puttassa āṇā pavattatu, bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:890_0: Tassaca saddhammaṭṭhitittherassa ariyavaṃsatthero mahāsāmittheroti dve sissā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:890_1: Tesu mahāsāmitthero pubbe vuttanayena sāsanavaṃsaṃ ānessāmīti sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā
anya-e0702n0:890_2: sīhaḷadīpato saddhiṃ pañcahi bhikkhūhi saddhammacāriṃ nāma theraṃ ānetvā abhinavasikkhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:890_3: gaṇhitvā sirikhettanagare sīhaḷadīpavaṃsikaṃ sāsanaṃ vaḍḍhāpetvā nisīdi. Tassa mahāsārittherassa
anya-e0702n0:890_4: sisso atulavaṃso nāma thero catūsu disāsu ahiṇḍitvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhitvā sirikhettanagareyeva
anya-e0702n0:890_5: tambulabhuñjamātikāsamīpe sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā nisīdi. Tassa atulavaṃsattherassa sisso
anya-e0702n0:890_6: ratanaraṃsī nāma theroca pariyattivesārajjaṃ patvā sirikhettanagareyeva sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā
anya-e0702n0:890_7: nisīdi. Tassaca ratanaraṃ sittherassa sisso satvavadhammarājassa ācariyo abhisaṅketo
anya-e0702n0:890_8: nāma thero pariyattivesārajjaṃ patvā sirikhettanagarayeva sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:890_9: Tassa pana sisso munindaghoso nāma thero atthi. Kaliyuge sattatādhike navasate sampatte
anya-e0702n0:890_10: pacchimapakkhādhikarājā sirikhettanagaraṃ abhibhavitvā nandayodhena nāma amaccena
anya-e0702n0:890_11: saddhiṃ taṃ munindaghosattheraṃ ānetvā ratanapūre patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:891: So kira pacchimapakkhādhikarājā evaṃ kathesi,- ahaṃ sirikhettanagaraṃ labhitvā ekaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ ekaṃyeva gihiṃ labhāmīti.
anya-e0702n0:892_0: So pana thero sāmaṇeranāmena munindaghoso nāma. Upasampannakāle pana mātulabhūtassa
anya-e0702n0:892_1: therassa nāmena upāli nāma. Dinnanāmena pana tipiṭakālaṅkāro nāma. Tiriyapabbatavihāre
anya-e0702n0:893_0: So kira erāvatīnadītīre catubhūmikavihāre paṭhamaṃ nisīditvā pacchā kaliyugassa vassasahasse
anya-e0702n0:893_1: kālesaṭṭhivassāyuko hutvā tiriyapabbatavihāre nisīdi. Sāmaṇerakāle so jalumasyāmabhayena
anya-e0702n0:893_2: ratanapūrato nikkhamitvā ketumatīnagaraṃ patvā tattha tisāsanadhajattherassa sissabhūtassa
anya-e0702n0:893_3: dhammarājaguruttherassa santike ganthaṃ uggaṇhiṃ. Pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu atichekatāya
anya-e0702n0:893_4: daharakāleyevaca vessantarajātakaṃ kabyālaṅkārena bandhitvā kathanato ativiya pākaṭo
anya-e0702n0:893_5: ahosi. Tassa pana therassa sisso uccanagaravāsī mahātissattheroti saṅgirajanapade
anya-e0702n0:893_6: araññavāsaṃ vasitvā pariyattiṃ vācetvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhi. Tassa pana sisso reminagāme
anya-e0702n0:893_7: gāmavāsī candatthero nāma. Tassa sisso taṃgāmavāsī guṇasiritthero nāma. Tassa sisso
anya-e0702n0:893_8: taṃgāmavāsī kalyāṇadhajattharo nāma. So pana thero padumanagare sahassorodhabodhodadhigāmesu
anya-e0702n0:893_9: pariyattiṃ vācetvā nisīdi. Tassa sisso bodhodadhigāmavāsino indobhāsakalyāṇacakkavimalācārattherā
anya-e0702n0:893_11: jararājagāma vāsī guṇasirittherocāti ime therā kalyāṇadhajattherassa santike puna
anya-e0702n0:893_12: sikkhaṃ gahetvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhitvā kovidā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:894_0: Tasseva kalyāṇadhajattherassa sisso saṅgirajanapade samivanagāme nisinno dhammadharo
anya-e0702n0:894_1: nāma thero mahallakakāle padumanagare kusumamūlagāme nisīditvā ganthaṃ vācetvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhi.
anya-e0702n0:895: Tesu guṇasiritthero amarapuramāpakassa rañño kāle guṇābhilaṅkārasaddhammamahārājādhirājagurūti nāmalañchaṃ gaṇhitvā jeyyabhūmivāsakittivihāre paṭivasi.
anya-e0702n0:896_0: Tassa pana therassa sisso ñāṇābhivaṃsadhammasenāpatimahādhammarājāguru nāma mahāthero.
anya-e0702n0:896_1: Tasseva rañño kāle saṅgharājā ahosi. So pana thero sīhaḷadīpe amarapuranikāyikānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:896_4: nāma thero amarapuradutiyamāpakassa rañño kāle saṅgharājā ahosi. Tassa pana sisso
anya-e0702n0:896_6: mahāthero dutiyaṃ amarapuramāpakassa ratanapuṇṇamāpakassaca rañño kālesu saṅgha rājā
anya-e0702n0:897: Ayaṃ sīhaḷadīpato sabbapacchimāgatehi saddhammacārīmahāsāmittherehi yāva amhākaṃ ācariyā theraparamparā dassanakathā.
anya-e0702n0:898_0: Ayampi aparā theraparamparā veditabbā. Chappadattheravaṃsiko saddhammakitti nāma
anya-e0702n0:898_1: thero jeyyapuraṃ āgantvā catudīpabhūmiṭṭhāne nisīditvā mahāariyavaṃsattherassa santike
anya-e0702n0:898_2: pariyattiṃ uggaṇhitvā tato pacchā jetavanavihāraṃ saṅkamitvā tattha nisīditvā pariyattiṃ
anya-e0702n0:899_0: Tassa saddhammakittittherassa sisso tisāsanadhajo nāma. Tassa sisso dhammarājaguru
anya-e0702n0:899_1: nāma. Tassa sisso munindaghoso nāma. Tassa sisso mahātisso nāma. Tassa sisso candapañño
anya-e0702n0:899_2: nāma. Tassa sisso guṇasiri nāma. Tassa sisso ñāṇadhajo nāma. Tassa sisso dhammadharo
anya-e0702n0:899_3: nāma. Tassa sisso indobhāso nāma. Tato paṭṭhāya kalyāṇacakka vimalācāra guṇasāra
anya-e0702n0:899_4: candasāra varaesī guṇasiri ñāṇābhivaṃsa ñeyyadhammābhivaṃsattherānaṃ vasena sāsanavaṃso veditabboti.
anya-e0702n0:900: Ayaṃ pattalaṅkassa chappadattherassa sissabhūtā saddhammakittittherato paṭṭhāya theraparamparadassanakathā.
anya-e0702n0:902_0: Evaṃ aparantaraṭṭhasaṅkhātena ekadesena sakalampi marammaraṭṭhaṃ gahetvā sāsanavaṃso
anya-e0702n0:902_1: dassetabbo. Bhagavāpi hi aparantaraṭṭhe candanavihāre vasitvā tambadīparaṭṭhe taṃtaṃdesampi
anya-e0702n0:906: 7. Idāni yathāvuttamātikāvasena kasmīravandhāraraṭṭhasāsanavaṃsakathāmaggaṃ vattuṃ okāso anuppatto, tasmā taṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n0:907_0: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero majjhanti kattheraṃ kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:907_1: pesesi,-tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ pabhiṭṭhāpehīti. Ettha ca kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:907_2: nāma cīnaraṭṭhasamīpe tiṭṭhati. Teneva hi adhunā kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhavāsino cinaraṭṭhavāsinoca
anya-e0702n0:907_3: manussā aravāḷassa nāma nāgarājassa uppajjanakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā nāgarūpaṃ
anya-e0702n0:907_4: katvā mānenti pūjenti sakkaronti, vatthabhājanādīsupi nāgarūpameva te yebhuyyena karontīti.
anya-e0702n0:908_0: Soca majjhantikattheropi catūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ attha pañcamo hutvā pāṭaliputtato
anya-e0702n0:908_1: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā himavati aravāḷadahassa upari otari. Tena kho pana samayena
anya-e0702n0:908_2: kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhe sassapākasamaye aravāḷo nāma nāgarājā aravāḷadahe nisīditvā
anya-e0702n0:908_3: karakavassaṃ nāma vassāpetvā sassaṃ harāpetvā mahāsamuddaṃ pāpesi. Teroca aravāḷadahassa
anya-e0702n0:908_4: upari otaritvā aravāḷadahapiṭṭhikaṃ caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
anya-e0702n0:908_5: Nāgamāṇavakā taṃ disvā aravāḷassa nāgarājassa ārocesuṃ, - mahārāja eko chinnabhinnapaṭadharo
anya-e0702n0:908_6: bhaṇḍukāsāvavasano amhākaṃ udakaṃ dūsetīti. Tadā pana thero attānaṃyeva nāgānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0702n0:908_7: Nagarājā tāvadeva kodhābhibhūto nikkhamitvā theraṃ disvā makkhaṃ assahamāno antalikkhe
anya-e0702n0:908_8: anekāni bhiṃsanakāni nimmini. Tato tato bhusāvātā vāyanti, rukkhā chijjanti, pabbatakūṭā
anya-e0702n0:908_9: patanti meghāgajjanti, vijjuṃlatā niccharanti, asaniyo phalanti, bhinnaṃ viya gaganaṃ
anya-e0702n0:908_10: udakaṃ paggharati, bhayānakarūpā nāgakumārā sannipatanti, sayampi dhūmāyati pajjalati,
anya-e0702n0:908_11: paharaṇavuṭṭhiyo vissajjeti, ko ayaṃmuṇḍako chinnabhinnapaṭadharotiādīhi pharusavacanehi
anya-e0702n0:908_12: theraṃ santajjeti, etha gaṇhatha hanatha niddhamatha imaṃ samaṇanti nāgabalaṃ āṇāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:909: Thero sabbaṃ taṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ attano iddhibalena paṭibāhitvā nāgarājānaṃ āha,–
anya-e0702n0:910: Sadevakopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0702n0:911: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:912: Sacepi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabba, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0702n0:916: Evaṃ vutte nāgarājā vihatānubhāvo nipphalavāyāmo dukkhī dummano ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:917_0: Taṃ thero taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā
anya-e0702n0:917_1: sampahaṃsetvā tīsu saraṇesu pañcasuca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi saddhiṃ caturāsītiyā nāgasahassehi.
anya-e0702n0:917_2: Aññepi bahū himavantavāsino yakkhāca gandhabbāca kumbhaṇḍāca therassa dhammakathaṃ
anya-e0702n0:917_3: sutvā saraṇesuca sīlesuca patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Pañcakopi yakkho saddhiṃ bhariyāya yakkhiniyā
anya-e0702n0:917_4: pañcahica puttasatehi paṭhame phale patiṭṭhito. Athāyasmā majjhanti katthero sabbenāgayakkharakkhase āmantetvā evamāha,-
anya-e0702n0:918: Mādāni kodhaṃ janayittha, ito uddhaṃ yathā pure;
anya-e0702n0:919: Sassaghātañca mā kattha, sukhakāmā hi pāṇino;
anya-e0702n0:920: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhanti.
anya-e0702n0:921_0: Te sabbepi sādhu bhanteti therassa vacanaṃ paṭissuṇitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:921_1: Taṃ divasameva nāgarājassa pūjāsamayo hoti. Atha nāgarājā attano ratanamayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ
anya-e0702n0:921_2: āharāpetvā therassa paññapesi. Nisīdi thero pallaṅke. Nāgarājāpi theraṃ bījayamāno
anya-e0702n0:921_3: samīpe aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhavāsino āgantvā theraṃ disvā amhākaṃ
anya-e0702n0:921_4: nāgarājatopi thero mahiddhikataroti therameva vanditvā nisinnā. Thero tesaṃ āsivisopamasuttaṃ
anya-e0702n0:921_5: kathesi. Suttapariyosāne asītiyāpāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Kulasatasahassañca
anya-e0702n0:921_6: pabbaji. Tato pabhuti ca kasmīragandhāro yāvajjetanā kāsāvapajjotā isivātapaṭivātāeva.
anya-e0702n0:923: Duṭṭhaṃ nāgaṃ pasādetvā, mocesi bandhanā bahūti.
anya-e0702n0:924: Adhunā pana kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhe sāsanassa atthaṅgatassaviya sūriyassa obhāso na paññāyati, tasmā tattha sāsanassa patiṭṭhāne vitthārena vattabbakiccaṃ natthīti.
anya-e0702n0:928: 8. Idāni yathāvuttamātikāvasena mahiṃsakaraṭṭhasāsanavaṃsakathāmaggaṃ vattuṃ okāso anuppatto, tasmā taṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n0:929: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero mahārevattheraṃ mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ pesesi,- tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti.
anya-e0702n0:930_0: Soca attapañcamo hutvā mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ agamāsi paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggo
anya-e0702n0:930_1: gaṇo alaṃ upasampadakammāyāti maññamāno. Thero mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ gantvā devadūtasuttaṃ
anya-e0702n0:930_2: kathesi. Suttapariyosāne cattālīsapāṇasahassāni dhammacakkhuṃ ppaṭilabhiṃsu. Cattālīsaṃyeva
anya-e0702n0:933: Adhunā pana tattha sāsanassa abbhehiviya paṭicchannassa sūriyassa okāso dubbalo hutvā paññāyati.
anya-e0702n0:938: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero mahādhammarakkhittheraṃ mahāraṭṭhaṃ pesesi,-tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesīti.
anya-e0702n0:939_0: Mahādhammarakkhitattheroca attapañcamo hutvā mahāraṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahānāradakassapajātakakathāya
anya-e0702n0:939_1: mahāraṭṭhake pasādetvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Terasasahassāni
anya-e0702n0:939_2: pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ so tattha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:940: Mahāraṭṭhaṃ isi gantvā, so mahā dhammarakkhito;
anya-e0702n0:942_0: Tattha kira manussā pubbe aggihutādimicchākammaṃ yebhuyyena akaṃsu. Teneva thero
anya-e0702n0:942_1: mahānāradakassapajātakakathaṃ desesi. Tato paṭṭhāya tattha manussā jātaka kathaṃ
anya-e0702n0:942_2: yebhuyyena sotuṃ ativiya icchanti. Bhikkhūca yebhuyyena gahaṭṭhānaṃ jātakakathaṃyeva
anya-e0702n0:942_3: desenti. Visesato pana vassantarajātakakathaṃ te manussā bahūhi dātabbavatthūhi pūjetvā suṇanti.
anya-e0702n0:943_0: Tañca mahāraṭṭhaṃ nāma syāmaraṭṭhasamīpe ṭhitaṃ, teneva syāmaraṭṭhavāsinopi bhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:943_1: gahaṭṭhāca yebhuyyena sotuṃ icchantīti. Mahādhammarakkhitattheropi mahāraṭṭhavāsīhi
anya-e0702n0:943_2: saddhiṃ sakalasyāmaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, amatarasaṃ pāyesi, yathā yonakadhammarakkhitatthero
anya-e0702n0:944_0: Yaṃ pana yonakaraṭṭhasāsanavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi sabbaṃ etthāpi daṭṭhabbaṃyeva,
anya-e0702n0:944_1: tehi tassa ekasadisattena ṭhitattāti. Tathā hi nāgasenattheropi yonakaraṭṭhe vasitvā
anya-e0702n0:944_3: saddhiṃ bahūhi bhikkhūhi sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā tato punāgantvā syāmaraṭṭhe sokkatayanagaraṃ
anya-e0702n0:944_4: patvā tattha nisīditvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā pacchā lakunnanagare nisīditvā sāsanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:944_5: paggaṇhi. Evaṃ yonakaraṭṭhe sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ syāmādīsupi ṭhitaṃyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:945_0: Buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānato dvisatādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasahassānaṃ upari navutime
anya-e0702n0:945_1: vassa sīhaḷadīpe rajjaṃ pattassa kittissirirājasīhamahārājassa abhisekato tatiye
anya-e0702n0:945_3: laṅkādīpaṃ āgatehi upālitthe rādīhi patiṭṭhāpito vaṃso upālivaṃsoti pākaṭo. Soca
anya-e0702n0:950: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero majjhimattheraṃ cinaraṭṭhaṃ pesesi,-tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti.
anya-e0702n0:951_2: desaṃ pasādetvā asītipāṇakoṭiyo maggaphalaratanāni paṭilābhesi. Pañcapica te therā
anya-e0702n0:951_3: pañcaraṭṭhāni pasādesuṃ. Ekamekassa santike sahassamattā pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ te tattha
anya-e0702n0:954_0: Tattha kira manussā yebhuyyena candīparamīsvārānaṃ yakkhānaṃ pūjaṃ karonti. Teneva
anya-e0702n0:954_1: te pañca therā tesaṃ yakkhasenaṃ pakāsayitvā dhammaṃ desesuṃ. Kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:954_2: pana kadāci kadāci cīnaraṭṭhindassa vijitaṃ hoti, kadāci kadāci pana visuṃ hoti.
anya-e0702n0:955_0: Cīranaṭṭhe pana bhagavato sāsanaṃ dubbalaṃyeva hutvā aṭṭhāsi, na thiraṃ hutvā. Teneva
anya-e0702n0:955_1: idāni tattha katthaciyeva sāsanaṃ chāyāmattaṃva paññāyati, vātavegena vikiṇṇaabbhaṃviya tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0702n0:968: Koci ettheva doso ce, paññāyati sucittakā;
anya-e0702n0:969: Taṃ khamantu ca suddhiyā, gaṇhantu yuttikaṃ haveti.
